22b4(mdo): gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdus phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed phyung ste/ shar phyogs su 'phros so// de la 'od gzer gcig gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi
22b5(mdo): khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur dwa te/ 'jig
22b6(mdo): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga du 'od gzer gracig gos khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par myi byed do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhi na du/ sgo dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du byar shwar
22b7(mdo): kye mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du sgo nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du steng dang / 'og kau phyogs su yang / 'od gzer rgya mtsho de
22b8(mdo): dag thams cad 'phros so// de las 'od gzer gcig gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi
22b9(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa te/ gang gcig gis khyab pa de/ gnyis kyis khyab par myi byed do// yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'od gzed de dag
23a1(mdo): gis snang bar byas pa/ gang yin pa de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'aka'i klung lnga bcu'i snye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi
23a2(mdo): rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' re re'i 'khor kyang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'aka'i klung lnga bcu'i
23a3(mdo): bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lhags na/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum
23a4(mdo): phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lta ci smos// 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myad
23a5(mdo): pa lta ci smos// 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du myed pa snyed lta ci smos// 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum kyi rdul phra rab
23a6(mdo): kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gi khams stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos// 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams
23a7(mdo): nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ jo 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul skad lta ci smos// 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams
23a8(mdo): cig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang 'ga'i klung brgya'i bye ma snyed lta ci smras// 'khor kang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci spros/ 'khor gang 'gi'i klung nyi shu lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos
23a9(mdo): 'khor gang 'ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci spos/ 'khor gang 'aka'i klung sde'i bye snyed sta ci spos/ 'khor kang 'ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed lta ci smos// 'khor kang 'gro'i klung gi bye ma'i gzhi cha snyed sta ci smos/
23b1(mdo): 'khor gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma brgyad cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma'i bcu drug gi cha snyed lta ci spos/ 'khor kang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma'i cha nyi shu snyed sta ci spros/ 'khor bye ma phrag brgya lnga ci spros/ 'khor
23b2(mdo): bye ba phrag lnga bcu'i lnga bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lnga
23b3(mdo): ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin
23b4(mdo): bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa/ stong ga sum gyi stong chen po'i bcu'i tshad tsam gi tshar kas chags pa myed cing bsgrib pa myed la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par phab nas
23b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang nor bu rin po che/ 'i rgyal po'i sprin ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa
23b6(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin na/ shegs pa la gtor da cing mngon par gtorang to// gtor da cing mngon par gtor de nas/ bcom ldan 'das la yan grangs myed
23b7(mdo): par bskor bar byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sha rang phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang de dang 'dra'o// shar lho'i mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// lho nub
23b8(mdo): mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// nub byang gi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// byang sha rad kyi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// steng du yang de dang 'dra'o// 'og gi phyogs su yang de dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten
23b9(mdo): kyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag 'od gzer de dag gis snang bar byas pa de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung bcu'i
24a1(mdo): bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog ka'i
24a2(mdo): klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyis bskor na/ 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du myed pa snyed lta ci smos
24a3(mdo): 'khor 'jig rten gyi 'ams brgya'i rdus phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos// 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu'i rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed pa ste
24a4(mdo): spos 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos 'khor 'jig rten gi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lA ci smos// 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi
24a5(mdo): rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang 'ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyedakyi bar du lta ci smos// 'khor bye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos/ 'khorabye ba phrag lnga su sta ni smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos
24a6(mdo): 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lta ci smos te// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i
24a7(mdo): rgyal po'i sprin pha rol tu phyind pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsham gi char gis tshags pa myed cing / sgrib pa myed la/ ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par phab nas
24a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po che'i sprin sa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gis/
24a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor da cing / mngon par gtor da to// gtor cing mngon par gtor de nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs myed par bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs
24b1(mdo): cig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe/ phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs cha re rer/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten
24b2(mdo): kyi khams rgya mtsho las 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i rdul phra rab kyi re re la/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyam tsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
24b3(mdo): grangs myed pa skyed gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang / sems can su la yang gnod pa'am/ sgrib pa myed do// 'jig rten gi khams rnams dang / gling rnams dang / lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang zung dang /
24b4(mdo): btang zung chen po dang / kangs dang gangs cheran po dang / 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgyam tsho chen po rnams dang / lha'i gnas rnams dang / krung dang / mtsho bran dang /
24b5(mdo): mtshe'u rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang rnams la yang / gnod pa 'am/ sgrib pa myed de/ sngon gyi ji lta ba de bzhin du
24b6(mdo): phyis kyang / bya ba la 'jug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs
24b7(mdo): par mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i'i khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan/
24b8(mdo): 'ad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang /
24b9(mdo): khams dang / rgyu dang / dmyigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag gis sems can gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24b10(mdo): byang chub tu yongs su sbyin du par mdzad pa dag ci thams cad 'khor 'dir 'dus sam// 'on te gzhan yang gang drag ma 'dus pa dag kyang yod dam zhig gu snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
24b11(mdo): chub sems dpa' dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyerang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la bka' stsal da pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na/ nyan thos chen
24b12(mdo): po rgya mtsho rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa la rnam par me ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ka'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdus phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed yod par
24b13(mdo): gyur da sa/ nyan thos chen po de dag re res kyang / se gos gtog/ sa pa re re la sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho kang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
24b14(mdo): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed bskyed de/ 1/ na thos chen po re res kyang / sems bskyed pa re res gom pa 'dor// ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gar 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i
24b15(mdo): bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig gra ngas myed pa snyed song la/ gom pa re re bor bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gar 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul
24b16(mdo): rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'da' bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kar du nyan thos chen po gcig 'gro ba rer/ gnyis myi 'gro ba de
24b17(mdo): lta bu'i tshul gis skal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed du 'gro bar byed de/ shar phyogs ji
24b18(mdo): lta ba de bzhin/ lho dang nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams phyogs su song zhing
24b19(mdo): cig tu 'khod // yang de'i tshe/ phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs cha re rer/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten
24b20(mdo): gyi khams rgya mtsho las 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i rdul phra rab kyi re re la/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
24b21(mdo): grangs myed pa skyed gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang / sems can su la yang gnod pa'am/ sgrib pa myed do// 'jig rten gi khams rnams dang / gling rnams dang / lhun po dang / srun po chen po dang / btang zung dang
24b22(mdo): btang zung chen po dang / gangs dang gangs chen po dang / 'khor sug dang / 'khor yug chen po dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams dang / lha'i gnas rnams dang / krung dang / mtsho bran dang
24b23(mdo): mche'u rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang rnams la yang // gnod pa 'am/ sgrib pa myed de/ sngon gyi ji lta ba de bzhin du
24b24(mdo): phyis kyang / bya ba la 'jug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs/
24b25(mdo): bar mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan
24b26(mdo): dkyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs sa mkhas pa'i tshus kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang /
24b27(mdo): khams dang / rgyu dang / dmyigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag gis sems can gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
25a1(mdo): byang chub tu yongs su smyin du par mdzad pa dag ci thams cad 'khor 'dir 'dus sam// 'on te gzhan yang gang drag ma 'dus pa dag kyang yong dam zhig gu snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
25a2(mdo): chub sems dpa' dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyerang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la bka' stsal da pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na/ nyan thos chen
25a3(mdo): po rgya mtsho rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa la rnam par che ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ka'i klung snga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed yod par
25a4(mdo): gyur das/ nyan thos chen po de dag re res kyang / se gos gton/ sa pa re re sa sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
25a5(mdo): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed bskyed de/ 1/ na thos chen po re res kyang / sems bskyed pa re res gom pa 'dor// ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu
25a6(mdo): bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig gra ngas myed pa snyed song la/ gom pa re re bor bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul
25a7(mdo): rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'da' bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gakar du nyan thos chen po gcig 'gro ba der/ gnyis myi 'gro ba de
25a8(mdo): lta bu'i tshul gis skal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed du 'gro bar byed de/ shar phyogs rdzi
25a9(mdo): lta ba de bzhin / lho dang nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams phyogs su song zhing
25b1(mdo): nyan thos chen po gcig gang du song ba der/ gnyis myi 'gro la/ de nas myi la la zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par rabs kun nas bskor/
25b2(mdo): te/ lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyurd cing / rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo myed par byas nas/ bye mas bkang ste/ zur bur byas la/ de nas myi des bye ma'i grong khyer de nas/ bye ma 'bru re re nas blangs
25b3(mdo): la grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma'i 'bru ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi cher gses te/ brtsi ba'i thabs 'dis/ bye ma'i 'bru de dag thams cad char gsas la/ de nas myi de bye ma'i 'bru char ka ses pa de dag thams cad
25b4(mdo): shar phyogs su khye ra de/ bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag ji ste dab de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'das shing / bye ma'i bru char gses pa gcig bor te/ brdzi bo'i thabs 'dis skye
25b5(mdo): ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag thams cad bor te/ shar phyog/ su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de ba zhin du byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin
25b6(mdo): du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams su bor la/ de nas myi des 'ji ga rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag tu bye ma'i 'bru char ka ses pa
25b7(mdo): de dag bor ba dang / gang dag tu ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer du byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par rabs kun nas bskor te/ lag mthil bzhin mnyam par gyur cing
25b8(mdo): rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo myed par byas nas/ bye mas bkang ste/ byur bur byas la/ nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dir 'dus pa 'di dag ni bye ma'i grong khyer de las/ bye mo'i 'bru ka cig tsam du zad do//
25b9(mdo): nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dir ma 'dus pa ni/ grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma lhag ma ji snyed pa tsam mo// de'i lhag ma'i bye ma snyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang myang mthun la/
26a1(mdo): rus gcig pa na skrag pa yin na/ myong tha dad pa dang / rus tha dad paci spos/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i khadog yongs su grub pa mam
26a2(mdo): yam pa la sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa du mar sangs rgyas 'byung ba stond pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can yongs su sbyong ba dang / sems can gyi khams
26a3(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su smyind par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan pa sha stag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi nang
26a4(mdo): nas/ kha cig gi sems can yongs su sbyind par byed po'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa mthong na ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor de'i nang du bsdu ba dang
26a5(mdo): de dag gi sems can yongs su smyind par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa bstand pa'i phyir/ se kos ki sgra mdzad do// de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag nas/ byang
26a6(mdo): chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag gi/ mdab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag gi ches pha rol du 'jig rten
26a7(mdo): gi khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdus phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ gso
26a8(mdo): rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ sdeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ che ma chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur
26a9(mdo): kun tu rab tu shur bur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re na/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogasaH/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang
26b1(mdo): phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ byang shar gyi mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ shar spro mtshams kyi phyogs dma'/
26b2(mdo): na/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ shar spro mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mthe'o// dbus dma' na mtha' mtho ste/ shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du
26b3(mdo): lho phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// nub phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// byang phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// shar sgo mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar gyi mtshams kyang de dang 'dra'o// steng
26b4(mdo): dang 'og gi phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag gi
26b5(mdo): mdab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag gi pha rol gi yang ches pha rol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog/ nga ka'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag
26b6(mdo): bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khamargya mtsho 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ga rab tu gso/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun
26b7(mdo): tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ shur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu shur 'ur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams ca
26b8(mdo): re re yang / shur phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dpa' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ byang shar gyi mtshams kyi phyogs
26b9(mdo): dma' na lho nub kyi mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ sgo nub kyi mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ byang shar gyi mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ shar sgo mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs mtho
30a1(mdo): nub byangs rnams kyi phyogs dma' na/ shar sgo ma rnams kyi phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho// dbus dpa' namatha' mtho bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil
30a2(mdo): 'khor gyi kun nas/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdus phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi
30a3(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams re re na/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re sa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gar 'aka'i klung lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
30a4(mdo): mtshor gnas par gyu rad te/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi stegs bu rin po ches spras pas ni bskor/ rin po che'i tsing cing gis ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng /
30a5(mdo): dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re ni bres/ tsan dan sbrul kyi snying pos ni byugs/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dri bas ni bka'/ rin po che mthon kha chen po ni myog ma ngas ris su
30a6(mdo): bres te/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i phyogs re re nas kyang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng ba kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang lnga na ba/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed grangs myed
30a7(mdo): ba dag 'byung ngo // rin po che'i rkyen 'phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed pa grangs myed pa dag 'phyang ngo // dar kyi lda ldi kha dog sna tshogs pa la
30a8(mdo): dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag 'phyang ngo // ras kyi lnga lnga kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed grangs myed
30a9(mdo): pa dag 'phyang ngo // dar gyi chun kor kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag 'phyang ngo // dril bu gser kha'i dra ba kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha
30b1(mdo): kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum zag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed pa/ grangs rtsed pa dag 'byung ngo // rin po che'i rgyan 'breng dang / mu tig gi rgyun 'breng de dag la/ rlung gis phog nas pa/ swA'i sgra yang du 'ong ba dag 'gyun
30b2(mdo): ste/ rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng dang / mu tig gi rgyar 'phreng rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ sil snyan gyi yan lag dpe myed pa 'bum phrag bye ba rdung ba'i slob dpon gis rdungs pa/
30b3(mdo): las kyang / de lta bu'i sgra snyan pa myi 'byung ngo // dril bu gser ka'i 'phreng ba rlung gis phog pa de dag las/ lha yul ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing zab pa 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ gser gi snod 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad tsam
30b4(mdo): brdungs pa las kyang / de lta bu'i sgra zab cing yid du 'ong ba myi 'byung ngo // myig mangs ris re re la yang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re yod de/ rin po che'i stegs bus ni bskor/ nor bu dang
30b5(mdo): mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas ni mdzes par byas/ kadu/ gas dang rgyal mtshan dang / bdun ni bsgreng / rin po che'i rgya 'a/ phreng gi rgya dpag tu myed pa/ grangs myed pas ni brgyan/
30b6(mdo): mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu myed pa/ grangs myed pas kyang brgya nang to// ras kyi lnga ldi'i rgyan dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dag dang / me tog gi lda ldi'i rgyan dpag tu myed grangs myed
30b7(mdo): pa dang / dril bu gser kha'i dra ba'i rgyun dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pas kyang brgya dang to// rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re'i drun/ rin po che'i seng ge'i khri dbang dpagra chad lnga brgya pa yod de/ rin po che'i myigs bus ni brlo/
30b8(mdo): nor bu dang mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba'i bla re ni bres/ can dan sbrul gyi snying pos ni byugs/ me
30b9(mdo): tog man nga ra dang / man da ra chen po dang / mam dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes pa dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / snga ma dang / ba ra she ki dang /
31a1(mdo): ta ru ni dang / bal li dang / ko ta ra ni dang / rab tu dri zhim dang / da ni ska ri dang / s+tha'i snga ma dang / ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / me tog chen po rnams ni bkram
31a2(mdo): nor bu rin po che klog gi sgron ma'i rgyan 'phreng gi dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dang / nor bu rin po che nyi zla'i sgron ma'i rgyar 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dang / nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyur
31a3(mdo): 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dang / nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i rgyan dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dang / nor bu rin po che ze ba can gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i ze ba can gi rgyan
31a4(mdo): 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che seng gi rgyal mtshan gi rgyan 'phro nga gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang
31a5(mdo): nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che pad ma ral gri'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che chu bdag gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che be du r+ya'i
31a6(mdo): rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po an da rnyil gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan kyis kyang brgya nad to// nor bu rin po che rdo'i snying po'i rkyen 'phreng gis kyang brgya nad to// nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i
31a7(mdo): rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gis kyang brgya nad to// nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rkyen kyis kyang brgya nad to/ mu tig dkar po'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan kyis kyang brgya nad to/ mu tig mthon ka'i rgyan 'phreng ki rgyan gyis
31a8(mdo): kyang brgya nad to// mu tig ser po'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan kyis kyang brgya nad to// mu tig dmar po'i rkyen 'phreng gi rgyan kyis kyang brgya nad to// mu tig kaser mdog gi rkyen kyis kyang brgya nad to// mu tig nam mkha'
31a9(mdo): mdog gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan kyis kyang brgya nad to// mu tig gi 'bru'i ngos re re dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i ngos re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la/ 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin dpag tu myed pa dang / grangs
31b1(mdo): myed pa dang / mtshungs pa myed pa dang / gzhal du myed pa dang / chang myed pa dag byung ngo // de la 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstanang pa brjod pa
31b2(mdo): rag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni pha rol tu phyi nad pa
31b3(mdo): tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i spron kha cig las ni tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sman
31b4(mdo): kha cig las ni/ gzungs pa dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad parabastand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin Shag las ni rnam par tha rad pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed po'i khyad
31b5(mdo): par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sman kha cig las ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho ngas myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od
31b6(mdo): gzer rgya mtsho sI ni kha cig las ni/ mngon par shes pa ba dang pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstanang pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i spo kha cig las ni smod lam tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs
31b7(mdo): myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa tha dad pa'i rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin
31b8(mdo): kha cig sas ni/ dbugs 'byind pa thob pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od ka zer rgya mtsho'i spod kha cig las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs
31b9(mdo): myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer
32a1(mdo): rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni 'jig rten
32a2(mdo): gi khams la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bskal pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa
32a3(mdo): rjod pa dag byung ngo // yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yol/ rab tu g.yo// kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeka/ rab tu sdig
32a4(mdo): kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// de nas 'jig rten
32a5(mdo): kyi khams rgya mtsho de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas/ kyang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga/ nga ka'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag
32a6(mdo): bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re'i 'khor yang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i/
32a7(mdo): bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig blangs myed pa snyed lpags so// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin gzungs rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa sbyor gsum
32a8(mdo): gi stong chen po'i bcu'i tshed tsam gri char gis chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang
32a9(mdo): lha'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i grangs myed pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gis/ chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas te
32b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor nga la/ mngon par rab tu gtorang to// gtor da cing mngon par gtor da la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lnga mgo bos phyag
32b2(mdo): 'tshal te/ lan grangs myed par bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'khod do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / shar lho'i mtshams dang /
32b3(mdo): lho nub kyi mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar gyi mtshams dang / steng dang 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag kyang / 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul
32b4(mdo): g.yol/ rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu gso/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ ku na tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu
32b5(mdo): 'brug/ 'u shug rab tu 'ur 'um/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// 'ji garten gyi khams de dag re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa/ 'a rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma
32b6(mdo): snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs rgya dpa snyed lpags so// byang chub sems dpa' re re'i 'khor pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
32b7(mdo): gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrag grangs myed pa snyed lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho tha dad
32b8(mdo): pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gis/ chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed la/ ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong ste
32b9(mdo): sngags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sprin so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs myed parjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i ched tsam gis de bzhin gshegs pa
33a1(mdo): gtor cing / mngon par gtor das/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor dus/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas la mgo thos phyag 'tshal date/
33a2(mdo): lan grangs myed par bskor ba byas nas/ rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'khod do// yang de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po re re dang
33a3(mdo): spu'i khung bu re re nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ka'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin
33a4(mdo): tu nyung kau de bas ches mang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag byung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang / lus 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i kase ra gyi mdog can gzi brjid nyi ma 'bum phrag bye ba phrag khrig grangs
33a5(mdo): myed pa bas lhag pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin da la rnam par che ba/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog yongs su grub par/ mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/ 'jig rten
33a6(mdo): gyi khams sangs rgyas myi bzhugs pa dag tu/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba stond pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pacan yongs su sbyong ba/ pad mo'i sman la 'khod pa sha stag go//
33a7(mdo): pad ma re re yang rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa/ sdong bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i ze ba can gser gyi mdab ma bkod pa shi nad tu rgyas po'i gzugs can 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi snying po dang ldan pa/
33a8(mdo): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis/ phyogs thams cad kyi sprin snang bar byed pa/ kun nas 'od gzer bkod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas po'i gsung brjod pa'i 'od gzer/ nor bu dang / mu tig/
33a9(mdo): dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'gyed pas mdzes par byas shing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba sha stag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'od gzer rgya mtsho 'bum
33b1(mdo): thAg bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa btang nas/ pad ma de dag las 'bas te/ lha'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / ba dan gi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / spos kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i sprin dang / ro
33b2(mdo): mo'i sgra'i sprin dang / rgyan ki sprin dang / seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gi rtse mo la sprin dang / kwa'i sil snyan dang / pheka rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprin chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed la ma 'dres pa// stong gsum gi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gI/
33b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gtor da cing mngon par gtor nga la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mngon par tor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ lan grangs myed par bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
33b4(mdo): la 'go bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan grangs myed par bskor ba byas te/ rab nga gi par pa'i stan la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i na 'du chud pa'i 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gi ma
33b5(mdo): dag nas byung ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu smyin par byas pa/ sha stag go// de nas 'khor de dag 'di ste du sems te/ de bzhin gshes
33b6(mdo): pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ ba dag cag gis mthong na ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongasu rtog pa thugs
33b7(mdo): kyis mkhyen nas/ gtsug tor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten ge khaMs ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer 'khor 'od gzer grangs myed pa dag dang byung ste/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi zhes rab 'bya
33b8(mdo): thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas so// sangs rgyas kyi rna par 'phrul pa thams cad kyang bstan te/ sems can ki khas mtha' yas pa/ yongasu sbyin par byas nas
33b9(mdo): yang phyir myi log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la// lan grangs myed par bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub ses dpa' de dag gi lus la phog pa gyur to// byang chub seMs dpa' de dag gi
34a1(mdo): lus la 'od gzer des chog ma thag tu yang de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu dang / gtsug tor dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i
34a2(mdo): khung bu re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ka'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrag grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi
34a3(mdo): de bas ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dka na/ mes 'jigs pa dang / chus 'jigs pa dang / rlung gis 'jigs pa dag mthong ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
34a4(mdo): rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sred pa'i che mor thug par ra bas bskor te/ rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo myed cing / lag
34a5(mdo): mthil ltar mnyam par gyur da nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul kyis gang ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu myes 'jigs pa/ dang / chus 'jigs pa dang / rlung gis 'jigs par mthong
34a6(mdo): ba de dag ni/ ra ba de'i nang gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig lta bur ba lta bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag las/ 'jig rte na gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas po ni/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul lhag ma
34a7(mdo): ji snyed yod pa tsam du blta bar bya'o// de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che skar 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma las grub
34a8(mdo): pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla'i sgron ma las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig
34a9(mdo): rten gyi khams rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che ze ba can las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams pa la ni
34b1(mdo): nor bu rin po che seng ge'i che ba las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la la nI/ nor bu rin mo ches gdang rtse mo las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che brgya byir thogs pa
34b2(mdo): las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten
34b3(mdo): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che pad ma rak+Sha las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lo naM nor bu rin po che chu bdag las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lo ni yid bzhin
34b4(mdo): gya nor bu rin po che las grub pa yan no// 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che bye dUr+ya las grub pa yi no// 'jig rten gyi khams la la ni nor bu rin po che an da rnyil las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gya khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che mthon kha chen
34b5(mdo): bo las grub po yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos la ni nor bu rin po che rdo'i snyi po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos la ni/ nor bu rin po che dpal kyi snying po las
34b6(mdo): grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod las grub po yin no// 'jig rten gyi kham sa rgya mtsho la la ni mu tika dkar po las grub pa yin no// 'jig
34b7(mdo): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig gser mdog las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni mu tig nam mkha' mdog las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin
34b8(mdo): po che bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan/
34b9(mdo): ba brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos la ni nor bu rin po che pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs myed po'i khyad par bstan ba brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la sa ni
36a1(mdo): cad byang bdun 'dod papa // 'an kyi# da bun zungs rgyam tshom sa byed pa'i byang pa
36a2(mdo): za brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos la ni nor bu ri po me rnam par thard pa rgyam mo blangs myed pa'i khyad par bstanang ba brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtshos la ni
36a3(mdo): nor bu rin po che so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par
36a4(mdo): bskur ba brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che smon lam rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstad 'arjo pa pa grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
36a5(mdo): la la ni nor bu rin po che brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs rtsedapa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'dzi/ garten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dbugs
36a6(mdo): 'byind thob pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho
36a7(mdo): grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod
36a8(mdo): pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che mes can gi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi
36a9(mdo): khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che/
36b1(mdo): thamasang pas 'jug pa rgyam co blangs byed pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo re re la 'di bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'ang thas
36b2(mdo): thams cad kyi rdul snyed du sna tshogs su gnas pa dag snang ngo // zhing re re na yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis myi khyab pa dag sdang bar gyur te/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi kha dog tu gnas pa
36b3(mdo): dag snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa dang / byang chub sems
36b4(mdo): rapa'i spyod pa slob tu bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ byang
36b5(mdo): chub tu sems bskyed tu bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a/ ngas gang yin pa de dag kyang snang ngo // de bzhin du sangs rgyas/ gcig nas cig tu brgyud pa phyi mo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du
36b6(mdo): bstand kyang / sangs rgyas cig nas cig tu brgyud pa de dag gi mtha' bstand par myi nus so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re la yang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dpag tu myed
36b7(mdo): grangs myed pa dag snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstand pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon
36b8(mdo): par rdzogs par byang chub pa sang snang ngo // de drug gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyis 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub kyi spyod pa rgya masonam pa sna tshogs bdan/
36b9(mdo): pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dag kyang snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi kyis 'kho
37a1(mdo): dpag tu myed pa grangs myed pa dag kyang snang ngo // de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag kyang snang zhing thos so// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
37a2(mdo): ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du bstand kyang mthar phyi nad par myi 'gyur ro//
37a3(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sku dang ye shes chags pa myed pa brnyes pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas
37a4(mdo): mos par byed cing / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang 'dond tu 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / gdug pa dang / sngo sa dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang
37a5(mdo): chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la stsogs pas mchod pa de dag gi bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phe/ la bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
37a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thug sa kyis mkhyend nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal da pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams
37a7(mdo): rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi dul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shi nang tu nyung gi/ de bas ches mang ba'i byang chub
37a8(mdo): sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyind pa lnga las byung ba/ bskalang pa dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa'i bar du bskyed pa yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpas
37a9(mdo): za na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa la chad ke tsam yongs su btang ba sa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyi nad pa lnga las byung ba de zil kyis non par 'gyur ro// 'jam
37b1(mdo): dpal dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga'i nam phyed kyi dus na zla bi dkyil 'khor gis 'di ltar mtho ba dang / mtshungs pa myed pa dang / che bas skar ma'i 'khor thams cad zil kyis nond te/ lham me lhan ne/
37b2(mdo): lhang nger 'dug go// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dge ba'i sde pa mthong ba dang / mtshungs pa myed pa dang / che bas byang chub sems dpa'
37b3(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyind pa lnga las byung ba rnams zil kyis gnon te/ l+h+wam me ldan ne/ sbrang nger 'dug go// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'
37b4(mdo): gang la las/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbyug pas bsnu nad tam mtshon kyis btab ste/ bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/
37b5(mdo): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ brnyas pa'i
37b6(mdo): sems kyang bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang po 'phe la bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa gnod sems dang /
37b7(mdo): ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pas ni/ chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas par 'gyur te/ chos ma yin pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// chos ma yin pa
37b8(mdo): yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung gcod par byed pa yin no// sangs rgyas rnams ma byung na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i sgo'i ris rnams 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /
37b9(mdo): 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang / bdud kyi ris rnams kyang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang / tshangs
38a1(mdo): pa dang / 'jig rten skyong thams cad kyang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad kyang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyang
38a2(mdo): 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// myi'i 'jig rten yang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang 'phrad pa las 'byung ba la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas
38a3(mdo): ni byang chub sems dpa' las 'byung ba'i phyir ro// de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'dod pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
38a4(mdo): mchod par byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur sti byas na sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur sti byas par 'gyur ro// 'jam
38a5(mdo): dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/ sangs rgyas bco/ ma ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed la/ lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang lha'i ni bza' phul te/
38a6(mdo): sbyin pa de lta bu bskal pa rgya mtsho gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du phul la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni/ byang chub sems
38a7(mdo): dpa' la dmyigs pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bdug pa las dmyigs pa 'am/ mar me las dmyigs pa 'am/ me tog las dmyigs pa 'am/ spos las dmyigs
38a8(mdo): pa 'am/ gzhan yang gang yang rung ba zhig las dmyigs te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni// de bas ches grangs myed par bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur na/ gzhan skyed du 'jug pa gang yin
38a9(mdo): bdags ci gros te/ 'din de bas bsod nams ches grangs myed par skyed par 'gyur ro// mA ma des ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i 'di'i brgya'i char yang kyi bong/ slong ga changs bamyi 'o/
38b1(mdo): 'bum gi char yang myi phod / bye ba'i char yang myi phod/ bye ba brgya'i char yang mya phod/ bye ba stong gi cher yang myi phod/ bye ba 'bum gi char yang myi phod de/ dpe' dang rgyur yang myi bzod do// 'jam dpal/
38b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig ni stong pa nyid la mos par gyur pa na/ 'di ni de bas ches grangs myed par bsod
38b3(mdo): nams 'phel bar gyur da na/ gzhan mos pa bskyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches grangs myed par skyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma de ni/ bsod
38b4(mdo): nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i brgya'i char yang myi bod/ stong gi char yang myi bor/ 'bum gyi char yang myi phor/ bye ba'i char yang myi phod/ bye ba brgya'i char yang myi phor/ bye ba stong gi char yang myi phor/
38b5(mdo): bye ba 'bum gi char yang myi phod/ dpe dang rgyur yang myi bzo/ da do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las byang/ chub sems dpa'i zan bcad dam/ khros te tha na byang chub sems
38b6(mdo): dpa' glang po cher skyes pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa gcig bcad la/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems da pa'i gzhan zhig gis ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / don
38b7(mdo): kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi zan
38b8(mdo): bcad de khros nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos myed par byas la/ sems can thams cad long bar byas na/ myi dge ba'i las 'di ni snga ma'i myi dge ba de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar myi phod pa nas/ dpe'i/
38b9(mdo): bar du yang myi bzod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen pa de dag dang / sga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
39a1(mdo): dri za dang / sgyu ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams dang / phyogs/
39a2(mdo): tha dad pa nas lpags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho grangs myed/ tshad myed pa rnams yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// mdo'i rgyal po chen po sprin
39a3(mdo): chen po'i le'u re re la/ chos snang ba'i sgo stong phrag gang ga'i klung grangs myed pa'i bye ma snyed yang dag par 'du ba snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gi dpal gyi glog gis gsal bar bya ba'i le'u chen po'i tshogs
39a4(mdo): mtha' yas pa/ gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed las/ dang / 'a ldan na gnas pa las stsogs pa/ 'jig rten grangs myed pa dang / mthun par 'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthu las
39a5(mdo): byung bas dbang byed cing / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems / dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' stond chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste// // sum bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs s+ho//
39a6(mdo): rgya gar skang du/ a r+ya ma hU me kA be ta ma na Na li sar rban kA hId yan na ma ma hA sa na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa smin chen po rlung gi gyi la kyi macad kyi snying po zhes bya ba
39a7(mdo): theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na/ nor bu rin po
39a8(mdo): che'i ci mo caran gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na/ klu song du chang ba kru'i tshogs cher po klu thams cad rdzu 'phrul che zhing klu'i 'khor chen po dang ldan pasha stag la/ 'di ste ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / klu'i
39b1(mdo): rgyal po nye dka' dang / klu'i rgyal po yang dag skul dang / klu'i rgyal po grog 'phreng can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po ka zi can chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po btang zung dang / klu'i rgyal po dung dang / klu'i rgyal
39b2(mdo): po e la 'dab dang / klu'i rgyal po mtshas bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug pud can dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rnam par 'phrul dang / klu'i rgyal
39b3(mdo): po sprin rgyas byed dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po skar mda' gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po dus myin sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug skad dang / klu'i rgyal po glog
39b4(mdo): rab tu gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma myang dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug chen sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od
39b5(mdo): chen lam lam dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po mdongos bu dang / klu/ 'i rgyal po dpal 'dzind dang / klu'i rgyal po rnga sma dang / klu'i
39b6(mdo): rgyal po rnga sgra rnam par spogs pa'i skad dang / klu'i rgyal po la bdang / klu'i rgyal po 'dren byed dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po sha sho'i
39b7(mdo): sgra chen dang / klu'i rgyal po dang dang sma dang / klu'i rgyal po rab 'jom dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung chen rnam par 'phrul dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung rab tu gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog
39b8(mdo): po dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang / klu'i rgyal po smad dkrigs bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po bkra shis dag su tshul lo na rgya byed dag ku rgyal po sprin kyis dag khyed dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin gis 'gebs pa'i rigs dang / klu'i rgyal po
39b9(mdo): legs par 'gebs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam par rtse dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po mthong dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po don
40a1(mdo): yod dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyis legs par 'gebs dang / klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis kyi thub pa dang / klu'i rgyal po sIn las chu 'byind dang / klu'i rgyal po bde mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung
40a2(mdo): 'byung dang / klu'i rgyas po smid 'khrug par byed dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po stong dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams
40a3(mdo): cang k+ShAng klu'i rdzu 'brus cher po dang / klu'i rnam par 'thus pa chen thos rnamam lam ma dza ma sgonam shing / drim mchen po rab tu 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'das pa mri shu bya ba dang / chos mnyand pa'i phyir skrag sa
40a4(mdo): kye klu chen po dang / klu dag tshur sheg/ mu lu mu lu/ tsa Ta tsan+da/ pa Ta phaT/ ma Ta ma Ta/ hA hA/ glog 'bar ba rab tu phyung zhing / rdzi char chen po'i rgyun thong la char pho bshig/ kye kye klu chen po dag
40a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dran par gyi shig/ dran par gyi shig/ kye klu chen po dag tshur sheg/ tshur sheg/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/
40a6(mdo): kuN+ya gu r+b+ya/ mur+d+ham+bu N+ya/ hI si/ hi hai/ tsu Na rbu Da/ ma hA na kA rgi da ya/ sarba na ka na/ a kad/ san cod sa/ shIH/ na da ra swa hA/ sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan bkod
40a7(mdo): bdag giser lAm kr-i mtha' rin po me thams cad kyi lA m+b+hi mdzes pa/ mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng rab tu 'phyang ba/ rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / gA'i rin po ches mdzes par byas pa'i gzhal byed khang me tog rab tu
40a8(mdo): 'phyang ba/ rgya ma che chen po'i sprin dag gis/ nam mkho'i dkyis kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlobs la/ rin po che'i sprin rab tu 'phyang zhing / sgo'i ras bcos bu mang po dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin
40a9(mdo): dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo sna tshogs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sna spogs pa/ rgya mche'i sprin dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan kyi rgyan bkod pa thams kyis kyi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs/
40b1(mdo): yang dag par stond pa'i rin po che bkor pa chen po'i rgya mtsho'i sprin dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khyebs par byin gyis rlob ste/ sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin drag dang / rin po che sna tshog
40b2(mdo): kyi lha'i zla re dril bu'i sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / bya'i tshogs thams cad skad 'byind cing me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa// rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / rgya mtsho'i sprin chen po'i sgra chen
40b3(mdo): spogs shing / lha'i rin po che rab tu 'phyang la/ mu tig gi lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'byung ba/ rgya mtsho'i sprini dag dang / gser skud kyis brgya nang po'i snang ba chen po can gyi rtse mos nam mkha' kun tu khyebs
40b4(mdo): par byed pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'a phreng ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gis nam mkha' kun tu khebs par byed pa la mkhas pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / snang ba dang ldan
40b5(mdo): ba'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgras kun tu khyebs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis nam mkha' mngon par khyebs par gyis shig/ klu dang klu'i rgyal po thams cad chur sheg/ sa'i steng 'dir
40b6(mdo): 'brug sgra sgrogs shig/ char po ba shig/ char rab tu pho / kA/ char kun tu rab tu pho bshig/ dri ro ro ri sgrogs shig/ slosachen po'i du rdzun tu phyung shig/ 'du shing kun tu 'du la/ tog/
40b7(mdo): yar dang rir zhing 'dug ste/ klu'i sad chen po yid du 'ong ba'i sgra chen po 'byin cing / dbyangs chen po rab tu sgrogs pa dag/ 'dzam bu'i gling du char rab tu po bshig/ kA Da kA/ / kun+ya guH

41a1(mdo): char pho ba shig/ ku N+ya ku N+ya/ pa Na paH/ gag/ me he// klu chen po dag 'dus shig/ sa'i steng du char rab tu phob shig/ kU ru kU ru/ ki ri ki ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ di ri di ri/ ki li ki li
41a2(mdo): zhing thams cad yongs su gang bar gyis shika/ 'bru dang shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman thams cad rab tu skye bar gis shig/ byams pa'i sems kyis tshur sheg/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /
41a3(mdo): chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / lag na rdo rje'i bden pa dang / klu thams cad kyi bden pas/ gru chen po dag chur zhe gtsung shegs kra/ klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu sa yang dag par skul lo// sangs
41a4(mdo): rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pho bshig/ swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par sprul lo/ chos kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phobashig/
41a5(mdo): sa hA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la yang dag par skul lo// 8/ ge 'dun gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phoT shig/ swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang
41a6(mdo): dag par sprul lo// yug na rdo rje'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i rma 'dir char rab tu po bzhig/ swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog pos yang dag par skul lo// tshangs pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i
41a7(mdo): ming 'di mchar rab tu pho bshig/ swA hA// klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin la yang dag par skul lo// dbang po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu po bya shig/ 5hA/ rgyu'i rgyas po sa srung ki bu la swa
41a8(mdo): dag par smral so// byab 'jug gi bden pas 'jam bu gling 'dir chang rab tu po ci zhin nan+da/ klu'i rgyal po 'phreng ba can sa yang dag par sprul so// drag po'i bden pas 'ang ma bu'i gling 'di ma char rab tu por
41a9(mdo): shig ma hA/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can la yang dag par skul lo// drang srong gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu po bshig/ pra gA/ u po skraka 'bros byed la yang dag par skul so// lha'i bden
41b1(mdo): bas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ swa hA/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can chen po la yang dag par skul lo// klu thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pho ba shika/ swa hA/ klu'i rgyal po rab
41b2(mdo): 'jom la yang dag par skul lo// gnod sbyin gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ swa hA/ klu'i rgyal po ma 'dres pa la yang dag par skul lo// srin po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gli pi 'dir
41b3(mdo): char rab tu phob shig/ swa hA/ klu gong ma gong ma thams cad kyi bden pas char phob shig/ char pho ba shi ka/ ma 'phyi bar tshur sheg tshur sheg/ kye kye klu chen po dag klu thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par skul lo// kun nas
41b4(mdo): drang ngo // sa ra sa ra/ ha ha/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ hA hA/ hI hI/ hi hi hau hau/ e h+ye hI/ tha tha tha/ tsa tsa tsa/ ra ta/ zhing thams cad kun tu gang bar gyis shig/ 'bru thams cad kyi char pho ba shig/ rlung chen po rab tu thong shig/
41b5(mdo): d+hum drum/ kU gU / pum pum/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ ni b+ha ra Ni/ stam bA ni/ mo hA ni/ dzang gung li bu ka si/ pra hA Ne/ ma tangaki/ dza ye bi rdza ye/ hA hA sA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa smin
41b6(mdo): chen snying po dpal gi gzi brjid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spri na chen rab 'joms dang / de bzhin gshegs sprin chen 'byung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs
41b7(mdo): ba sprin chen kun tu 'gebs dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgrogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprina' chen rgyas mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen rnam par sgrogs pa'i sgo'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs
41b8(mdo): pa sprin chen 'jig mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen srung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rnga sA dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug cher sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal kyi gzi brjid dang / de
41b9(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbyangs snyand dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen skar ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen chub ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen shi nad tu brtan pa'i rgyal po dang /
42a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa stod cen min brtan pas dga' bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin cher 'ur 'ur nA dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin cher 'jigs pas 'jigs mdzad dang / de bzhin gshes
42a2(mdo): ba sprin chen thog thog rab 'bebs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa smim chen rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin cher bkra shis kyi cheng dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rnabs dang / byang
42a3(mdo): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po sprin chen snying po thams cad la yang dag par skul lo// klu thams cad kyi bden pas/ klu thams cad kyi snying po la yang
42a4(mdo): dag par skul lo// dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' lung gis myur du shog shig/ kye kye klu dang / klu chen po dag tshur sheg tshurashag/ su lu hu lu/ su ru su ru/ rA bA d+ha bA/ kA ra kA/
42a5(mdo): pU ru b+hu ru/ ma 'phyi bar sangs rgyas kyi bden pas tshur sheg/ chos kyi bden pas tshur sheg/ dge 'dun gyi bden pas tshur sheg/ klu thams cad dang / klu chen po gong ma dag gi bden pas
42a6(mdo): 'dzam bu'i klong du char pho ba shika/ a la la zhes kar byed cing / a la la zhes klu len pa dang / a la la zhes klu'i rnam par 'phel bachen po byed cing 'dul char kyi rgyun chen po 'bebs shing / kru
42a7(mdo): chen po rnams kyi chos kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba dag/ ku su ku su na gen ge/ tsa taHta/ na ka~M ni/ 4/ si~M/ dke nA ki ni/ na shes man kA bi kham bA ni/ ma ra ni/ sa re/ ra Ni t+ta re/ tA ra ta ra/ tA re ga kyis
42a8(mdo): !)/ bi m-i te dang / !/ thA ya nA ke/ a ka // a kang // ma thi lam pa pa/ shing drung d+hA ye/ kor su ya~M/ kaM se maka sa ka dza~M te/ sa rba me ga bi kun ni/ man cad ne/ sa mak+She rnams mu ra ni/
42a9(mdo): cas me cag ma bzhi/ maur ni ri de gi'i gi/ sgra skar/ kaM mi ka mi sangag sa/ mi 'angs pa the yig ya rje/ mdags ka hr-i lus / rang me ngasa'i su
42b1(mdo): bang dri ti 'dred/ bang dza ba Ni/ ka la sho rI/ na ka ru bi ni/ su ru n+te/ rno gi b+ho ki/ ma sh+lo ga/ zlo ka nu pa ta yA ba le/ bak+Sha Ni/ sa rba nA ga sa maH ri swA hA// chos smra bas/ thog sa lo nar srung ba'i cho ga byas pa/
42b2(mdo): chos gos kyi grwar lan bdun bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa bor nas/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba 'di zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgyun ma chad par klag par bya'o//
42b3(mdo): shar phyogs su ni ba la gi l+r-i bas klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa zhes bya ba 'khor du ma 'ib bya'o// sgo phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po rab tu rgyas byed ces bya ba mgo lnga pa lad+mo dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po
42b4(mdo): snang ldan gtsug pud can zhes bya ba mgo bdun pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po spu ni sbrul zhes bya ba mgo dgu pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// za re dang gos
42b5(mdo): sngon po dang / rgyal mtshan sngon po dang / lha bshos thams cadakyang sngon por bya'o// klu rnams la dbab pa ni mngar gsum gi/ sa bya'o// mngar gsum gi bkar lugs bdun yang klu'i snying
42b6(mdo): pos sbyin bsreg bya'o// sIn gyi rgyal po rnams kyang bris te/ cha rad kyi rgyun 'bebs la/ phan tshun thug cing mthar klog 'gyu ra bya'o// 'dir dbab pa ni khur ba bkra shis ldan dang / sen
42b7(mdo): tse dang / sha dang / nya sha dang / sbrang ci las byas pa'i zas mchog tu rgyas par bya'o// de nas chos smra ba gtsang zhing kos gtsang ma bgos pas/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po klag par bya'o//
42b8(mdo): de nas klu rnams dang po'i nyon mo nas brtsams te/ di ri rir sma spogs par byed cing / sma yid du 'ong ba dag 'byind par 'gyur te/ le'u 'di la the tsom dang / brnyas par myi bya'o// kas te rgya mtsho dus chod las
42b9(mdo): sgrol na/ 'di yang char las yol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal kyi snying po brtsegs pa'i rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyas pos
43a1(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/
43a2(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de
43a3(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin kun tu ston da la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin 'dzag la
43a4(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin rnam par rgyas ma dzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
43a5(mdo): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyis/ na lag mdzes su phyag 'tshal so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
43a6(mdo): rgyas smin lta bu'i rnabaza' ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzon sa pa'i sangs rgyas srid kyis 'bru sman la phyag 'tshal so//
43a7(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin kyi 'phreng ba can la phyag 'tshal so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas srin
43a8(mdo): ra ba phyag // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin kyi dbang zugs kyan 'as so// la ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
43a9(mdo): xxx
43b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin kyis byin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug
43b2(mdo): sma rnam par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gi chu la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
43b3(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug nges par bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
43b4(mdo): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad la bde legs su gyurd cig/ 'byung po thams cad la byams par gyurapa cig/ dud 'gror gyur pa thams cad 'jigs pa myed par gyurapa/
43b5(mdo): cig/ ngan 'gro thams cad zhi bar gyu da cig/ sgrib pa thams/ cad rnam par se lad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ thams cad kyi cho ga/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pA
43b6(mdo): cho ga 'di grub par gyur da cig/ tad d+ya thA/ su Ta su Ta/ sUHsU Ta s+phu Ta su Ta sU Ta swA hA// char myi 'bebs pa'i tshe dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la
43b7(mdo): zhig gis mgo bkrus te/ gos rtsang ma bkros pa/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag yi ger bris nas/ gdan gtsang ma la bzhag ste/ pog por bdun gis nam
43b8(mdo): mkha' la gyen du 'dug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams la yan lnga bcu'i bar du brjod la/ mchod pa chen po byas te/ zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun ma chad par byas na/ char pa 'bab par 'gyur ro//
43b9(mdo): 'phags pa smi po dru shi dkyis 'khor gi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i medo// rdzogs s+ho//
44a1(mdo): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang / su len tra po de dang / zhu chen kyi lo tsa ba pa na de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
44a2(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ An+ya ma hA mA ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshas so// 'di skad bdag gis thos
44a3(mdo): pa dus cig na bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dka'i gnas na/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po sprin kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang
44a4(mdo): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i chog/ sa chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dka' dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / gzi can dang / chu sgra dang / 'jog
44a5(mdo): po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po btang zung dang / sa srung gi bu dang / pro rnga dang / dpal kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal bzangs dang / klog gi 'phreng ba dang /
44a6(mdo): gtsug ma nor bu chen po dang / gtsug na nor bu thogs dang / nga ldan gtsug pud dang / gtsug phud 'jal can dang / klu'i rgyal lo ba mo'i rgyas mtshan dang / dab po'i mchod sdong dang / 'jam du ni
44a7(mdo): rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis ldan dang / dkyil 'khor chen po can dang / lag gis 'gro chen po dang / skar mdog dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpas kyi blo gros dang / zla mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po sems
44a8(mdo): mthong dang / shi nang tu btan dang / mgul na nor bu dang / sprin phyung dang / char rgyun dang / rab 'jom dang / rnam par 'jom dang / mthu bsgyings dang / gdengs ka chen po dang / dbyangs za ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen
44a9(mdo): rdzogs dang / rnam par smra 'byi nga dang / yu pas dang / yin dang / na sa mngar 'dzin dang / 'chogs sde dang / dgas pa chen po dang / klu'i rgyas som pa'i 'das pa dang / thun tu gang dang / matsub dang / du
44b1(mdo): dang / dar dAr dang / klu'i rgyal po srung pa dang dang bde byed dang / lag 'gro dang / lag 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur sding dang / sog ma myed dang / 'phyang ba dang / srin bu gnas dang / nag po dang / klu'i
44b2(mdo): rgyal po dbang sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i 'dam bu dang / dung thogs dang / 'gro lding dang / rab mdzes dang / glang chen rna dang / rnon po dang / ser skya dang / klog 'bar dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs lha dang /
44b3(mdo): chu stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po dam 'gebs dang / bdud rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / be dur+ya'i 'od can dang / gser mdog skra dang / gser 'od dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / gnyi 'od dang / 'char pa dang /
44b4(mdo): bal yang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang / nag po dang / gshi na rje dang / dge tshul dang / sbal pa dang / ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang mu khyud 'dzind dang / sa 'dzind dang / mgo stong can dang
44b5(mdo): gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong dang / sprin \u0f7f/ na dang / sde bzangs dang / sa skyong dang / myis byin dang / rnam par 'dul dang / rga ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum bI ra dang / chu
44b6(mdo): srin kum bi ra'i mdongs dang / dug 'dzind dang / klu'i rgyal po myur gdug dang / pad ma ka dang / mjug ma dang / rab 'phyang dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga pa dang /
44b7(mdo): bas si ra dang / shidwa tas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug rings dang / mgo bo che dang / bim bi ka dang / bi Na ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / gzi chen dang
44b8(mdo): 'dabu byin dang / klu'i rgyas po sdug byed dang / 'od 'bar dang / mgo bdun pa dang / sdong chen dang / mthong na dang / rab tu cher gtum dang / dri myed gzi brjid dang / rtsig bzangs dang / drag po chen po dang / 'od 'gro
44b9(mdo): phung po dang / su kyil po rgyam chen dang / 'thokho mas su pam dang / 'a ci tu gyi dang / maphyi 'a ce dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / ga pa 'byung dang / nyin dang nyin dang / na rna nga/
45a1(mdo): 'i 'ju phyug dang / nyon na po na dang / na ming po dang / dang / rangs kyi mang po dang / nyin mthum dang / mtshan ma 'dzin dang / chu sbyin
45a2(mdo): cu sbyin cher po dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid na dra dang / gling gi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / zho phyeng dang / sa'i bum pa dang / klu dbas dang / chu 'dzin dang / srin gdugs dang / ing sa ra'i gdong dang / gzi marjid
45a3(mdo): can dang / nyirnam pa mdzongon thung dang / klu'i rgyas po gom skams mtha' mas dang / byad mdzes dang / yum chen dang / phung sgo dang / ni ba dang / dpa' ba dang / gsor ngan can dang / mchog tu brtson dang / dug chag

45a6(mdo): 'khor pa dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe klu'i rgyapo chen po de dag 'khor dang bcas te/ stan las langs nas bla na sa phrag pa gcig tu gza rad te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ska ngas
45a7(mdo): sa btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud nas/ bla ma la gus pa dang / phu dud chen po byed pas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
45a8(mdo): ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lnga sde dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / mis snyan du dang / pheg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i sde ldi dang /
45a9(mdo): mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu myed/ grangs byed pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'du'o/
45b1(mdo): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam btab pa/ lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams
45b2(mdo): cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sa dang / chu dang / mye dang / rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las
45b3(mdo): rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa grangs myed dpag tu myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa las
45b4(mdo): yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag pa rgya ma tsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun tu mngon par phyogs pa dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dag byin kyis rlabs nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul kyi cha
45b5(mdo): re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun kyi/ gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sangs rgya/ sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o//
45b6(mdo): snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dre sa pa dpag tu myed/ grangs myed bsam gyis myi khyab gzhal du mye da tshad myed brjod du myed pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu
45b7(mdo): khyabs par byin kyis rlabs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / 'od gzer stug po dang / nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi
45b8(mdo): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'phreng ba dang / me tog gi rgya mtsho sden rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya macwo sprin rnams dang
45b9(mdo): kyis dang / zhing rjon pa mams cad kyi mdzod rgyamatsho rnams dang / chos dang / gdug pa mams cad kyi gzugs kun du so dpa rgya mtsho ni rnams dang / rnamasas par rlogs pa'i sa po'i rgyamaso
46a1(mdo): rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlabs nas/ de la stsogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu myed grangs myed/
46a2(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab/ gzhal du myed/ tshad myed/ brjod du myed pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o/
46a3(mdo): yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas po'i snying po can gi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khyebs par byin kyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
46a4(mdo): rgya mtsho thams cad la spyi stang du bya'o// za mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// thams cad kun tu snang ba'i rin po che 'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
46a5(mdo): rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa sangs rgyas la nges par gyur dwa pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya ma cho sprin rnams dang / kun tu skam 'gengs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
46a6(mdo): chos thams cad kyi byang brgya no bu'i rgyal po rgyamatsho gA rnams dang / kun nas rlo nim mo 'od gzer gyis sangs rgyas kyi smras spang bar byed pa rgyam tsho sbyin rnams dang / 'khor kyi dkyis 'khor
