181b3(mdo): sdig pa'i las rnams myed par rab 'gyur gis// 'jig rten mgon po pa la yid ni myur du dad par byos// khyod ni rtag tu 'di ni gnod par bya bar rab sems kyang // khyod dgrol phyir ni nga snying rtag tu byams pas rab
181b4(mdo): tu dang // sdig pa'i blo gros 'or la dad bcas yid la byos shig dang // ring por myi thogs khyod ni byang chub tu yang lung bstan ra to// de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das la rab tu khros te/
181b5(mdo): 'khrugs shing rngam nas de nas slar 'gro ba 'dod pa dang bdag/ gaM mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings pa snyam du shes te// 'jig/ sa skrag pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod kyang // de ma nus nas bcom
181b6(mdo): ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i phyir rang khros pa'i mthus shi nad tu tsha bo'i dbugs btang ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyugs te shind tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog mngon par sprul da te/ phyogs bcu'i
181b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'chol bzhes te// chos kyang ston pa de thams cad kyi dbu gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi bar snang so shi nang tu yid tu 'ong ba'i gdum
181b8(mdo): byin kyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gsol ba// me tog gi gdugs 'di dag
181b9(mdo): ga las mches/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mye mjed ces bya ba
182a1(mdo): yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba yod de/ rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gi smon lam
182a2(mdo): gis// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ston te// de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar bdud kyi yul gi stobs thams cad rab tu 'jom par byed pa/ stobs dang
182a3(mdo): gyi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mthon por byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang / dkon mchog gsum gi smon ma ring du gnas par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
182a4(mdo): cad rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs byed pa/ dgra dang pas kyi rgol pa thams cad shinang tu ra gcod par byed pa/ ngo mtshar dang dgra kyi shis pa dang
182a5(mdo): thod pa dang myi la ma ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / mu ke/ dang / 'jigs pa'i tshogs 'thab pa dang / 'ged pa dang / 'ching ba dang / zab mo dang / chod pa dang / char myi 'bab pa
182a6(mdo): dang / dus ma yin par grang zhing tsha ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang nad dang / sku mye snyan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ wA daklu dang gnod sbyin dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun
182a7(mdo): bar byed pa/ rgyas rigs thams car 'dun par byed cing 'gug pa/ rigs pa'i thams cad chos kyi dor la 'jud pa/ shes rab kyi smon ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa/ sam drang po rab tu ston ba/ khyim dang
182a8(mdo): grob mod khyer dang / rmong padang / ngos dang / sas dang / zang la da/ pa 'dun pa da rgyun dang/
182a9(mdo): babyed dang / dus dang po thams cad 'thun par byed pa/ me tog dang / me tog dang / 'bram bu dang / babru dang / sman thams cad grub par byed pa/ bzod pa dngasas kyi mtha' dang / gnas de sbyin ni/
182b1(mdo): rlabs dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ rigs dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / bzod/
182b2(mdo): ba dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa myed pa'i snang bas rab tu sad par byed pa/ 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul byin gyis rlobs pa/ theg pa chen po stond par byed
182b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams chen por 'phel bar byed pa/ sems can chen po nas dbugs 'byind pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa/ sa bcu la yang dag par 'dzud par byed pa dang /
182b4(mdo): myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ khong du chud par byed pa/ dbang bskur ba'i chos dang / byang chub la 'jog par byed pa/ gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzind pa/ chos kyi
182b5(mdo): 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyind pa la la// dzud pa/ bla na myed pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par
182b6(mdo): byed pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi ros sems can rnams la tshim par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bdud bzhi'i
182b7(mdo): yul las rab tu tha rad par byed pa/ phung po lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jog par byed pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i
182b8(mdo): gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbe' ba la 'jug pa/ lung bstan pa 'chad par bzhed do// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
182b9(mdo): kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu'i brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so// byin gyis brlabs so//
183a1(mdo): gtsigs gcig rjes su dgos so// da ltar phyogs btsun/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas com ldan 'das de drag rna pa/
183a2(mdo): cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i snying pos sus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye bas 'jug pa/ lung bstan pa gsung ngo // byin gyis rlob bo// gcig la gcig rje
183a3(mdo): dges par mdzad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag
183a4(mdo): kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan du po'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro//
183a5(mdo): byin kyis rlob par 'gyur ro// gcig la gcig dgyes pa ma dzad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing de dag nA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
183a6(mdo): yod pa de dag gis so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ka la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon ma thos po'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos
183a7(mdo): yus 'jom pa zhes pa kyi ban+de kuzungs phyag rgya dang cig rab tu dbye bas 'jug pa/ yung bsta dang ba kAng 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa 'di sngar+ya sngon tan pamam gyis kyi khyab pa'i dang ldan pa/ chos pa/
183a8(mdo): cad la sgrib pa ma mchis po'i ye shes snang ba bkyed pa nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang
183a9(mdo): tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan dpa bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'jom par 'gyed pa nas/ phung po'i lhag ma bachis pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las
183b1(mdo): 'das pa'i bar du bgyid pa de/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi don dang sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du
183b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang 'jig rten gi
183b3(mdo): khams myi mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang la bzhugs pa der dong ngo // da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan
183b4(mdo): ngag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tshol ba zhes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga/ sa kyis bskord cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas
183b5(mdo): mdun du badrar nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed du// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang la bzhugs pa der gshegs
183b6(mdo): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de dang lhan cig tu sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ngan par spyod pa'i las la bzlog pa dang / bzang ba'i spyod pa rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang
183b7(mdo): bla na myed pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan
183b8(mdo): pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ gcig sa ka tsig rjes su dkris par mdzad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed du 'dus nas/
183b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskord cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bltas te/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu
184a1(mdo): dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstand pa 'chad par 'gyur gis/ khyed cag las chos gang mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtend pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu
184a2(mdo): dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstand pa mnyam pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chad myed grangs myed pa/ gang 'gro'i klung gi bye ma snyed dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mchod pa
184a3(mdo): bya ba dang / chos de yang nyand pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang lha'i yul dang / bdud kyi yul thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bkod pa de dag la blta ba dang / sangs
184a4(mdo): rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma thos ma mthong ba ltar 'dod pa de dag dang / da ded lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
184a5(mdo): shag kya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo // de nas sangs// rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag lu/ byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol du to//
184a6(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs re chad pa ra gal te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing / sangs rgyas com ldan 'das de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems
184a7(mdo): dpa' chen po// ji skar tshogs pa de dag sa sang daphyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mchong ba dang / chos mnyan par rngo thog par ldan/ de bzhin du 'dag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / thabs
184a8(mdo): kotsig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga lA ba der chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten po'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag
184a9(mdo): rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/ lung bstand pa mnyan po'i srad du mchis te/ de bdag cag gis dus gcig tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad myed grangs byed
184b1(mdo): zhig bzhugs shing 'chol ba zhes pa rnams la mchod par bgyi'o// de dag las chos kyang mnyand par bgyi'o// der bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bkod pa bzhis/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed legs
184b2(mdo): par brgya nang pa de yang blta bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so na/ rang rang gi byang chub sems
184b3(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang ngo to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cog 'jig rten gyi khams der 'jug pa'i gnas dang go skabs kyi phyir de
184b4(mdo): lhur the tsom ma tha cig/ de ltar nem nur ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyise
184b5(mdo): shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smyind par mdzad pa de ni mtha' yas so// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa shig kya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas/
184b6(mdo): go skabs yengs so// rigs kyi bu dag yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ sems can gang la la sems can gi khams su bsdu bar bsdus pa/ khams dang skye mched la gnas pa'i
184b7(mdo): sems can de dgu gas te/ re re'i lus kyang ri rab zlum du gyu rang tu zind kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur da pa de dag thams cad sungs 'bru gcig gi na
184b8(mdo): mchud par nus so// sems car re re zhing yang yul kaM gan sa ko skabs yangs te/ sems can de dag par tshun du myig rkyang gis kyang myi slebs so// sungs 'bru de gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi sum
184b9(mdo): bcug kyang 'bri ba 'am gang bar yang myi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa desam 'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan sang sra ba nyid ji snyed pa de dag
185a1(mdo): cad ni sa'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des sa'i khams thams cad rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog nus la/ rdul de gcig gi steng du sa'i khams thams cad bzhag kyang / dbri/
185a2(mdo): ba 'am/ gang bar myi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang cung zad gshe bar snang ba de thams cad ni chu'i khams te/ de bzhin
185a3(mdo): gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des chu'i khams de thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chung par nus la/ skra'i rtse mo gcig tu de bcug kyang chu'i khams de cung zad kyang gang ba 'am bri bar myi mngon no// rigs kyi bu
185a4(mdo): dag gzhan yang dzi nam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni mye'i 'ams te/ mye'i khams kang sngon byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu chud
185a5(mdo): par nus la// mye'i khams de thams cad rdul phra rab de gA/ cig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad rlung gi
185a6(mdo): khams su snang ba'i rlung gi khams de thams cad/ de bzhin gas pa shag kya thub pa des spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jug nus la rlung gi khams de thams cad spu'i khung bu de gcig na gnas shi nang
185a7(mdo): tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des ni/ gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad 'byur
185a8(mdo): ba chen po bzhi po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdul cig gi steng du 'jog par nus te/ rdul cig la sems can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang bcas par rang gi yul ga~M las kyi mtha' rnams
185a9(mdo): spyod kyang gnas shi nang tu yangs par rgyu ste/ phan tshun gnod pa yang myed la/ rdul gcig gi tshe mo yang bri ba 'am gang bar yang myi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta
185b1(mdo): dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu de dag gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi skye mched drug dang / spyod pa dang / nye bar send pa dang / smon lam dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / tshig gi lam
185b2(mdo): gi sgra dang yi ge dang tshig brjod pa dang / 'du byed gsum gyi las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang / phung po dang / dpyod pa dang / bstsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang / gang yang sems can thams cad kyi mtho'
185b3(mdo): mu nas bzung ste/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba na/ srid pa 'grub pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba 'byung ba dang / sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / sems can thus
185b4(mdo): cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs po'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam 'das po ci snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi du sa gsum du gtogs pa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang / sems
185b5(mdo): can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs po'i skad cig tha da cig yud tsam 'das pa ci snyed pa dang / kun spyod pa dang / dben pa dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa
185b6(mdo): de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des skad cag la rab tu mkhyend te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye
185b7(mdo): shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas myi rtog rnam par myi rtog cing / lhun gyis grub par dus gsum gi mtha' yongs su mkhyend to// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul la ma
185b8(mdo): pas mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can yongs su smyind par byed pa'i thabs tshad myed pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no// mtshan nyid bshad pa'i lung bstand pa na phyogs tha dad pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
185b9(mdo): de dag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag grangs myed dpag tu myed pa/ smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyind par gyurang to//
186a1(mdo): 'dus pa rin po che tog gi gzungs las mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba
186a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs myed dpag tu myed pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
186a3(mdo): stobs kyis gshegs par chas nas/ skad cig gcig tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
186a4(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ka la bzhugs par gshegs na sa/ pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang rang gi rdzu 'phrul
186a5(mdo): kyi stobs bskyed pas/ pad ma'i stan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la'akhod do// de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'chos bzhes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
186a6(mdo): grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i rdul phra rab kyi skul snyed kyang skad cig yud can de nyid la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bu sa ka rma la ra dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon to//
186a7(mdo): de bzhi na gshegs pa me yang byang chub ma mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs myed pa dang / nyan thos kyi ba zag tshig brgya gong dang babs gcig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
186a8(mdo): xxx
186a9(mdo): pos ton ces bya 'byir nam/ da ma'i gang po sa bzhugs pa'i bar durgyas par bya'o// de bzhi du ci rtson pa sogs dang / ra ba ni ma gshegs par nana'i bye 'byod do 'i mos tsun pa
186b1(mdo): yang de'i che du phyogs sogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag myed ces bya ba byon nas/ pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// 'og gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
186b2(mdo): ces bya babyoran nas/ pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// steng gi phyogs sogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od gzer ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba zhas
186b3(mdo): khrig brgya stong grangs myed dpag tu myed pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
186b4(mdo): de nas gshegs par chas pa dang / sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa sang dag
186b5(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas/ pad ma'i ba dan ji lta bu byung ba la ba/ zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
186b6(mdo): po de dag kyang ji ltar rang gi bsod nams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi stobs kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis pad ma'i stan sprul pa rnams la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
186b7(mdo): phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi char phab bo/ gong du smos pa bzhin du sbyar da te/ la la
186b8(mdo): drag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bskor da par byas so// ya la dag gis ni chos nyand pas skom nas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// la la dag
186b9(mdo): so ni rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing gnas so// yang de'i tshe rab 'byor nga gzhon nur gyur pas/ thal mo sbyar da te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs skyed pas/
187a1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'de ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// thub pa zla ba kun nas gshegs// sngon chad ma thos ma mthong ba'i// dge 'dun phun/
187a2(mdo): sum tshogs 'di sdang // byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang bas// zhing 'od mchod rten gyur ba ste// zhing rnams kun gyis phyag byas so// gang na sems can sprad
187a3(mdo): pa'i// zhing ni sems can lnga ldan 'dir// thub pa snang mdzad rgyu myed par// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der myi gshegs// de ring bdud ngan char bcad cing // nag po'i phyogs ni rab zhom deng // spyod pa dge
187a4(mdo): bsdu ba'i phyir// de'i don tu kun nas gshegs// yid ni rab tu dang byos la// bdud sde rab tu 'jom pa'i// chos nyid zhi ba rab nyon la// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos// theg pa chen po
187a5(mdo): spyod pa'i lam// bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byos// nyon mongs thams cad zar bya'i phyir// gzungs 'di de ring ma nyan par byos// gdan rnams la ni bzhugs nas su//
187a6(mdo): bsrung ba 'di ni bshad gsol phyir// de bas thams cad 'gron gcig tu// 'dren pa rnams ni spyan drongs shig/ dam tshe sa yun ring gnas bya'i phyir// sgrib pa thams cad ni
187a7(mdo): byed pa// chos rnams thams cad bsdu ba'i// gzungs ni gzhan gis kyi thub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa thob pa grangs myed dpag tu myong ba de snyed kyis 'grin gciH
187a8(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pad ma'i gdan 'di dag la bzhugs te/ deng thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ byams pa chen po'i mchog dang bzod pas yongs su bsgom
187a9(mdo): myi 'jigs pa'i rgyu mthun pa bshad pa/ chos thams cad sdud pa myi 'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa/ bdud kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar bgyid pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba
187b1(mdo): chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'jom pa/ dam thams cad char gcod pa/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa// thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa// 'jigs/
187b2(mdo): pa thams cad las rnam par tha rad par bgyid pa/ thams cad srung ba bla na myed pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi chos thams cad dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs pa dang / mos pa
187b3(mdo): myi brjed pa dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang / ye shes la mkhas pa/ kun tu ston pa bde ba phun sum tshogs pa/ thams cad kyi skye mched dang / byin kyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzind dang /
187b4(mdo): gzungs dang / bzod pa la 'jug pa/ sdang ba'i ye shes sa mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi tshe sa sum cu rtsa bdun gi snying po 'dzind pa'i bar gi gzungs
187b5(mdo): 'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / kha dog dang yod/ sa spyod dang / stobs dang grags pa dang / bde ba la reg/ par gnas pa dang / spobs pa dang dran pa rnam par
187b6(mdo): 'phel ba dang / thos pa 'dzind pa myi brjed pa dang / dgra thams cad pham par bgyi ba dang / lo tog mngon par 'grub pa dang / bslab pa 'dzind pa dang / dran pa'i snod du 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa mngon
187b7(mdo): bar 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub yang dag thob par bgyi ba'i srad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs 'dir 'dir bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ chos kyi tshul rjes su bzung
187b8(mdo): ba dang / yun ring du gnas pa rang / dkon mchog gsum gi rigs chab myi 'tshal ba dang / bla na myed pa'i byang chub kyi sam mtha' dag bstand pa dang / lung dag pa'i mtha' dang / nam mkha'u dang
187b9(mdo): de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang / mun pa dang snang ba dang / sdigs pa dang kyi byigs pad tshu rol dang / pha rol dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang /
188a1(mdo): gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mches pa dang / chos thams cad myi skye ba dang / myi 'byung ba dang / myi 'gag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos po ma mchis shing yang dag
188a2(mdo): pa'i mtha' dbyer ma mchis pa dang / sa dang chu dang mye dang rlung dang / nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la
188a3(mdo): chos thams cad kyi tshu ros kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ gang 'dir thos pa thag ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khri sa 'o rag tu myed pa dag la dkon mchog gsum mngon sum du gyur cig/ sems
188a4(mdo): can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing / phan par byed par gyur da cig/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dka za na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang
188a5(mdo): phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa thob par gyu// rad cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ kyang / chos bstand pa'i phyir cang myi gsung bar gyur da pas gnang //
188a6(mdo): nas/ pad ma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so// ji ltar ngas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i
188a7(mdo): za ba thams cad bsags pa'i phyir dran pa dang / rad pa dang / dang ba dang / mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems
188a8(mdo): nams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug drang skya ba ngan pa dang / da rgyas dang / rmugs pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la smra ba dang / be tsom dang nye bar men
188a9(mdo): pa dang / sring po'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes pa dag tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dag so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar na chos nyanang ba'i phyir 'dug gi 'di na gzhan ni
188b1(mdo): mus byed do// bdag gcig pu la de bzhi gsheg 'i su na kyi do med pa bdas sa pa'i phyir chos spyon par bzhed do// 'dir gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sa chos nyand pa'i phyir gsol ba ma btan
188b2(mdo): rtswam nu zhes par 'gyur ba'i ngas bu'i sangs rgyas kyi lus gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// yang de'i tshe gang sangs rgyas kyi 'angs lus pa 'dir gtogs pa/
188b3(mdo): sems can rnams dbang po thams cad brtan te/ thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsolar to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol// btsun pa
188b4(mdo): bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol// bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tan gis bsdu bar bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe re
188b5(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan nas la mchod pa'i phyir spos bkod pa las shi na/ da tu lhag pa'i spos// gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya
188b6(mdo): chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams la mched pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs
188b7(mdo): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag pa rin po che dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdug pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / lbab sbub sna tshogs dag
188b8(mdo): gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das keng ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi
188b9(mdo): zhing du 'dri ba'i phyir byond pa rnams dgongs su gsol// bdag gi sngon gyi smon sam gis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'jig rten du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs ma
189a1(mdo): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can bsam pa nyams pa las rab tu sto da pa ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ling tog gi nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa/ ngan/
189a2(mdo): song gsum du zhugs pa/ myi dge ba dang 'grogs pa/ dge ba thams cad bral ba/ mkhas pa thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa dang / mtshams myed pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur
189a3(mdo): pa 'debs pa/ snying rje myed pa'i bsam pa can gi sems can rnams la snying rje'i slad du/ snying rje ba dang brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang / dro ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ngal
189a4(mdo): ba dang / chad pa dang du blang bar bgyi'o// grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor du rkang gis 'gro bar bgyi'o// sems can rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i
189a5(mdo): slad du/ chub pa dang / nyung ba dang / ro myed pa shi nad tu sA/ da po myi mthun pa'i zas za bar bkyi'o// de dag gi dge ba'i/ rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ sbom pa/ rtsub pa/ reg na myi bde
189a6(mdo): sha na dang / shing bal dang / gso ma'i ras dang / phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o// ri dang ri'i sul dang / nags stug po da nga/ grong stong pa dang / dur khrod du gnas par bkye ba nas/
189a7(mdo): rtsa ba'i mal cha dang / gso ma dang / shing gi mdab ma dang / rtsub pa dang / dri myi zhim pa reg na myi bde ba myi bde ni ma la spyad par bgyi'o// bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po dang brtson 'grus kyi ko cha
189a8(mdo): bgos nas sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ rgyal rigs rnams la ni rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gaM gtam bya'o// bram ze rnams la ni rig byed dang / skar ma'i gtam dang / blon po
189a9(mdo): rnams la ni/ yul dang las kyi mtha'i gtam dang / sman pa rnams la ni khams dang sman pa dang / bsgrub pa'i gtam dang / tshong pa rnams la ni nye tshong gi gtam dang / dmangs rnams la ni las kyi mtha' la mdo/
189b1(mdo): bar zhend po'i gtam dang / bud myed rnams la ni kha dog dang / rgya nang dang / bu dang / phyug pa dang / 'gran zla myed pa'i gtam dang / dge slong rnams la ni bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / las dang / gsum la batshon par
189b2(mdo): gtam bgyi'o// sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par bgyi ba'i sad du/ ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon gsum du ma bgyis pa mngon du bgyi bar gzung ngo // ma tha rad pa rnams rab tu tha rad par bgyi ba'i thad
189b3(mdo): dug sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smyin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yul thams cad du rgyu bar bgyi'o// de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni de na bdag la de na gshe'o// myi snyan
189b4(mdo): ba zer ro// phra dog gi chos kyi rgyus bdag la 'khrig pa'i chos gis myed pa la sku rad pa 'debs so// kha gsag pa dang tshul 'chos pa dang / spu dang g.yo dang / brdzun smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang
189b5(mdo): bud myed kyi tshig dag gis skur pa 'debs so// bdag las/ 'thor ro// bdag gsad pa'i phyir mtshon dang dug dang / mye dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / ral gri dang / mdung dang / dkra
189b6(mdo): kA dang / rdo dang / mtshon nu'i cher 'bebs so// bdag kasar ba'i phyir glang po me dang / sbrul gtsug pa dang / seng ge dang / kA dang / glang po che dang / ma de dang / phung kyi dang / bgargod da
189b7(mdo): na po chenams kyang 'byed do// bdag gi gnas dang / gnas 'ang dang / kAtsug saka'ang sa myi gcing ba dang / dring bas 'akongs so// bdag gi nyan pos mong khyer du zhugs pa rnamams 'phags pa na
189b8(mdo): ba'i chos kyis sems car rnams kyis bu dang kar rnam pa yi ba byed du 'arung ngo // thubs pasu spyong dums bdag gsang ba'i phyir bskor no// bdag gi bsanang pa nub par bye ba dang / ro kyi rgyas gi smon ma ba
189b9(mdo): bdang / sod kyi rgyal par 'askal ba dang / chos kyi mu gzhig pa dang / bdag gi chos kyi mchog sbyin dam par gtor ba'i phyir bson no// dasangs pangs rgyal bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
190a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das pa dag gis chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po
190a2(mdo): mdzad nas// dam po'i chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gi rigs gnas pa rgyun myi 'chad par bgyi ba dang /
190a3(mdo): sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i za ba 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun par tshar gcad pa dang / sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / cod pa dang / mu ke dang / nang
190a4(mdo): dang / pha rold kyi dmag tshogs dang / 'ching ba dang / ra ba dang / rgol ba dang / dus ma yin par glang ba dab chab dang / char dang / rlung dang / sus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa dang /
190a5(mdo): bsang ba rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sma dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lham yin dang / mye dang myi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi ba dang / khyim dang / grong dang / kro
190a6(mdo): khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor thams cad bsrung ba dang / g.yo dang / duka dang / byang dug dang / rmo sa byed dang / rmyi lam ngan pa dang / stas ngan pa thams cad
190a7(mdo): gzhis pa dang / 'bru dang / sma nad dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs rnams
190a8(mdo): dge ba spyod pa la gzud ba dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes pa la mkhas pa/
190a9(mdo): dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bkye ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi
190b1(mdo): pha rol du 'gro bar bgyi bo'i slad du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtenang po'i chos kyi snying pos lus
190b2(mdo): 'jom pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing byin kyis brlabs te/ gcig la gcig dges pa re 'di ltar sangs rgyas
190b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing bzhes pa dag/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir dri ba'i phyir gshegs te/ bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas
190b4(mdo): kyi zhing 'di bsrung ba'i slad du/ chos mnyam po nyid rdo rje lta bu brten po'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bgyi 'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung
190b5(mdo): bstan po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam po'i chos kyi tshul/ yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi yul gyi stobs/ thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod
190b6(mdo): pa bzhin du sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs pa che bar mdzad de/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam po'i chos
190b7(mdo): kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa dang / myi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gi rigs myi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi bcud kyis
190b8(mdo): sems can nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi bo'i slad du/ legs par bshad du gsol/ byin gyis brlab tu gsol// bshad nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas
190b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin du bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lags kyang bgyis te/ chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas pa dang /
191a1(mdo): bdud kyi sras kyi stobs thams cad rab tu gnos panas/ sgrib bamyed pa sa shes kyi pha rol tu rgya tshas kyi srang cu/ byin gis brlabacing / chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje sa thu brten pa'i
191a2(mdo): kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstand pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad kyis kangs su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems

191b2(mdo): bud d+hi da da pra tsa la ba tsa la/ bin ra ni da ya/ tsan dra tsa ra ha/ a tsa le sho d+ha ni/ pra kri ti mArge/ i li i li le/ pra b+he sA ra pra te/ sarba da tra ta tha ta/ sad t+ya nu ka te/ A nA/ ba ra na pra te/ a la tha/ a
191b3(mdo): gu re/ sha mi ni br-i bri mA ba yi hi/ a hi ta/ a bA hi/ ni ra ba ya ba/ a tsi ra ma rga/ la na la/ gU sa re/ tri rad na bang she/ rdarma kA ya/ dzA la tsan dwe/ sa mu tra pa ti/ ma had b+hu ta bya ya/ sa mu ta be ga ba
191b4(mdo): d+ha ra ni/ mu dre na/ mu khi mu dra/ su ra pra ti sam bi ta/ sa mu dra/ a rta ni/ sam mo haska ra bya t+yu ta rA se na krI ti/ mu tri tau sa ye ke tsid bri thi/ bI bA ha/ ba ha ba ha ba ha ba ha/ kI TI ka pa ta/
191b5(mdo): she 'i la pra tI t+ya ni da ye ne mu tri ta d+hA ra nI// d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da radi la/ da na di lA/ hU kA sarba d+hi da ya/ mu tri to si/ dza tu dza bad ta/ dza kha ba ta/ su ma ti ba ti/ ma had b+hud ta mu tri ta/ ye ke tsing
191b6(mdo): sha dA ya na ni/ shri ta pU ta/ i ni mi ne/ sa tsa ne/ go Sha sa tsa ne/ mu tr-i ta// tsar+ya sa d+hiSh+Tha na bA ga ba thA na n+ya ma hA pru N+ya sa mu tsa ya/ a ba ta ra ma ha ru Na mu tri/ ta sarba sa myag pra ti /
191b7(mdo): tsi ra rA dran dz+wa la tu/ darma na tI sarba mu ni bri sha b+da/ ma hA ka mun/ sa ma dI/ gnya' na swa pA ba le na me'i tri tA ga a bI bi r+ya ba le na/ a dISh+Tha thA/ sarba b+hu to pa tsa yA ya swa hA// de nas de'i tshes
191b8(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad 'di skad ces sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes
191b9(mdo): lan gsum smras nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so// kye ma'o thub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar
192a1(mdo): ce'o// kye ma'o chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu'i brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstand pa'i chos kyi nam grangs stond pa'i

192a3(mdo): chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ chos kyi phyogs srung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba sngon ma thos pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying po dang /
192a4(mdo): phyag rgya dang / 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang / 'du byed dang skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad bla na myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la thob par bya ba'i bar gau phyir/
192a5(mdo): da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis phyag/ rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba sa 'jug pa/ lung bstan pa'i chos kyi gzungs kyi chos kyi nigrangs 'di bshad do// gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byung
192a6(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'ga'i klung sum bcu wa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par bsgrub pa'i/ ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa thob par gyur to// yang de'i tshe/
192a7(mdo): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa spyan las sangs nas zas mi sbyar te/ kun tu rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gi stobs kyi mthus/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad
192a8(mdo): dbyangs kyis bkang ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba zlo ba rnams kyi 'khorang / 'di 'dra ba ni rnyed par dka'// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs che// mkhas pa 'dir ni rnyed par dka'// gang kaM thugs
192a9(mdo): rje ldan pa'i// mgon pos chos tshul byin brlabs pa// phyag rgya de 'dra thos pa yang // mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o// bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra rnams kyang ni pham byed pa// dkon mchog/
192b1(mdo): gsum rgyun myi 'chad pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin kyis brlabs// sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// bzo dang nges pa rab 'phel ba// sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa// rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor bskyod// 'di
192b2(mdo): na ngan byas zlog byed pa// lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa// byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byind pa// byang chub lam yang rab stond pa// pha rol du phyi nad pa 'phel byed pa// bzang po spyod pa rdzogs byed pa//
192b3(mdo): babs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams// 'phel bar bya phyir byin gyis brlabs// dkar po'i phyogs ni skud byed pa// gzungs ni gzhan gyis myi thub pa// byang chub lam las myi gso ba// chos kyi dbang rnams 'am
192b4(mdo): byed pa// gzungs la yid gnyis thams cad ni// bsal nas skrag par mos par byos// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no// chos smra rnams ni bsrung ba dang //
192b5(mdo): nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir// gzhan gyis myi thub pa 'i gzungs// bdag gis da yang bshad par bya// sgrib pa myed pa 'grub pa dang // sems can rnams kyi phan 'phel phyir//
192b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// su dag 'di la dad pa 'phrul// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyurd pa gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis 'grin
192b7(mdo): gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di dad pa 'bul lo// byin gyis brlabs so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
192b8(mdo): dge bsnyen ma 'am gar la la zhig gis khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos la/ me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs bkram pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskord pa/ ras dang rgyan
192b9(mdo): rang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas shi nad tu brgyand pa'i khyams su seng ge'i wa reg na 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ gzungs 'di yang da/ 'a bshad na
193a1(mdo): su yang de'i sems 'khrug pa 'am/ khams 'khrug pa 'am/ lus 'khrug pa 'am/ yid 'khrug par myi byed do// de'i lus la su yang dbugs myi gtong ngo // glad pa na bar byed myi nus so// myig na ba dang / lce
193a2(mdo): na ba dang / so na ba dang / rus na ba dang / 'gul pa na ba dang / dpung pa na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / rgyu ma na ba dang / ston pa dang / chu so na ba dang / brlan pa dang / byin pa na bar byed pa su yang myi nus te/ de ni gnas myed do/

194a8(mdo): bdag gi grogs su 'gyur/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cad myi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar mdzad do// de na brgya byin gtsug phud 'dzind ces bya ba 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gi rgyan gi 'od kyis lus
194a9(mdo): brgya nang nas gcang myi ring ba zhig su 'dug go// de nas brgya byin gtsug phud 'dzind kyis tshangs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed kyi spyan sngar ma 'dug shig/ che zhe 'dir
194b1(mdo): bskyed pas byed can// bcom san 'dams pa 'an na// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa rnams ni rnam sa ngag zhing bzhin gshegs pa smos kyi ma da // de dag 'jig pacan nyid kyi/ 'dus byas pa
194b2(mdo): kyang sonang pa ma dang // de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzungs dang / le ge dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul brnyes pa ste/ me zhe de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di ga ste/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid
194b3(mdo): mnyam pa nyid cu gcig pas de canan nyid sa 'gal bar gyi mdzad de/ nam mkhal la ni 'du byed gsum gi 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid rdzo btags pa myed do// ji ltar 'du byed rnams la ram mkha' gyi tog cing // rnam pas
194b4(mdo): myi rtog pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dod pa'i yon tan la spros par myi mdzad// myi rtog rnam par myi rtog/ myi gnas mngon par myi zhe na te// de bzhin du srog la ma yin/ skye ba po la ma yin/

194b8(mdo): mngon par sprul pa yin gyis/ 'di la bud myed ces tshig tu ma brjod cig/ de nas brgya byin gtsug bud 'dzind kyis// tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag la thugs
194b9(mdo): brtse bar dgongs te/ bzod pa gsol// 'di skad spras pas/ bdag 'bras bu myi sdug pa 'thos par ma gyur da cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gis gsol ba// bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya byis
195a1(mdo): gis tshig de slar ma bzhags na/ de'i 'bras bu rnam par sbyin pa ci tsam zhig tu 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag myed kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu gal te des slar ma bshags su zin na/ tshe rabs
195a2(mdo): brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod pa'i mngal smad pa bud myed gi dngos po blangs par 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu ji nas kyang ngag gi las bsrung bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil
195a3(mdo): 'khor gi tshig brjod pa byin gis brlabs kyis khyod spobs par gis shig/ des tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gi brlabs kyis thal mo sbyarang te/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas 'di skad ces

195a6(mdo): pa rnams dang / nam tan dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe bar myi 'gyur ba ra 'dir dad pa stsa lang du gsol/ gang spa ma'i dus na bdud nas myi da myi ma lags pa'i bar gis// de dag la 'tshe bar myi bgyid par dad
195a7(mdo): ba su lang du gsol// de nas tshangs can sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gis spang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang / mnal skrag pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi sku phyung nas/ spa nges 'jig rten gi khams 'di thams cad spang bar
195a8(mdo): byas so// yang de'i chi tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis mgron cig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di sa dad pa 'brus lo// bdag cag nyid kyis kyang phyi ma'i dus ma gzungs 'di gzung bar babya'o//
195a9(mdo): tu bstand par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba dang / nya nang ba de dag dang / nan tan dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems
195b1(mdo): dpa' sems chen po rnam pa dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dab ba 'bul gis skyes bu dam pa gsungs shig/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thug gis 'di skad ces smras so// sangs
