216b4(mdo): dgas bdag cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang / rkun pa chen thos yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul yang dag par bkan pa'i slad du bskal pa mtha' yas pa mnan tan cher ba gyi'o/ sa
216b5(mdo): gras bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa/ de dag la logs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzangs dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin gi shig/ khyed
216b6(mdo): kyis chos kyi tshul drang dkon mchog gsum gi rig sa myi nub par nan tan byas nas/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod par 'gyur
216b7(mdo): 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las kun tu bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shig kya thub pas/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /
216b8(mdo): 'phags skyes po dang / myig myi bzang dang / yul 'khor bsrung dang / lus ngan po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzangs dag nga sems can la snying rje ba'i smon lam gyis nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma
216b9(mdo): lnga dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa nyon mongs
217a1(mdo): pa'i chom rkun dang / g.yon can gis 'ches pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ ngas bdud kyi phyogs ni pham par byas/ dam po'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng / sems can tshad myed pa
217a2(mdo): sa dag ni sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su tha rad par byas/ dam po'i chos kyi char ni phab/ ngas bdud bye bo ni pham par byas so// bzhin bzangs dag gang gi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang
217a3(mdo): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dpag tu myed pa rnams kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang / sems cad gyi gnas kyi nye
217a4(mdo): nas rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba dang / myi dge ba'i las thams cad ma lus par zad par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gi rigs yun ring du gnas par bya ba
217a5(mdo): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su gru ba par bya ba'i phyir/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa/ 'i chos kyi snying pos thams cad kyi lus 'jom pa'i gzungs
217a6(mdo): phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/ lung bstan dpa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la srungs shing // gang nga'i dam/
217a7(mdo): pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bsrung ba'i dge ba'i tha bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed po'i tshogs dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / dran pa dang / brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / gsum
217a8(mdo): la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang / gang bsam gtan dang po bsgom pa nas
217a9(mdo): 'dugs dang / tshor ba 'gog pa bsgom pa'i bar dang / gang rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngor tu bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon tu bya ba'i bar gyi 'asod nams kyi tshogs dang / gang sa
217b1(mdo): de 'dra ba'i bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba/ da lta na byed pa dang / ma 'ongs po'i dus na byed par 'gyur ba nas/ ro'i dam po'i chos kyi sgron ma 'o 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nas/
217b2(mdo): mngon par 'du bya ba'i tshogs de thams cad khyed kyi lag tu gtang ngo // gang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi
217b3(mdo): tshogs kyang khyed kyi lag tu gtang ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa nas/ tha na glegs bam du bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dra
217b4(mdo): las thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag grong ngam dmangs kyi khyim gi bar du gang dang gang na chos smra ba shin tu zhus byas te/ gos sar pa bgos nas me tog bkram pa'i 'khor
217b5(mdo): gi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang / ras sna tshogs bting ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mo la 'chad dam/ tha na
217b6(mdo): glegs bam lo bris te klog pa der gal te khyod chos nyan pa 'a ma/ chos nyan pa bsrung ba 'am/ chos nyan pa rnams yongs su bskyar ba 'am/ bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka'i myi dge
217b7(mdo): ba'i las yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir dong na/ de'i phyir khyed kyis bslus pa dang / lam bskyed pa la rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pas
217b8(mdo): 'di skad ces gsosar to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis po'i dus na/ dam po'i chos kyi tshul kyi bar du nub par gyu ra pan/ grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal las/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sa
217b9(mdo): pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ bram ze'i khyim 'am/ tshong dpon gyi khyim 'am/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge
218a1(mdo): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba dang / gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sha nad tu khrus bgyis te/ yan lag shi nang tu byugs nas/ gos sar par 'tshal te/
218a2(mdo): sa/ me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang / ras sna tshogs bting ba dang / ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskord pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ lce'i rtse mos gzungs
218a3(mdo): kyi phyag rgya 'di dag gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad dam/ bris te klog pa der chos nyand pa 'am/ chos smra ba de bsrung ba'am/ chos nyand pa de dag dang bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ka'i nyon
218a4(mdo): mongs pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba 'am/ dge ba'i chos yod sa su smyind par bgyi ba 'am/ chos kyi tshul chen po yang dag par 'bar bar bgyi ba 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po mchog gi lam
218a5(mdo): la 'jug pa'i slad du/ bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor/ te/ der ma mchis sam/ grong dang dmangs kyi khyim gi bar de ngag yongs su bskyang ba dang / sems can de dag gi nor dang / 'bru
218a6(mdo): dang / mdzod dang bang ba mang po dag dgang ba'i slad du der mAr+g+ha sa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos po'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal
218a7(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste// ang gu ha/ rkang gu haM/ D+hang ga pu ra ha na/ sA myi Sha/ kha kha/ kha ba 'a ba 'a ba/ ki na na kha ba swA hA// bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gal te bdag chos nyan
218a8(mdo): pa 'am/ chos smra ba bsrung ba nas/ nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bar ba mang po rnam par 'phel bas tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du/ der ma mchis na/ yaM dam las 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so//
218a9(mdo): nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin thams cad kyis myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la legs so//
218b1(mdo): legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas ke'u shi kas 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong ngam grong khyer ram/ gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas/ 'di ni sangs
218b2(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis ma thos pa'i bro bor ba 'di dam bcas pa dang / 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ kha ba mri kha/ kha ba mr-i kha/ na la gA/ a mur
218b3(mdo): 1/ a mud ba ha/ A khad ta/ A kha/ a sha kha/ dzi na pra khe swA hA// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dam bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis na/ 'di ni bdag gi bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar
218b4(mdo): 'gyur ba nas/ myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de nas 'phags skye/ sa pos kyang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang / ma mchis/
218b5(mdo): pa'i dus na grong gi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bre bor/ ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur lags so// 'di lta ste/
218b6(mdo): u kha na ba na ba sa na ba/ sa mu dA/ sang ngi da ny+dza/ ta thA/ dz+yA ta/ ba ru na pa ba ra dza swA hA/ myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar gis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas myig
218b7(mdo): myi bzang gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang / ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du/ gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
218b8(mdo): 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar/ bdag gis bre bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang / 'gas par 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/ dza lo 'u ka/ a tog+ha/ a ma ma/ mo kA/ a ma sa ra/ dza na tsa bya ya/ mu dza swA hA// de nas myi dang myi
218b9(mdo): ma yin pa'i bar gis/ rgyal po chen po myag myi bzang la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas yul 'azhor srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar nang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong gyi bar du gang dang gang
219a1(mdo): du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis the bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang / 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste// byin du dza ba/ kha ba dza ba/ rA mu la/ kA mar
219a2(mdo): pu ka ba ha/ a marga ba ta swA pA// myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar gis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srungs legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byinang to// de nas lus ngan pos kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis
219a3(mdo): pa'i dus na/ grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so//
219a4(mdo): 'di lta ste/ kU tre/ kru krA g+hu d+he/ Sha kru tre/ a ti/ ku tre/ a na sa na kru tre/ r+thi da ku tre/ sA ka ra prita kA tre/ sang ku rbu tre/ dang ma kA ya mu dre swA hA// myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar gis rgyal po chen po lus ngan po la legs so zhe
219a5(mdo): bya ba rab tu byin no// yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams la/ din gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen po 'di na yongs su sbyong ba stong nyis brgya dang / gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gzhan na gnas pa bzhi khri dang /
219a6(mdo): gzhan yang skra dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / ska ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul chel/ de dag thams cad kyis 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
219a7(mdo): 'das da stam dang / ma mchis pa'i dus ma dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i bar cu nub par gyur dpa'i tshe/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po la po brang ngam/
219a8(mdo): bram ze'i khyim 'am/ tshong dpon ka khyi ma 'am/ bdag nyid chen po'i khyim 'am/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang / kam tu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba dang / gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs/
219a9(mdo): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shinang tu zhus bgyis te/ yan lag shin tu byugs nas gos sar pa bkos te/ me tog bkram pa'i 'khyams su ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ spos sna tshogs kyis gdugs pa/ ro bro ba swa
219b1(mdo): tshogs kyis bsnyam pas/ brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la mchis te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi ni grangs 'di skye'i rtse mos gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad dam/ glegs bam la bris te/ klog par gal te bdag ga re zhing 'khor brgya
219b2(mdo): stong du mas bskor nas ma mchis sam/ der chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba bsrung ba dang / rang gi 'khor bsrung ba dang / sems can gzhan bsrung ba dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bgyi bo'i slad du/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram// grong
219b3(mdo): rdal nas dmangs kyi khyim gi bar de dag tu ma mchis sam/ 'khor dang bcas pas bka' ma mnos sam/ yongs su ma bskyangs sam/ res sems can rnams kyi nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / ba ba mang po rab tu ma bltam mam/ rer
219b4(mdo): ma mchis sam/ der sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nang dang / pha rold kyi dam ga tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / rlung dang shi nang tu grang ba dang / tsha ba rnams ma bzlog na/ bdag cag gis 'das pa
219b5(mdo): dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bskus pa dang / 'khus pa dang / mnyes par ma bgyis par 'gyur te/ sus la sha bkras btab pa dang / sta ba yongs su nyams pa dang / lus rul
219b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag g.yog dang bcas pas da ltar dang / ma mchis pa'i dus na/ yang gling bzhi po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'ang / sa de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar brgya'o//
219b7(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ yongs su sbyin par bgyi'o// ngan par bgyis pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan bar chos smra ba'i gang 'an
219b8(mdo): de la bskul bar bgyi'o// chos sme ba dang chos nyan pa de dag gi cho ba dang 'bru dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// rgyal ba'i bstam pa kyi 'jig pa'i chos su gzung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bco
219b9(mdo): ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis myi dang myi ma yin pa de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de la byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan
220a1(mdo): 'das 'di ci lags/ gang bdud bye ba phrag brgya po 'dir 'dus pa chen po thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad 'khor dang bcas
220a2(mdo): pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' skad mo can gyis gsol ba/ ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum sa dad pa thob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rigs kyi bu re
220a3(mdo): ni ma yin no// bdud sdig can g.yog spyod yod pa 'di dad pa ma thob ste// 'khrugs shing yid myi dga' nas/ da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'bar ba de srid du/ 'di klags
220a4(mdo): lta zhing skabs tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de bzhin du g.yog khri sum stong yod pa bdud bco brgyad dang / g.yog nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa nyis
220a5(mdo): brgya po 'di dag kyang g.yog dang bcas par dkon mchog la da da pa ma thob ste/ 'khrugs shing yid myi dga' nas/ 'di dag/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang / ji srid du dam pa'i chos
220a6(mdo): kye tshul rab tu rgyas pa de srid du/ 'di dag nga'i bstand pa la rmakas lta zhing skabs tshos te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang nub par bya ba'i phyir bton par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
220a7(mdo): sngon chad khon du bzung ba dang / dge ba'i za ba ma bskyed pa dang / mya dag pa'achab ma bsdad pa dang / mya dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su zind pa dang / dge bas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'das pa bde bar myi bzod
220a8(mdo): pa dang / smon lam btab pa'i phyir/ sems dang sems mtshams myi sbyor bar myi byed// gnas par myi byed/ rab tu gtong bar myi byed do// sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang / gzungs zab mo
220a9(mdo): 'di lta bu thos pas/ rgyu de nyid kyis phyin chad bran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dad pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
220b1(mdo): rob kyin ma zu ma 'jigs te/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa bas bsrun pa rnams kyi na lam du zag par gyur dan/ yang de nyid de dag gi blar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni/
220b2(mdo): rab gshenas pa ngos to// yang de'i tshe bdud ri byi zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i cha ba bskyed pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa myi nyams pa rnyed par gyur pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
220b3(mdo): ba'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa thob pa de drang srong chen po'i cha byad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub po'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ de stan las langs te/ kun tu bltas te thal mo sbyar nga nas/ sangs
220b4(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar byas te 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub seMs
220b5(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag cag bdag la dgongs su ga/ sol/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yaM/ na dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
220b6(mdo): po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dang / bdud g.yog dang bcas pa rnams kyang bdag gi cho ga la gson cig/ bcom ldan 'das shag kye thub pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga
220b7(mdo): can thams cad rnam par gcod pa/ yon tan bkod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu nyon mongs pa can snying ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur/ bla na myed
220b8(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur da pa 'debs pa/ myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa
220b9(mdo): nga par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su sbyind par mdzad pa dang / ngan song gsum sas shin tu bzla ba dang / theg pa gsum las yongs su sbyir par mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
221a1(mdo): gzungs dang / bzod pa la dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa dang / dkon mchog gi gdung myi 'chad par mdzad pa'i slad du zhugs kyis/ de la ci nas kyang khyod kyis stond pa'i bstand pa yun
221a2(mdo): ring du gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'di yang rnam par myi 'jig pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / bslab pa dang myi ldan pa ma gtogs pa da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor sus kyang de bzhin
221a3(mdo): gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa/ rgyal po'i bstan pa 'di la sems can 'ga' la yang 'tshe ba 'am/ rnam par 'jig pa 'am/ nub par bgyid par myi 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa dang / chos
221a4(mdo): la nan tan bgyid pa dang / chos ma sba ba dang / chos nyan pa'i dge slo nga ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo las gsum la
221a5(mdo): mngon par brtson pa bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dka' ba/ da kon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i las la mngon par batshon pa/ khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mngon par
221a6(mdo): bson pa/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag la yang / bdud ngam bdud kyi bu 'am/ bdud kyi bu mo 'am/ bdud kyi 'khor tam/ bdud kyi 'khar
221a7(mdo): tas/ bdud kyi 'khor mo 'am/ bdud kyi pho nyas gtse ba'i bsam pas grags lta ba 'am/ skabs rol du mchi zhing / gseng ba dang dge ba'i bar chad kyi las bgyid par myi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig/ dkar gyi sangs rgyas
221a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gsos so// bdag pa las kyi dngos grub gsal tu gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang / swa dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang
221a9(mdo): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mye 'amo tse dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa thams cad bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig/ kang su da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sa la gnas
221b1(mdo): ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyo zhing bstand pa dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag la thugs pache bar mdzod cig/ bdag la gsang sngags kyi dngos grub
221b2(mdo): grol da cig dang / bdag gis bdung dam bdud kyi 'khor de nam thur gis char bcad pa dang / sems 'khrug pa 'am/ lus gnod pa 'am/ sum la spa dgong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul nyams par bgyi ba'i sngags pa'ang par
221b3(mdo): bgyis te/ des bdud dang / bdud kyi bu dang / bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi 'khor dang / bdud kyi 'khor mo dang / bdud kyi pho nya gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la sems ma dad pa gcig tsam bskyed dam/ dge
221b4(mdo): slong la 'tshe 'am/ tha na skad cig cig tsam yang / sems 'khrug par bgyid pa nas/ dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'bri bar bgyi ba'i bar du nan tan bgyid pa dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal
221b5(mdo): dang / ljongs dang / phro brang 'khor dang / ri brags de rnams ma/ rung bar bgyid par sems bskyed pa dang / gang chos kyi rnam gra/ ngas 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de dag tu/ tha na skad cig cig
221b6(mdo): tsam yang 'thab pa dang / chod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rel kyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / char dang grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / chu bo dang / sa g.yos dang / sa 'gas
221b7(mdo): pa dang / skar mda' ltung bar bgyid pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro skye bar myi bgyid dam/ ma rung bar bgyid par 'tshal na/ bdud des de ltar bskyed pa thag tu bdud nas
221b8(mdo): bdud kyi po nya'i bar de dag rims nad kyis tsha bar gyurd/ lus sri ba dang / rdul ba dang / rul ba dang / dri myi rim pa dang / las su myi rung ba dang ljang kyi nus par 'gyur/ bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong ba dam
221b9(mdo): de'i san lag thams cad 'khums pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing / slar brkyang myi nus pa dang / de'i phyogs thams cad mun par gyur dan/ nyi ma sdang ba'i gzugs kyang myi mthong ba dang / de'i rdzu 'phrul bri nas sems 'khrug
222a1(mdo): bar 'gyur// de'i dbang po drug kyang spyod yul 'jug myi nus par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ a ma le/ a ha ma ma le/ a sa ma ma ye/ a dza ba ba/ a dza ba ba/ mu 'ur sa le/ byA kha sa le/ dza ma sa le/ ha sa?
222a2(mdo): ha ha/ ha ha/ ko ra sa Ta/ dza ra kha kA/ ka nye ya kha ka/ bid nye bA sa kha ka/ a mu ka ra/ ka ka ka kra ka ka/ mu bu la ba ha/ kha ka sA/ khad nya sA/ pa ri bar rta mu 'ur/ ad nyad nya/ bA su nyad nya/ tsan tra soT/
222a3(mdo): d+yo nyad nya/ nA ba ha nya nya/ khu ra ka nyang nya/ ba ba nyad ny+ra/ b+hu ta ko ta ti thA tA nyad nya/ sa rba da nye b+hi ma rISh+Tha ta nyad nya/ ba kra ma tri gan ta ka ba/ krA ma ma/ ka mad nya/ krA bid tra ma ra bi sha ya sA hA// thams cad mkhyend
222a4(mdo): pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ skad cig tu bdud kyi yul thams cad myed par byas te 'bras bu myed par gyur to// kA su yang rung ba gnod par 'dod pa dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas
222a5(mdo): de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa kyis legs so// zhes bya ba byin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dang / lha thams cad kyis kyang
222a6(mdo): legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas de'i ches ni g.yos sprin ni 'khrugs// ri'i rgyal po rnams ni rab tu g.yos te/ kang sangs rgyas kyi bstan dpa la mngon par dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzod
222a7(mdo): ba thob pa rnams ma gtogs par bdud 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nga bzhin du 'byung ba ma rungs pa rnams kyang 'khar dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin du 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang 'khrugs so// de nas bdud sdig
222a8(mdo): can kes byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdud re bi 'di'i stobs ga las 'ongs/ mthu ga las 'ongs na/ gang snying rje myed pa 'dis/ rang gi phyogs thams cad dang / rang gi
222a9(mdo): stobs kyi yul dang / pha rolang gnod pa thams cad bcom ste/ nag pa'i tshacha lag ni pham par byas/ kyi mthun pa chad par smra ba dge sbyong ko'u ta ma'i phyogs ni mtho bar byas/ bdag kyang gzungs 'di thos
222b1(mdo): mamab tu sum ni rtsi ma pa dang / nus pa dang / mas su myi rung bar 'gyur/ bdag gi phyogs thams cad kyang mum pa gyur te/ snang 'ing mthong ba byed yang byas nas yongs su gdung ba cher pos kyang bdag gdungs so/
222b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ sdig can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi byin kyi rlabs dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa de thams cad kyi stobs bskyed pas/ bdud ri bas bdud kyi stobs kyi
222b3(mdo): yul dang / pha rol tu gnon pa thams cad rnam par 'jom zhing / des gzhan gis myi tshugs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bshad kyis/ sdig can khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad par gi shog/
222b4(mdo): ci nas kyang khyod lus dang ngag dang / yod kyi sdug bsngal 'di dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur bar/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub tu yang sems skyed cig/ bdud sdig can gis smras pa/
222b5(mdo): bdag ni phyi ma'i mtha' mu grang sa myed par 'di bas kyang ches/ sdig pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdug bsngal rnams la spro'o// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni bdag sems
222b6(mdo): myi bskyed do// / 'dus pa chen po rin po che togaga~M gzungs las dram pra'i chos kyi tshul bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcucig go//
222b7(mdo): nas shi na rgyun gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog kAnas ni gnod sbyin 'jigs la kris smra bu'i gzugs su/ yang dag shes pa ni ri dgas kyi gzugs su/ sa pa'i rnon po ni spre'u'i gzugs su/ med do
222b8(mdo): zug / rgyu ya ni b+ha gzugs su ma khyen / dug ribasbyin gshegs pags chub u/ sa kyi bzhin sa kon
222b9(mdo): 'gro ba byin thar 'a 'dings de dag gi sum pams cid pas rnam par dag ci dron po pa'i 'od byung ngo // denas sems can chen po'i po de dag gis ma lda 'as mi mchod sa byaba'i phyi ro po
223a1(mdo): 'od ces bya ba lag pa gnyis na thogs so// de nas byang chub ses dpa' seMs dang chen po ltad mo can kyis de dag kaM bsam pa tshul bzhin rnam par dag pa la bltas te/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
223a2(mdo): pa'o snyam nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas de la bos te 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa don gyi dbang kar mthong na khyed 'di lta bu'i spyod lam gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod
223a3(mdo): par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed/ 'brog gnas kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
223a4(mdo): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs shes bya ba byung ngo // de'i tshe ba dgacag lnga spun drung du gyur pa te/ de nas bdag cag gis bla na myed pa ya ba dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sems
223a5(mdo): can yongs su sbyismyind par bya ba'i phyir nan tan du byas so// de'i/ 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyo/ ba dang / bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di byung ma thag tu
223a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung gi bar du de na yang / bdag cag sngon gi smon lam gyis snyun drung du gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bdag cag gis mchod pa dang /
223a7(mdo): bsnyen bkur rnam pa mang po byas so// de nas yang der sems can chen po dge bsnyen yang dag shes pa bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bas der 'di 'dra ba'i smon lam btab ste/ bdag bskal pa chen po bzang po 'dra
223a8(mdo): la gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen por gyur pa la/ de na 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa'i ma rungs pa sems can rnams lo snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba myed par zhugs pa byad gzugs tha dad pa'i gnod sbyin dag nas lus srul po'i
223a9(mdo): bar du de dag la bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar dad pa thob par byas nas bslab pa 'di 'dzin tu btsud la zhi bo'i lam la bkod pa nas/ de na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song po'i ri dgas
223b1(mdo): dang spyang khyi dang rko ba dang / phag las stsogs pa la yang chos bshad pa nas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa/ gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed po'i bar la chos bshad/
223b2(mdo): pas yongs su smyind par byas nas/ theg pa gsum po dag la so sor bkod do// de nas gdod bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa thob par shog shig ces byas so// de bzhin du/
223b3(mdo): gnod sbyin shes po'i sgron ma spre'u'i gzugs kyis spre'u yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo// sred spong ra'i gzugs kyis myi khom pas nyam nga bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams yongs su sbyind par
223b4(mdo): bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo// rgyun bcad glang po che'i gzu gas kyis glang po che yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab ste/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po glang bzhi pa na gnas pa/
223b5(mdo): khri nyis stong gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ tshol zhing sems su smyind par bya ba'i phyir smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs btab par gyur nas/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor
223b6(mdo): ba 'jig de'i spyan sngar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bye/ dra chub tshol zhing / bskal pa bzang po 'di thams cad du gnod sprin ma rungs pa yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo// 'di
223b7(mdo): na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa snying rje myed pa/ byas pa myi bzo ba/ ya ba spyod pa/ sdig pa byed pa/ snying rje dang myi ldan pa nas/ lus srul po sems can rnams la 'tshe ba mdangs phrog pa sems 'khrug par byed pa/ myi
223b8(mdo): dge ba'i sems su byed pa/ srog phrog pa nas log pa la lta ba'i bar dang ldan pa/ rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi sems 'khrug par byed pa/ yul 'khor dang / krong dang /
223b9(mdo): gro dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / 'jug par byed pa dang / ka za dang / rgyu skar dang / nyes dang zla ba dang / nyen par dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba byed pa dang / dus dang / so 'jug par byed pa/ 'thab
224a1(mdo): ba dang / sod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol kyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char dang / rab tu grang ba dang / tsha bar byed pa dang / sa bon dang / sman dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang /

224a3(mdo): rnam par grol ba'i ro nub par byed pa rnams bslab par 'dzind tu btsud de/ phyir myi ldog pa la bkod nas/ gang tshun chad bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa thob pa de tshun chad/ bdag rtag tu gnod
224a4(mdo): sbyin gyi sde dpon gyi nang du skyes te/ gnod sbyin sdig can nas/ sus srul po'i bar dag theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su sbyin pa ra byas nas phyir myi ldog pa la bkod cing de chun cad/ sems
224a5(mdo): can rab dang 'bring dang / tha ma mthong na yang brnyas par myi dran ki/ sems can ci 'dra ba mthong ba de nyid kyi tshul gis de dag/ la smras yang dag par gzer bstod/ yang dag par rab tu
224a6(mdo): dka' bar byas/ sdig pa las bzlog/ byams pa dang / skyebarje'i sems la bzhag ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag la phyir mya ldog par so sor bkod do// bdag
224a7(mdo): gnod sbyin gi 'khor gang dang gang du phyi nad pa der de dag gnod sbyin 'brog gnas bde bar 'ongs sam zhes tshig tu 'bod do// de bas na bdag gi mying 'brog gnas zhes bya bar gyur to// gang dag da ltar chos nyid
224a8(mdo): dang bral zhing sdom pa la gyi gnas te/ gcig tu las nag po spyod pa'i ming de dag ni shi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song gsum du skyes te/ myi'i nang du ni nyung zad cig skye'o// gang dag las 'dren mar spyod cing dkon mchog
224a9(mdo): gsum la dad pa ma thob pa de dag ki ni sho bi'i dus byas nas phal cher gnod sbyin sdig can dang / gnod sbyin lus srul po'i ning du skye'o// de bas na da ltar 'jig rten na/ gnod sbyin sdig can nas/ gnod
224b1(mdo): sbyin sus srul po'i bar du shi nang tu phal cher rnam par 'phel te/ de dag thams cad kyang dkar po'i phyogs nub par byed pa la brtson pa sha stag go// de bas na da lta shi nang tu dus ngan pa la bab pas/ bdag gis 'jam pos
224b2(mdo): ni dus thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas lus srul po ma rungs pa'i bar dag chos dkar po la dgod par myi nus/ bdag gis rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / dge sbyong dang
224b3(mdo): skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'khrugs pa rnams kyang slar zhi bar bya myi nus/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor 'khrug pa yang zhi bar bya myi nus
224b4(mdo): bdag gis 'byung po rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba yang phyir zhing rnam par tha rad pa'i ro la dgod par yang myi nus te/ rigs kyi bu gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po thams cad kyi snying la g.yo
224b5(mdo): sbyor ba mya drang ba'i shes pa yang bdag gis sangs rgyas thams ca/ da kyi gzi brjid kyis shes so// rigs kyi bu 'byung po rnams/ kye snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba rig pa'i gsang
224b6(mdo): sngags kyi gzungs kyi tshig drag po mya bzad pa chen po yod de/ gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis btab na/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin po 'am/ gnod sbyin mo rgan
224b7(mdo): mo'om/ gnid mA kyai bu 'bru/ gnod sbyin kyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin kyi 'khor po 'am/ gnod sbyin kyi 'khor mo 'am/ srin po 'am/ min mo nas/ klu dang / klu mo dang / grul bum dang / grul bum mo dang
224b8(mdo): brjed byed dang / brjed byed mo'i bar dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa nas/ lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ sus srul rgan po 'am/ lus srul rgan mo/
224b9(mdo): 'am/ lus srul kyi bu 'am// lus srul kyi bu mo 'am/ lus srul gyi 'khor po 'am/ lus srul kyi 'khor mo'i bar dag gis kyi phyir zhing rgyal rigs dkrugs pa nas ljongs kyi bar du dkrug par byed kyi num mo
225a1(mdo): rigs kyi bu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ gro brdal nas/ dmangs kyi khyim kyi bar d+ha kang na rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po drag pa myi bzad pa chen mo rig pa'i gsang
225a2(mdo): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par gyurd pa der gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po ma rungs pa'i bar de dag gis sngon khon du bzung zhing myi dge ba'i las byed pa de dag thams cad btang nas/ byams pa dang / snying rje
225a3(mdo): dang / sems 'jam pa dang / 'byung po thams cad lo snying rje dang ldan pa dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// yul 'khor dang / dmangs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po 'khrug pa thams/
225a4(mdo): cad dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / char pa dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / byad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / lus kyi rlung dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang
225a5(mdo): 'dus pa dang / nyan gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / !/ na gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa'i rims dang / mdze dang / rkom po dang / gsan pa dang / lud pa dang / 'brum bu dang / ston pa dang /
225a6(mdo): yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba dang / 'khrug pa dag zhi bar byed de/ de na myi dang myi ma yin pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya la stsogs pa las dkare po'i mtha' la mngon par btson pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad
225a7(mdo): spangs pa/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas nyin mtshan 'das par byed pa dang / dge ba dang / sbyin pa dang / rus pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dka' ba dang /
225a8(mdo): lus dang / sems myi ngal bar byang chub kyi lam tshol ba la brtson par byed do// yang 'di skad kyang smras te/ rigs kyi bu ji ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/ bdag gi las kyi dngos grub 'di gas lang
225a9(mdo): cing / byin kyis brlab par mdzad de/ rjes su yaM rang ba mdzad na/ bdag gis 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad dad par bgyid pa/ myi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad zlog par
225b1(mdo): bgyid pa/ dge ba'i phyogs thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bgyi ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas
225b2(mdo): bdag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol// 'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gi tshig brjod pa'i yi ge dang smas gang bar bgyis pa'i rwa bzhin
225b3(mdo): du ji nas kyang 'dir lhags pa'i 'khor rnams dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gi tshig brjod pa'i don dang tshig dang / yi ges tshim par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas// gnod
225b4(mdo): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas la bos te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nag po'i phyogs bsgag par bya ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
225b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis khyod rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba'i 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i/ gsang sngag/ sa kyi gzungs 'di'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa
225b6(mdo): byin gyis brnabs kyis/ skyes bungs pa byed spro bar gyis pa/ 'jug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed du/ 'byung po thams cad kyi stong po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs ma rungs pa thams cad thos
225b7(mdo): bar byed pa/ rdo rjen pa ma'i 'atog 'dug ces bya ba'i gas sngags kya zhi de dag 'o ga/ denas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas sman pas sangs te/ de bzhin gnags gas chu pa
225b8(mdo): gas su mas mo sbyar pa 'dud na/ ngas rgya kyi zhing 'dis ma par byangs kyis go bar byed cing / gsang sngags kyi rdzog 'di smra ro// 'di

226a1(mdo): xxx
226a2(mdo): su ni mu ni/ b+hud di yi/ pra ba ra/ sr-i Sha mo ga tsan+ya/ dzi na dzi na/ dzin min te/ dzi mdzin dzin/ rig rig b+ha swA hA// bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rnam sam/ ljongs sam
226a3(mdo): dmangs kyi khyim gi brla dugs shA/ 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rjenam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bgyi ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rig pa chen mo 'dri bshad pa'i tshe/ den gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas/ sus srub
226a4(mdo): po ma rungs pa'i bar gang dag sems ma dad pa dang / sus dang ngag dang yid kyis bslab pa'i sdom pa yongs su myi len pa dang / sems can de dag la byams pa'i sems nye bar myi gzhog pa de dag gi don tu
226a5(mdo): bdag gis yang shrI nad tu myi bzad pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig/ bshad do// / ad mes tse/ mu ne mu ne/ a kIn tuHmu na su ne/ ma ha rik+ka bA/ hu su/ a gra dan te/ a ta dan te/
226a6(mdo): a ta ma ta/ a bI ru ta/ di ni hi ni/ hi ri/ hi r-i/ hi rauhi ri/ hi ra do ro/ tI gu ma/ gu ma ku ma gu ma/ ti l-i hi si/ li ni li/ ma hA ni li/ sa mu tra ma Sha/ ha Ta ha Ta ha Ta/ d+ha ran
226a7(mdo): me la/ kwa la k+sha g+sa la/ bri bi na pa de co bcu/ a k+Sha sha/ [।]9/ krus ne nA/ gum te/ a ga shi klum b+he/ dzi hwa klus n+d+he/ dzi dwa gum byesas gru 'o// sa ma twa krum b+he swA hA// gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen po
226a8(mdo): 'brog gnas kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'dri dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod sa/ lha dang / kruM dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po thams cad 'khrugs te/ skra gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sa dang nam
226a9(mdo): mkha' la gnas pa mtha' dga'adar ro// de nas skad cig de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar to// lan gsum du 'di skad ces sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo phyag
226b1(mdo): 'das so// myangs rgyas thams cad sa phyag 'chas so// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis gi nas tu myi bzad pa'i 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po gnon pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smras
226b2(mdo): so zhes brjod do// / 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ 'brog gnas kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
226b3(mdo): cad bzhengs pa'i brda' dang / rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i brda' bstan to// de nas de'i mod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams
226b4(mdo): kyang rab tu 'dar/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yang g.yos so// nam mkha' las kyang me tog gi char 'bab/ bar snang las ra sil snyan bye ba'i sgra byung / spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyang
226b5(mdo): shi nang tu byung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang sna nga bas khyab par gyur da nas/ 'khor thams cad thal mo sbyar/ da te 'khod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri
226b6(mdo): chen po la/ mya mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
226b7(mdo): chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / bris nas 'chang bar bgyid pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i la brtsi tsam dang ldan par 'gyur/ sems can
226b8(mdo): de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ chos du zhig gis byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gi dri chen pos/ myi mjed
226b9(mdo): kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// tshangs pa ci nas bdud kyi phyogs tshar bcad pa dang / 'thab pa'i rtog pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smyind par/
227a1(mdo): bya ba dang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis khams drug byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du gang ma 'ongs pa'i
227a2(mdo): dus na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa nas bris te 'chang ba'i bar gi sems can de dag/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos bcus byin kyis brlabs so// bcu gang zhe na/
227a3(mdo): tshangs pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
227a4(mdo): srin po dang / grul bum de dag la khyed kyis sems can de dag rtag tu srung zhing / gnod pa las zlog shika/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dge ba sa tshud cig/ zas dang skom dang longs spyod
227a5(mdo): dang / kun spyod pa mang po dang / nad myed pa la mkhas pas/ bdag gi srog dang yang sngos la sems can de dag la gzung b.rakau shi ka ces rigs pas gtad nas/ de dag gi dran pa dang /
227a6(mdo): blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / spobs pa la mkhas pa skyon myed par 'gyur ro// de dag gi yid kyi brnag pa 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan bas gnas par myi 'gyur te/ de dag stong pa nyid la gnas
227a7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// de dag sems sa dang mtshungs shing zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa bsdu ba'i dngos po la yang brtson par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i chos la gnas nas sems can gi lus las snying po blangs te/ dngos
227a8(mdo): po gsum yongs su dag pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i rgyal mtshan yang thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzind thams cad sa rnam par spyad
227a9(mdo): pa'i shes pa la yang mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang sems can de dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
227b1(mdo): kyis mdun du bdar ba 'tsho zhing bzhes pa chos stond cing / bzhugs pa grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las don dang tshig dang yi ger ldan pa'i chos bshad pa
227b2(mdo): de lta bu yang thos par 'gyur ro// thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa zang zing myed pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i bar du thob nas las kyi sgrib pa myi dge bzas cad rnam par shes pa tha ma la chos dang ldan pas mgo
227b3(mdo): mnyam du 'gag par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing kAng na
227b4(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ bzhugs te theg pa chen po'i gi tam 'ba' zhig 'chad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can de dag theg pa chen po la gnas shing sgrib pa myed
227b5(mdo): pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa sems nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i sem sa can de dag dang 'grogs par 'gyur te/ ring por mya thogs par yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag/
227b6(mdo): rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par phyi nang cad nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su nam yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
227b7(mdo): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dkar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'brar bar byed cing gzungs kyi phyag rgya chos kyin ma grangs 'di 'dzinadu
227b8(mdo): pa nas glegs pam la byis te 'chang ba'i bar kaM sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bcu po de dag gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de dag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
227b9(mdo): dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa sems cad nas par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das debazhin gshegs pa shag
228a1(mdo): kya thub pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su phyogs bcu nas 'dir byon pa de dag thams cad
228a2(mdo): kyis khyed la thugs rje ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyi rol kyi dngos po rnam par sbyangs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyind par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa rab tu bstand pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs
228a3(mdo): pham par bya ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par bstand pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gi rigs rgyun myi 'chad par bya ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / ma rungs/
228a4(mdo): pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang / lta ba ngan pa thams cad spang ba dang / byang chub kyi lam la gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya bad
228a5(mdo): las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir/ ngom tshar che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos sngon ma thos pa gzungs kyi tshig zab/ mo rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu
228a6(mdo): zhig bshad de des chags pa myed pa'i gzungs la spobs pa dang ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la gzud pa dang / tshul gcig/ pa thams cad mkhye nad pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ khyim
228a7(mdo): rang ga grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul srung ba nas gling bzhi bsrung ba dang / swa dang / klu dang / gyi dang / myi ma yin pa bsrung ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / so ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / so tog rnams
228a8(mdo): srung ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa'i bar dag bsrung bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dngos po re re yang snying rje
228a9(mdo): chen po la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu 'thun pa rnam pa bcus byin kyis brlabs so// grogs po dag dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis byin kyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thos
228b1(mdo): cad kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir yongs su ma lus par spyang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa/ bla ma'i gnas stond par kun gyis bkur ba
228b2(mdo): phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyurd pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dag kyang / las kyi sgrib pa yid du myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de dag ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// /
228b3(mdo): de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa spangs nas dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas par 'gyur te/ grogs po dag de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skyes bu'i mthu chen po'o// grogs po dag khyed
228b4(mdo): kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sti stang du byas te/ dam pa'i tshe sa 'di gzung bar bya/ bsrung bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos 'di ladzi nad pa'i gang zag khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang
228b5(mdo): chos la nan tan byed pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bya'o// de lta/ ra na khyed la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom lda// 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi rgyal mtshan gis de'i tshe
228b6(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan dang / phan yon rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsa la da to// ka nga gis zhing kun gser gis rab tu bkang nas ni// skyob pa
228b7(mdo): mgon po dag la mchod pa phul ba bas// gang zhig dam pa mchog gi mdo 'di 'dzin byed na// 'jigs myed des ni bsod nams dpag tu byed pa thob// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen gdugs kyi
228b8(mdo): dpal kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsalang to// brgya tshang pa'i gser rnams las// kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed// khyu mchog thub la phul bas ni// mdo 'di'i bsod nams mtshungs myi thob// de bzhin
228b9(mdo): gshegs pa spos legs kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// me tog sna tshogs kyi gdugs mchog sprin rnams kyis ni nam mkha' khyab byas te// gang gis mchod phyir dga' mgu yid kyis sangs rgyas nas
229a1(mdo): la phul ba bas// kang zhig phyin cad zad 'gyur 'jigs ldan dus na mdo 'di 'dzin dbyed na// de'i bsod nams tshad dag sems can kun gyis brjod par myi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
229a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thub pa'i spyan sngar mar me'i snying po dri zhim til gis byugs pa ri rab tsam/ mar me phul ba 'dzum pa'i bzhin gis gus par
229a3(mdo): bskalang pa bye bar bzung bas/ gang gzhan la la bsod nams 'dod pa'i sgrib pa srab par spod pa de dag gi/ zad pa'i dus che 'khor du mdo sde'i gtam pa na byas// de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags
229a4(mdo): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pas kyang 'di skadas bka' stsalar to// blo gros 'chang ba dag gis bzod pa skom zhing rtag tu brtson 'grus chom/ rtag tu bsam gtan gzhol/
229a5(mdo): zhing mnyam bzhag lus kyis shes rab spel ba bas/ da po'i dus ngan tshen gang zhig dam chos phyag rgya 'di 'dzin pa/ de'i bzod dang brtson 'grus 'di ni mtshungs myed gzhal du
229a6(mdo): myed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rdul dang bral ba'i stobs kyis/ rnam par gnon pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang gis mdo 'di bshad nas bzung ba dang /
229a7(mdo): mngon par bris pa dang / gzhan dag 'dzind tu bcug gus par rtag tu klog pa dang / bdug pa me tog 'phreng ba kos mchog rnams kyis mchod// bsod nams gang thob de ni brjod par myi nus so// de nas
229a8(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad tshad myed/ grangs myed pa de dag gi mdo 'di bsngags pa dang / yon tan dang phan yon dpag tu myed par brjod nas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
229a9(mdo): skyong ba de dag la swa 'di skad ces dang bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ phyi ma'i mtho'i dus na/ gang thos pa tsam gyis kyang
229b1(mdo): sems camangams kyis sa kyo rnab pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi nam grangs 'di thu shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa
229b2(mdo): 'khor dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha mo yin dang / dri zar bcas po'i 'jig rten saM rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//

229b7(mdo): ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ya 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa cu krung 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan bcang shes ko'u rin n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa dka' byed dang / rtse dang ldan ba
229b8(mdo): du'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan bku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa tshungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsum pa tshe dang / tshe dang ldan pa dka' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dadang / med pa
230a1(mdo): ldan pa lag bzangs dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa steng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam mu nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i bar du de la sogs pa dge slong stong nyis
230a2(mdo): brgya lnga bcu dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang bcas pa la/ lus 'phags mo'i bu yul ma ka da'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras na bza' dang / bshos dang /
230a3(mdo): gzims cha dang / snyun gi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ sti stang du byas/ mchod pa byas so// yang de'i tshe sa yang cher g.yos par gyur da/ sprin 'dus pa chen po yang byung /
230a4(mdo): dum mo yer ba'i rlung dang / ser ba chen po dang / sprin chen po las char pa yang bab par gyur/ 'brug kyang di ring mo zer/ klog rnams kyang byung / phyogs bcu yang 'khrugs par gyu rung to//
230a5(mdo): mun pa mun nag chen po yang byung ste/ skar ma rnams kyang myi snang / nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'od dang myi ldan te/ lhan ner ma yin// skang der ma yin zhing 'od mya gsal bar gyur te/ de nas
230a6(mdo): yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por 'jigs pa de dag byung ba dang yangs pa can ki li tsa bi kha cig gi grong gzhan dang / grong khyer gang yin pa de dag gdon 'byung pos btab par gyur da/ grong gi gzhonu
230a7(mdo): rnams dang / nyis mkhan dang / blon po dang / blon po chen po dang / 'khor na gnas pa dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / ma dag pa dang / g.yog kha cig kyang gdon 'byung pos btab par gyur da te/ yul yangs
230a8(mdo): pa can gi spongs kun gyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang 'jigs skrag spangs te/ skye bung zhes byed nas la gnam du ltas te ngu 'bod cing sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge
230a9(mdo): 'dun la phyag 'tshal/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa'i bram ze dang / khrib pa dag de dag kha cig ni tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal/ kha cig ni brgya byin la/ kha cig
230b1(mdo): ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal/ kha cig ni dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang da/ gang ba bzang po dang / 'phrog ma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / ri dang / nags tshogs dang
230b2(mdo): sman dang / shing ljon pa dang / klung dang / steng ka dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang / rdzing dang / mchod rten kaM gnas na gnas pa dag la phyag 'tshal zhing / bdag cag rnams kyi gnod pa 'jig pa'i gnas nas ji ltar ba ra
230b3(mdo): par 'gyur snyam sems shing 'khod pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis myi las 'phags pa'i spyan rnam par dag pas gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang mngon par mdzad pas
230b4(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur nas/ lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas po'i 'jig rten dad par gyurard te/ 'dus par gyu rad pa rnam pa de lta
230b5(mdo): bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do// de nas myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi sku/ rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / sum bcu
230b6(mdo): cha gsum gyi lha rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nya shu pa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po stobs po che sum cu
230b7(mdo): cha gnyis dang / 'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nub mo 'das pa dang / dag pa lta bu'i bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bdag gi kha dog dang mthus snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te
230b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshig gcig dbyangs gcig ngag gcig tu bcom ldan 'das lo tshigs su
230b9(mdo): bcad de mngon par bstod pa// shi nang tu 'bar ba'i gser dang 'dra// zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// dpal ldan rnam thos bu bzhin brtan// rin chen rnams kyi 'byung gnas lags// seng ge glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros
231a1(mdo): grang chen myos pa bzhin du gnon// gser gyi ri bo dang yang mtshungs// 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser rgyan 'dra// skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor nga pa'i// nam mkha'i zla ba dri myed bzhin// nyan thos dge
231a2(mdo): 'dun rnams kyi dbus// mtshan rnams kyis ni brgya nad par gyur // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di// thub pa la ni skyabs su mchis// myi rnams la sman slad du// bsrung ba dus su nye bar gnas// sangs
231a3(mdo): rgyas snga mas bshad pa'i// stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde ni// kho ra khor yu ga raM mtha'i bar// 'tshams gcod pa'i dam pa lags// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// chos kyi rgyal po thub chen la// thal mo
231a4(mdo): sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsa mo zhig cang myi gsung bar dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po gang dag khyer
231a5(mdo): kyi 'khor nga'i 'khor la 'tshe bar sems pa de ni tshul ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi'i 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos legs par gsungs pa dang / dge 'dun legs
231a6(mdo): par bsgrub pa de la sa bon 'di btab nas/ sangs rgyas ma ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra brtsa ma pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu
231a7(mdo): de la 'jig rten de dag gis dge ba'i tsha ba bskyed nas lha'i ris sum bcu rtsa gnyis las lha'i ros gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ rgyal po dag kyang dmag rnam bzhi dang ldan pa dang / gleng bzhi la dbang ba'i/
231a8(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen por chos kyi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur te/ de dag la yang bu dpa' brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ chen po che'i stobs/
231a9(mdo): kyi thugs bdog pa/ pha rol kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bas na 'jig rten 'dir rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying las chu ngur gnas pas gnas par

231b2(mdo): das sa 'dzin gyis gcom // com ldan 'das 'dag cags thong dang byed pom a dang / gnas myed 'ang dang / 'ang pa brtsegs pa dang / bami la'ang dang / khang dang / rtababs dang / nAr thung dang /
231b3(mdo): rar gyi lnga ldi bzang zhing mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / dril bu dang / mu tig gi dra bas yongs su bskyor da ba dang / pog por nas bdug pas bdugs pa dag dang / me tog gis gtor ba'i khyim dang gnas/
231b4(mdo): dang / 'ang po chen po dag mchis te/ der bdag cag bud myed pa/ phrag song dag gis yongs su bskor cing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bras spong ba dang ldan par gyur nas gnas te/ btsun pa bcom ldan
231b5(mdo): 'das bdag cag rab tu myos pa bag ma mchis par gnas pas gnas na/ 'khor zas dang skom tshol du phyogs bcur kun tu 'byer zhing / skye sa pa dang bud myed dang khye'u dang bu mo dang bcas ma thag dang / dud 'grol/
231b6(mdo): skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ 'tshe bar bgyid/ bgyegs bgyid/ 'gums par bgyid/ srog dpa' bral ba ra bgyid de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag gis 'phro
231b7(mdo): bzhi'i mdun du bdag gi 'khor gyi tshul gi mtshan ma bstan par bgyi'o// gang gi 'khor ga gi don byung ba der rgyal po chen po de'i gzugs mchod rten dang bcas pa chen po bgyis te/ nad pas rgyal po chen po de'i myong nas dbyung zhing / driswa
231b8(mdo): tshogs kyis rang gi lag nas bdug par bgyi'o// dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste/ zhugs mar bus la mchod rten de la mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin gi gdon gyis btab pa'i
231b9(mdo): tshul gyi mtshan ma 'di lta bu lags te/ phyi phyir dgod cing 'jigs par 'gyur/ smra bar bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur// de ni kanyid kyis ldog par 'gyur// yang na shi nad tu bro 'tshal 'gyur// rtag tu gyen du lta bar 'gyur// skar
232a1(mdo): ma dag la bsnyegs par bgyid// nub mo sha ning tu dga' bar 'gyur// rtag tu 'dar zhing skra 'byin te// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten 'gon po bdag la gsom// sAd ya the dam/ sid dwe su sid d+he/
232a2(mdo): sa a re a ra ne/ ba le ma hA ba le/ dzam b+he/ dza Di le/ a kha ne sa kha ne/ la kha ne/ Tha rad te/ ha ri bing ga le/ ti ming gi le/ ti ming gi lA ni swA hA// / bdag gi sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur da cig/ rgyal po chen po rnam
232a3(mdo): thos kyi bu'i mying dang stobs dang / dbang phyug dang byin gyis bdag bde legs su gyur da cig swA ha// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
232a4(mdo): btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar dan sa/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad sa bdag gi 'khor dri za'i gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul ki mtshan ma ni 'di
232a5(mdo): lnga bu lags te/ ku len cing bro rdung ste// rgyan rnams la yang dka' bar bgyid// brkam pa ma mchis mang bar smra// dgod par bgyid cing nA bar 'gyur// skom par 'gyur la dmyig dmar te// rtag tu rims kyis
232a6(mdo): 'debs par bgyid// myig kyang 'byed par myi bgyid de// rgyab kyis phyogs shang nyal bar bgyid/ de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten 'gon po bdag la gson// s+yad ya the dan/ a khye ma zhe/ bi na khe/ b+han d+he/ ba ra de
232a7(mdo): tsa ba le ba le/ ba ka me/ a 'i le/ ba chu le/ ba kan da le/ bzhe bsha pa ti swA hA// rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung gi myong dang stobs dang dbang phyug dang / byi gis bdag gdon thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las thar dpa
232a8(mdo): gyur da cig swA hA// de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po stan las langs te/ pra kos phrag pa gcig tu gza ma nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i skabs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba nas/ @tso/
232a9(mdo): ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdas kyi 'khom yi dgas grub bum gis zin pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ shirang du skom pas 'debs par 'gyur// g.yer bas
232b1(mdo): btab cing lta bar 'gyur// bzhin yang dmar por gda' bar 'gyur// bskums nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur// kha dog ngan cing lus kyang skam// skra dang sen mo ring ba ste// dri ma can la dI myi gda'// rdzun dad kyal ba smra bar
232b2(mdo): bgyid// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten 'gon po bdag la gson// s+yad ya the dan/ kha kha Sha me/ Sha la ni/ kha lo mai/ kha ra li/ Sha ra li/ ka ra we/ ka shi ne/ ka ra T+Te/ kA le ka mi ni/ bi ba le/ bi d+h+we/

232b4(mdo): te/ bla kos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha dra sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar da nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to//
232b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor klu 'dab bzangs kyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te// skyigs bu 'deb sa shing dbugs kyang 'byin// de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur//

232b7(mdo): sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten 'gon po bdag la gson// s+yad ya the dam/ kra ga ye/ kra ga ye/ kra ka se/ kru sha me/ kru ge/ krug ka me/ kru ge/ a ga le na ga le/ sa ma ga le/ ku su me// a la ke/ ka la ke/
232b8(mdo): i ri mi ri d+hi rai/ a ru ka pa ti// rgyal po chen po myag myi bzang gi mying dang stobs dang / dbang phyug dang byin gis bdag bde legs su gyur da cig swa hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra
232b9(mdo): bsgrags pa/ nga mi stobs bcu dang ldan zhing / myi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa myed pa ste/ 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra khyu mchog lta bu rgya chen po yang dag par bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro// sde dang mthu dang /
233a1(mdo): bzhon bcas pa'i// bdud kyang gcig gis rab tu btul// sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir// rigs sngags thams cad pal nyon// s+yad ya the dam/ a sang ge/ khad ga ba te/ ba la nir g+ho She shu re/ Ur/
233a2(mdo): d+ha re/ badz+ra ka me/ badz+ra dA re/ stam b+he dwi Na sA re/ bi ra dze/ be g+ha se/ ba nA kra prA ba te/ a ra ne/ d+har ma uka te/ di shi bi kU sh+tse// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang stobs dang / dbang phyug ki u dang byin kis bdage bde
233a3(mdo): su gyur da cig sA hA// phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag/ sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas// 'jigs dang skrag dang sngangs kyur da te// thal mo sbyar nga nas 'bor par gyur pa// 'byung po'i tshogs ni lhag ma rnams/
233a4(mdo): sngags 'khrugs rod rod por gyur nas// phyogs bcur rab tu 'byer byed cing // skra bo che yang sgrogs par byed// rgyal po chen pos de shes nas// gsang ba gsum ni yang dag smra// kye ma rigs sngags rigs
233a5(mdo): sngags che// stong chen rab tu 'jom byed pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni ga/ sungs pa de// thos nas 'byung po skrag 'gyur da te// dper na rab tu la/ bar mye dang // til mar dar btags ral gri bzhin// 'go'u ta mas ni rab

233a8(mdo): 'gyur ba ni// mar dang nyungs kar myes blugs bzhin// gnod sbyin chad par bsdigs nas su// de dag bde ba myi rnyed de// de'i rtse ba logs g.yas par ni// 'bras chen dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pas ma/
233a9(mdo): sha bkra nad kyis btab par 'gyur// srang lo can gi pho brang bu// gzhar yang 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// lus ngan grags dang ldan pa'i// khyim yang mthong bar myi 'gyur te// 'byung po mang po 'tshogs pa na// stan yang 'thob par gyi lu

233b2(mdo): yis// de'i lce ni gcod par 'gyur// mtshon cha shi nad tu rnon po yas// de'i sde dang rna ba gcod// 'khor lo spu gri so 'dra bas// klad pa rab tu gsheg par byed// tho ba lugs kyis bkris pa yis// de'i snying la 'jom par byed// 6
233b3(mdo): dang khrag ni dron po dag/ de'i kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur// rigs sngags zhags pa chud pa yis// rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na// 'khor ba gnod sprin dkyil 'khor du// de nyid du mi 'khor bar 'gyur// rgyal po chen po dpal ldan pa/
233b4(mdo): phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur nga nas// chos kyi go cha bgos gyur da te// bzang po'i khri la 'dug pa ni// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyog/ sa na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni myog myi bzang // byang phyogs

234a1(mdo): cag snying las chung byed pa// myi'o skye dgu gnod par 'gyur// tshangs pa lon tshig thos nas// 'jig rten skyong gis tshig spras pa// tshangs pa chen po de bzhin no// thub pa chen po de bzhin no// bdag gis
234a2(mdo): sari rab bskul byas shing // sa yang rnam par bzlog byas la// rgya mtsho la ni thub pa rnams// rnam par sbyang ba nyid du bya// 'gas pa dam po ma nyams pas// nyi ma zla ba rlung rnams dang // skar ma dag ni thams cad kyang // bdag

234a5(mdo): 'dra ba'i 'khor// kun tu chad pas bsdigs byas te// 'jig rten 'gro/ na po'i spyad dang ni// yang dag par yang mchod par bgyi// gang gi 'byung / bo la dkyil 'khor kun// 'di bshad pa na myi nyand pa// de dag chad pa
234a6(mdo): bshad bya ba// tshangs pas sprul da pa'i mdo sde'o// sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// phan tshun du ni lta byas na// bye du n+ya dang gser dbus de ra// mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang // spug dang rdo'i snying po dang //
234a7(mdo): rim chen bdud gis brgyan pa'i// rtsibs song 'dog gser 'dra ba'i// shing rta rnam pa bzhi byas pa// bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste// rdzu 'phrul kyis ni mkhal la 'gro// rgyal po dag ni der zhugs nas// 'thung tshom gyis/
234a8(mdo): 'khor nyid du dong // sa ni ke ser gi phye ma dang // me tog dag gis bkang byas nas// mgul par ltung dang skud pa dang // 'gas pa dag kyang gdags byos la// phyogs kyi sa ni jo snyed pa'i// 'byung po thams cad khring shog ces// rga
234a9(mdo): sbyi gi ni sde dpon kun// phyogs bzhi dag tu bkye ba byas// stod rten rab tu 'jom pa'i// mdo sde'i no dam pa 'di// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar du 'byung // lha rnams kun gyis rnam par bsams// stong chen po'i lus kyis su//
234b1(mdo): gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul// lus ngan po'i cho ga thos nas// gnod sbyin gi ni sde dpon dong // phyogs bzhi dag dong nas su// gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// dri za las byung gdon kyi rnams// shar phyogs
234b2(mdo): chan 'khor pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba lnga'i sa bsdams pa'i// 'byung po mang po nga la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad // grul bum las byung gdon gyi rnams// lho phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo
234b3(mdo): sngo'i zhags pas de dag kum// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa'i// 'byung po mang po nga la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nye bu brkyang // klu las gnod du gyurd pa rnams// nub phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde zhags pas de dag
234b4(mdo): kun// bcing lnga'is bsdams pa'i// 'byung po mang po dra la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// gnod sbyin las ni gdodan gyur da pa// byang phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba lnga
234b5(mdo): bsdams pa'i// 'byung po mang po ngal nyon// lus ngan po'i bu tho bo// kun tu rgyal ba myis zhon// de'i drung ma 'khod pa'i// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag/ bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags
234b6(mdo): pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu gnyis pa// skyed pa po zhes rnam yA/ gas pa// de'i drung na 'khod pa'i// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams// ba cing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs
234b7(mdo): de nyid kyi ni bu gsum pa// de'i mying ni gdon po che// de'i drung na 'khod pa'i// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag/ bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu bzhi pa// de'i mying ni bum bu'i
234b8(mdo): lto// de'i drung na 'khod pa'i// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// dbang phyug chen po lha chen po// lag bzhi po la stobs po che// de'i drung na 'a
234b9(mdo): pa'i// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// 'byung po 'jom pa'i ri la ni// 'byung po thams cad lhags na su// rigs sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas//
235a1(mdo): rigs sngags 'di ni kun tu bsams// chad pa myi bzad drag po ste// kang phyir sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// ko'u ta ma la gus par ni// thams cad 'di la skyabs su dong // g.yo myed par ni rjes zhugs shing //
235a2(mdo): thams cad myed par gyur da ta me// de nas thang cig tsam gis ni// 'byung po thams cad lhag 'byas/ ri rnams dang ni g.yang sa dang // rgya mtsho dang ni mtsho rnams dang // klung dang 'bab chu yum dang // dpa' klong dag mgar 'khod dang // bskyed/
235a3(mdo): mos tshal dang gzhal myed 'ang // kun dgal dang ni nags rnams dang // mchod rten gnas dang grong gi gnas// shing ljon dru bar kang gnas dang // grong khyer sgo dang grong dang ni// grong rdas dang ni spongs rnams dang // rgyal po'i pho brang sgo rnam
235a4(mdo): dang // gzhal myed 'ban gang gnas dang // dkyil 'khor dag dang dur khro da dang // de bzhin lha gang rnams dang ni// mtshams dang sho gas gnas rnams dang // kha stong dang ni grams dang // gnod sbyin gang rnams bu 'og dang /
235a5(mdo): bzhi dang ni 'tshams rnams nas// gnod sbyin bye ba stong rnams ni// rigs sngags zhags pas bkug pa rnams// rdza rnga dag ni brdungs na sa su// sa las rnga zlum dag ni brdungs// pi yang gling bu khar ba'i
235a6(mdo): stobs chen rnams ni sgra 'byi nad te// rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang // glu dang gar rnams byas nas su// dbang po zla ba chu zla dang // bArang+ga dza skye dgu'i bdag/ ma ldan ma dang kun tu lta// mngon shes
235a7(mdo): gangs can rdzogs pa dang // can dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang // mgul pa mdzes dang mgus nyes dang // skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang // lga las byung ba'im ldan dang // dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// myi rgyal rgyal ba
235a8(mdo): khru mchog dang // de bzhin phung bu lnga zhus bya// gseras dang riganyi bar dang // nya ldibs dang ni ras gri bu// kun kyi bzhes dang grags 'dzind dang // 'brog kunas dpad sri bzungs dang // khab na dang ni ri sul 'a/
235a9(mdo): lnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzangs dag/ sde dang dpung dang bzhon par bcas// lha dang klu dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po snga ma yin// nyin gsum po'i sto byed dang // de bzhin bzhi pa rims dag dang // 'jig
235b1(mdo): rten 'tshe ba gang yin dang // gnod sbyin srin po ma rungs rnams// phyogs bzhi nas ni bkug nas su// bcing ba lnga'i sa bcing ba rnams// 'jig rten 'gon po'i spyan sngar ru// thal sbyar 'khod nas 'di skad
235b2(mdo): spras// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gi ni markun rgyug la// 'byung po gnod sbyin lus
235b3(mdo): po che// lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa// rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig pa// rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang // rkang pa basbeng la sgye'u chugs dang // lus mang 'go bo gcig pa dang // lus po gcig la 'go bzhi dang /
235b4(mdo): myig mangs po la lus phyed dang // myi cig lton bcu gnyis dang // bong bu rnga mo glang chen 'gro// lag pa bsgreng la 'go btud dang // mtshon ca'i so dang / mtshon cha'i lag/ mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin po rnams// zangs kyi
235b5(mdo): sma dang zangs kyi so// zangs kyi myig dang zangs kyi lag/ zad // sa kyi tho ba rkang pa dang // zangs kyi sna dang lcags kyi kha// rka lag/ kun tu 'bar ba dang // myi'i lus su gnas pa rnams// skur zhar
235b6(mdo): lba ba gsum yod pa// myig myi sdug la kha gla lad pa// chu srin stag gi gzugs dang ni/ gzugs myi sdug la kha ral po// mchu 'phyangs po dang so yon po// rab tu gtum po khro gnyer can/
235b7(mdo): gsus po che dang bum na po// rnam phyangs pa dang rna bgyed// lag rings dang rin pa ring // sna'i rtse dpalag rtse ring // lus skam sus ni ring ba dang // skra rings rab tu brgyan pa dang // rkang ngas myed pa phra ba dang // dring
235b8(mdo): ba dang bum lto bo// yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang // gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lho// gan ma lto bo la rna bo che// gyen du rdzes skra rab tu dmar// mgo bo che la gzhu mgrin po// skem mo srur po bum lto po// ri rab rtse mo
235b9(mdo): bstsal nas su// me bdag gi ni char pa 'bebs// ljon shing mi dang rdo ba dang // sprin gi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra' ba// dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang // grul bus rnga bran rnams kyi sgra// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu
236a1(mdo): 'byinang // mying po chel phung bu'i sgra// nag po sngon po ser po dang // dmam ser me ltar dmar ser dang / khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gyi'i sgra// dmar po'i khrag gis bskus pa rnams// myi mo dag ni khyer nas su/
236a2(mdo): za bzhin du ni rnam par chug/ so non lag pa dmar po dang // mchu ni khrag gis bsdus pa dang // sus phyed dag ni zos pa dang // mkhal ma snying dang nang krol gis// snyim bzhin tu bkang ba' dang // byin
236a3(mdo): pa dag ni za bzhin du// mer mer po dang srog chags kyi// rka lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog/ keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su// skye bo mang po skrag par byed// khrag gis rab tu bkang ba'i//
236a4(mdo): rtsi'i lags pa thogs nas su// gyi ba'ang drug gis kun bslus tre// phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par thug/ grong the rnams kyi rdo ka dang // khyim nas khyim durnams par 'thor// rlung dang ban gam pa'i
236a5(mdo): pa rnams// phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrugs par byed// de shA/ den rgyal po'i// gdor dang 'jigs pa chen po gnas// lhags pa/ de dag thams cad kyang // rigs sngags zhugs pas rab tu bsams
236a6(mdo): 'phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog rgya da la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// grong khyer grong dang yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor du rgyu ba ni/
236a7(mdo): gnod sbyin ma chungs mdangs 'phrog pa// snying de myed cing zhag 'thung ba// lus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste// stobs po med sA yang me// mgrim bcu po la myig stong ngo po// gdon chen myig dmam po rnams
236a8(mdo): // 'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste// lag na mtshon pogs rab tu 'jigs// sbrul gi pags pa thogs pa dang // lag bzhi lag na sngon ma thogs// lag na mtshon dang dbyig pa thogs/
236a9(mdo): rje mdung rtse lag thogs pas// rab tu zag pa'i dmag zhal nas// phyogs kun tu na skrag par byed/ sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa'i// gas pa po ni dang kun kyang // myi'i 'jig rten 'di sa
236b1(mdo): tu// skyes pa bud myed gzhan yang 'dzinang // sha khrag dron por bcas pa la// rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs/ seng ge dang ni stag dang rta// mnye ba lang pong bu rnga// glang po che'i gzugs 'a
236b2(mdo): dang // dom dang gzig dang s+yAd kyi dang // khyi dngawa dpar ngag dang // byi la byi ba spre'u khyi gzugs/ ba se dang phag dang sre mo dang / nya dang ru sbal dag gi gzugs/ la gcig dag ni sram gi gzugs/
236b3(mdo): khwa dpa'ug pa zhu byug dang // bya rgod khwa dang nya mying bcas/ ma bya dang pa thi ba dang // khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang / kha gcig bya gag gzugs rnams su/ gnod sbyin rnams ni myo 'os mthong // 'dab
236b4(mdo): bzangs bya'i tshul gis kyang // skye bo mang po skrag par byed// kha cig myi'i 'gro can la// lus ni bya gag bong bu 'dra / kha cig ma tshon gis rab tu gtse// lus dang bral ba dag tu sdang /
236b5(mdo): rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos// rgyu ma'i 'phreng ba sa kun tu dkris// rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing // srog chags rnams la gnod par byed// myi bzad pa'i dbugs/
236b6(mdo): 'byin cing // skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed// srog chags rgyud ni ji snyed par// sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs// la la ral gi 'khor lo thogs/
236b7(mdo): grangs ni brgya phrag stong rnams te// dbyug pas bsdigs shing 'drag po// myig 'byung ba la bzhin myi sdug/ srin po so ni rdo ba dang // sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang // skye chad gdo bar gnyer ba can// rka lag dag
236b8(mdo): ni gtubs pa dang // mgo bo bcad pa'i srin po rnams// skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed// sdig pa can rnams gzi byir 'phrog/ myi dag gi ni sus rnams la// rab tu rtsa ba'i gdon tu sdang // spu'i bar dang gdang
236b9(mdo): rnams dang // de bzhin ma'i kha rnams su// lpags pa de dag thams cad kyang // rigs sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'amal skyes bu mchog la// thal mo sbya ra
237a1(mdo): nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang // de bzhin kho ra khor yug dang // bya rgod phung po bshol mda' 'dzin// spos dang ngad ldan gangs kyi ri// sna tshogs brtsegs dang /
237a2(mdo): ban Da pA// na la da'i ri gnyis dang // dpal gi ri'i rtse mo ni// gang dag gi nang tu 'thor 'phags dang // ri bo do dag kun la yang // swa dang drang srong gang gnas pa// de dag thams cad myi dka' zhing // 'jigs pa'i yid kyis mya ngan byed/
237a3(mdo): bye ba gong gi lha dag dang // bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang // lha'i bu mo rgal chen dag/ thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byed// thag bzangs rib dang sgra gcan dang // sim par byed pa'ang der phyi rang to// wa byin bye brag spyod dang // lha sbyin
237a4(mdo): bye ba phrag brgya dang // de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa// mang po kun kyang thul mo sbyor// rab tu gnas dang rgya mtsho dang // klu'i rgyal po gzin dang // klu'i rgyal po ma dros dang // dga' bo nye dka' gnyis
237a5(mdo): po dang // rdo rje'i blo gros pa ga shu dang // gang ga dga' bo sa ni/ du mtsho// bya'i rgyal po 'ang ba bzangs dang // rgya mtsho chen po 'khru ga byed dang // stong phrag bye ba klu'i rnams// bye ba brgya'i klu
237a6(mdo): dag dang // de dag bu mo skal chen rnams// thal mo rab tu sbyar bar byed// nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka yang // skar ma'i 'khor kyis yongs su bskor // gser gyi me tog yan lag ni// ma ga
237a7(mdo): dar 'jigs byed pa// gso ba'i mtha' na gyi thod can// ko sa lan rab tu dkar// bzang po'i yul ma khab smanan// gyad kye yul na grags pa 'dzid // lnga 'je nang par skrag byed pa// ha skye ba ma phyag dmar
237a8(mdo): gnas// srung byed pa na ser skya ste// sems pa na ni myo ge ser po// be'u la par bum pa'i lto// dga' bo'i yul ni ring por skyes// ba lang 'dzin na rab tu 'joms// dung yul mni nyi ma'i grogs// ljongs chen dzas
237a9(mdo): kyi gnod sbyi ro// brjod pa 'icu drug de dag dang / lag rdo rje gnod sbyin che// chos myong rab tu dgar ba dang // ser sbyar ba ma dzes byab 'jug dang / chum so gsum pa zlus po dang // chu min bded pa 'ang ba dang /
237b1(mdo): lnga ldan rgyal ba khyu mchog dang // gnod sbyin chen po dbang phyug che// ldag pa bzhi can stobs po che// sde dpa' rab tu 'dul ba naM// mthu bo che la stobs po che// gshin rje na ni ma sa// bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa dang
237b2(mdo): gnod sbyin bye ba'i g.yogra 'chang ba// gnod sbyin de mying 'phrog po yin// sha ri ta nI sder bcas dang // ri'i bu mo gnod sbyin ma// gzi brjid chen mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'phrog ma zhes kyang grags pa
237b3(mdo): dang // gdol pa nu mo na gtum mo yang // bu rnams lnga brgyas bskor da pa dang // myi rdung nag po kar kra ti// pad ma dang nai pad ma can// me tog so dang sa ka dang // srin mo bong bu rna can dang // tsan dan dang ni khyab
237b4(mdo): 'jug len// seng ge ser skya dmar ser po// glang po klu'i sa can dang // ri bshes drag po'i mche ba can// srin mo so bzangs yo da pa dang // tshangs pa len deng khyab 'jug len// gnod sbyin
237b5(mdo): ha la ha la dang // gnod sbyin rnam pa'i mchu can dag/ ma du/ nga dang mda' gzhu kun thogs shing // myi rta ba yang ri dgas rnam sa// za shing 'tshe ba de dag ni// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyug ci
237b6(mdo): 'dod/ sa 'di rab tu g.yo bar byed// nags tshal rnams kyang rab tu skyems// ri rnams kun nas g.yo bar byed// skye dgu 'di dag 'tshe byed cing // phan tshun nas ni 'du ba dag/ rig sngags
237b7(mdo): kyis ni drangs nas lhags// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'gon gyi spyan snga ru/
237b8(mdo): de dag lhags par gyur da pa dang // de nas rgyal po rnam thos bus// 'jig rten 'gon la 'di skad gsol// bdag gi phyogs cha byang logs su// rgyal po'i gnas su sprul pa ni// lcang lo ldan pa yid du mchi//
237b9(mdo): de bas bdag ni lcang lo'i bdag/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can// lha rnams kun gyis bsams par gyur // phyir shi nang tu mthon po can// rin can kun gyis brgya nad pa lags// 'phang du dpag tshad bcu drug ste/
238a1(mdo): gser gyi rgyu las bgyis pa lags// phyogs bzhi'i tsog ni re re la yang // gnod sbyin rdo rje 'chang ba dag/ kun nas rab tu gnas par gyurd// la ka na mtshon cha legs par sprul // rgyal po'i tshe
238a2(mdo): zang de'i sgo// bzhi po btod pa bgyis pa ni// gcig ni ka ser las byas pa'i sgo// gnyis pa dngul las bgyis pa ste// gsum pa shel kyi ske mo lags// bzhi pa gser gyis rnam par spras// grong khyer de'i
238a3(mdo): nang dag na// bskyed mos tshal gyi me tog rgyas// de'i nang na gzhal myed khang // rin cen bdun rgyu sna tshogs mchis// rin cen sna tshogs ljon shing can// bya bran sna tshogs skad kyang 'byind// me tog sna tshogs
238a4(mdo): legs par bkra so// sna tshogs spos kyis thugs pa legs/ gnod sbyin mo ni 'jom dang // klu dang rol mos rab tu brgya dang // dpal gyi dam pas nyams su myong // der ni 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor der
