258a3(mdo): nabar 'dug kam/ sAl gis zin tam/ drug 'thungs sam/ 'jigs pa thams cad 'dus pa nas nga sengs bya'o// rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhrim pa las gyu rang ba dang / bad kun las gyur dpa
258a4(mdo): dang / 'dus pa lus kyu ring pa dang / nad bzhi brgyam bzhi lasanang kang yang rung bas btab par gyur pa dang / 'phongs bar gyu rang ban yang shin patu yid la bya'o// de ci'i phyir
258a5(mdo): zhen/ kud dka' bo bsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas phra bar/ 'gyur ro// chud pas bcad pa'i rigs pa ni gzhu 'chog gi sa so// ka zhu bcog pa'i rigs pas ni spyo bas so//
258a6(mdo): pa'i rigs pas ni dam bcas pas so// dam bcas pa'i klas pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so// su zing zhes pa'i rigs sa ni de bzhin du tha rang bar 'gyur te/ de'i ning thams ca
258a7(mdo): kyang ldog par 'gyur ro// kun dka' bo rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig snang so la bya'o// tad+ya thA/ rtse mig la mi li/ ki li mi li/ ki tu mu'u le/ bu sa dwe Te/ Tu sa ra Ni/ bu da ra Ni/ ke bad Te/
258a8(mdo): bad Ta ke/ mu'u le/ i ti sha ba le/ dum be/ prI yang ka re/ a bad Te/ pa ri ba da Te/ lhas kun tu chu sar pa'i char po bshig/ na mo bA ga ba te id Tid ta ye/ in dra ko ma so kA ya/ a sha ne/ pa sha na ne/ pA pa ni
258a9(mdo): ku'u le/ ka pi li mad te/ i li mod te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur da cig swA hA// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rigs sngam
258b1(mdo): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bsrung ba bgyis shi / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang /
258b2(mdo): dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur da cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo rag sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis
258b3(mdo): bsrung bar byas shing / sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spangs pa dang / dug gzhis
258b4(mdo): ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / 'tshams bcad pa dang / swa bcing ba byas pa la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir/ 'ong ba 'am/ sga 'am/ lha mo 'am/ lha'i bu pho 'am/ lha'i bu mo 'am/ lha rgan po 'am/

258b9(mdo): lding mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi bu pho 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding rgan po 'am/ nam mkha' lding rgan mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding ki 'khor po'am/
259a1(mdo): nam mkha' lding gi 'khor mo 'am/ dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri ba'i bu po 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za rgan po 'am/ dri za rgan po 'am/ dri za'i 'khor po 'am/ dri za'i 'khor Sh+Tam// myi 'am ci 'am/

259a8(mdo): nan po 'am/ 'thung ba yin mo 'am/ 'byung po'i khor po 'am/ 'byung po la 'khor mo 'as/ mus bu ma 'am/ sus sum mo 'am/ mul bus kyi bu 'am/ bul bram gi bu mo 'am/ yul dum yi nang po 'am/

259b7(mdo): gnon po'i rgan mo 'am/ gnon po'i 'khor po 'am/ gnon po'i 'khor mo 'am/ las 'gu' yang 'ong bar ngas lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcus pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu
259b8(mdo): dang bcas pa/ lha dang myi dang l+h+wa ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo // glags tshol bar 'dod cing glags ltan yang glags myi rnyed de/ sma ni lnga 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ kru ni klu 'du ba'i
259b9(mdo): gnas su ma yin/ lha ma yin ni lha ma yin 'du ba'i gan su ma yin/ rlung lha ni rlung lha 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ nam mkha' lding ni nam mkha' lding 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ dri za na dri za 'du ba'i
260a1(mdo): gnas su ma yin/ myi 'am ci ni myo'am ci 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ lto 'phye chen po ni lto 'phye chen po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ gnod sbyin ni gnod sbyin 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin

260a9(mdo): sba ba dang yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde logs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon ma spong ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang /

260b5(mdo): tum ba/ a De na De/ tai la kun tsa nA Ne/ i li kaM si/ nga se mas can thams cad la byams pas lhas zla ba dku 'am zla ba bcur kun tu char phob shig// bu sa De/ bu dA ra Ni/ ke bad Te

260b8(mdo): rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas// rgyal ba gtsug tor pad ma dkar po'i drung // thams cad skyob pa sa la'i drung na gnas// bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shi ri sha'i drung // sangs rgyas gser thub u
260b9(mdo): dum ba ra'i drung // 'od srung n+ya gro da'i drung na gnas// shag kya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du// phyi nad nas byang chub thob gyur da ko'u ta ma// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la// mngon par dang
261a1(mdo): pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag// lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgu gyurd nas// rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar 'gyur ba byos// tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ ki li tsi li/ ke le bo le/ u du ra su du mo de/ bu sa ra/ hu hu/ ka ra rbe

261a3(mdo): myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa ste/ kun dga' bo gang sman chen po de dag gi mying

261b8(mdo): phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bcas/ ma ngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas

262a3(mdo): cad kyi bdag po/ 'khor grul bum 'bumo phrag du mi yod pa/ grul bu mi rnams la dbang byed du 'jug bya gnas te/ gang lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed po de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang

262a8(mdo): thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor 'bum phrag du ma yod pa/ klu thams cad la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/ kang nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de sang bu dang bcas// tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang
262a9(mdo): bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bcas/ ma ngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rog sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gis shig/

262b3(mdo): bi dru ma ti// hu hu/ hu hu/ hu hu/ hu hu/ ru ru/ ru ru/ ru ru/ ru ru/ tsu nu/ tsu tsu/ tsu tsu/ tsu tsu ts+yaH/ tsa tsa/ tsaH/ tsa tsa/ dzu sA hA// kun dga' bo byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam
262b4(mdo): thos kyi bu zhes bya ba/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor ka/ nod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma yod pa/ gnod sbyin thams cad dbang bye da du 'jug pa gnas te/ gang byang phyogs srung zhing yongs su

262b6(mdo): 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'das bad ga la bsrung ba gis shig/ spa ba dang yongs su bskyab pa dang / yo ngas su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde
262b7(mdo): legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / 'tshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gis shig/ lo brgyar 'tsho bar gyur da cing / ston brgya
262b8(mdo): mthong bar sho ka shi ka/ ta d+ya thA/ so ra so rI/ shi ri shi ri/ mi ti hi ra/ hri ri/ ma ti ki ri re/ hi ri ri/ pe lu ping ka le/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+hun d+hu ma ti/ rka tam ba Shan/ d+hun du ma ti sA hA/ shar phyogs na
262b9(mdo): ni yul 'khor srung / lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ nub phyogs na ni myig myi bzang / byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po 'di bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// phyogs bzhi
263a1(mdo): dag ni skyong bar byed// sde bo che la stobs po che// pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 'joms// gzhan gyis myi thub thul bar dka'// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan

276b8(mdo): pa ta pa nA/ dA ma rA ma na/ sa ra sa ra nA/ ku ti ku ti/ mu Ti mu Ti/ ma ti ma ti/ sa ra sa ra/ ha ra ka ra/ ti ri ti ri/ dA dA da dA dA/ bA bA bA bA bA/ hA la ha la ha la ha la ha la/ sid d+hi/ sid d+hi/ sid b+hI/ sid/
276b9(mdo): d+hi/ sA sti/ swa sti/ swa sti/ swa sti// spod gtong dang / gshin rje'i pho nya dang / mtshan mo nag mo dang / dus kyi zhags pa dang / 'chi bdag gi chad pa dang / tshangs pa'i ched pa dang / dbang pon
277a1(mdo): chad pa dang / drang srong gi chad pa dang / lha'i chad pa dang / klu'i chad pa dang / lha ma yin gi chad pa dang / rlung lha'i chad pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi chad pa dang / dri za'i chad pa dang / myi 'am ci'i chad pa dang / lto 'phye

277a3(mdo): byed kyi chad pa dang / smyo byed kyi chad pa dang / grib gnon gi chad pa dang / brjed byed kyi chad pa dang / gnon po'i chad pa dang / ro langs kyi chad pa dang / rgyal po'i ched da dang / chom rkun gyi chad pa dang / mye'i chad pa dang / chu'i chang pa

277a6(mdo): rje se la da dang / klung gi rgyal po gya gyu dang / krung gi rgyal po rgyas 'bab dang / klung gi rgyal po brgya 'bab dang / klung gi rgyal po zhags bral dang / klu nga gi rgyal po sa ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po zla ba'i cha dang / klu gi rgyal po
277a7(mdo): dbyangs can dang / klung gi rgyal po ru sbal can dang / krud kyi rgyal po chu dron can dang / klung gi rgyal po chu mchog can dang / krung gi rgyal po zangs mngab dang / krung gi rgyal po sbrang rtsi can dang / klung gi rgyal po sba ldan dang / rlung gi rgyal po
277a8(mdo): bu ram shing ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po ba lang ldan dang / klu'i rgyal po pags pa can dang / klung gi rgyal po rtse sbyin dang / krung gi rgyal po mdza bzangs dang / kyang gi rgyal po kun gi bshes dang / klung gi rgyal po 'chi myed dang / rlung
277a9(mdo): gi rgyal po mye tog ma dang / chung gi rgyal po lnga len dang / krung gi rgyal po dngas bzang dang / klu gi rgyal po rab babang dang / klung gi rgyal po bka' thub sbyin dang / klung gi rgyal po bral dang / klung gis rgyal po skyon bral dang

277b2(mdo): 'bab pa'i chu klung de dag thams cad la/ gang dag rgyun tu gnas pa gzugs tha dad pa/ gzugs myi sdug pa/ gzugs mang ba/ gzugs mtha' yas pa/ 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can/ gzugs sna tshogs pa

281a2(mdo): 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gis shig/ sba ba dang yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhis
281a3(mdo): ba dang / dug gsad pa gI shig/ lo brgyar 'tsho bar gyur da cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis shing ljon pa' chen po rnams kyi mying zung shig/ 'di lta ste ljon pa chen po gser zhes bya ba dang /
281a4(mdo): shing ljon pa chen po gser skya zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po khyab gnas zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po spre'u gnas shes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po ser
281a5(mdo): po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya ba/ dang / shing ljon pa chen po rna ldan byed ces bya ba dang / shing lho na pa chen po rgyas byed ces bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po bal
281a6(mdo): ba zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po tsu ta zhes bya ba dang / nga ljon pa chen po na tsu ta zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po de da ka dang / gzhan dag la lha gang dag gnas pa de dag gis kyang
281a7(mdo): rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo ma bya chen mo 'dis bdag sa bsrung ba kyis shig/ lo brgyar 'tsho bar gyur da cig/ snron brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo ma bya chen mo 'di ni/ yang dag
281a8(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ 'di lta sde yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs shing rjes su myi ring ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
281a9(mdo): rgyas gtsug tor can gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis
281b1(mdo): gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o//
281b2(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo cho bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang bshad cing rjes su
281b3(mdo): yi rang ba'o// myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang smras shing rjes su
281b4(mdo): si rang ba'o// dri za'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras shing rjes su yaM rang ba'o// grul bum gyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos kyang smras shing rjes su yaM rang ba'o// klu'i rgyal po chen
281b5(mdo): po myag myi bzang gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// ga/ nod sbyin gi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus kyang smras shing rjes/ su yi rang ba'o// dri za'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gru
281b6(mdo): bum gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon nyi shu cha brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen po lnga sa chen dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can gis smras shing
281b7(mdo): rjes su ri rang ba'o// kun dga' bo rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni lha'i ge don dang / klu'i gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / lha ma yin ki ka don dang / nam mkha' lding gi gla don dang / dri za'i gdon
281b8(mdo): dang / myi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / me dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul
281b9(mdo): po'i gdon dang / skyes byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gi ka don dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon gyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// gdon thams cad kyis 'gal bar
282a1(mdo): nas yi pa'o// ga'i byi 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mangs pa ga rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtos pa ga rnams dang / zas sug za ga rnams dang / zas su zag 'thung
282a2(mdo): rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas
282a3(mdo): su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su bsreg bya za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su phyis za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams
282a4(mdo): dang gzas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang / zas mu rar sA sa za ba rnams dang / zas mu snrubs zla ba rnams dang / zas su skrag sa za ba rnams dang // rgyu ma nga/ cu gyi ca ma
282a5(mdo): dang / zas su gtor thung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams kyisas 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// gshed byed dang / sgyur ba'i// las dang / byung dang g.yengs byed dang / ro langs dang
282a6(mdo): sems sgyur ba dang / spyod gtong dang / bza' nyes dang / skrag nyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod bltas dang / bri nye sa dang / bgoms nyes dang / spang ba rnams kyis 'gal bar
282a7(mdo): bya ba ma yin no// rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyid gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyid bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / nyi ma phyed pa dang / nyin mo pa dang
282a8(mdo): yud tsam pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rims drag po dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa lngas kyu rad pa dang / badra ka na las gyurd pa dang / 'dus pa las gyurd pas
282a9(mdo): 'gal bar bya ba mo yin pa'o// rims thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// glad pa na pa dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / myig nang dang / sna nang dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang /
282b1(mdo): snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lton pa dang / mazhur ba na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu skye gnas na ba dang /
282b2(mdo): brlan pa dang / byin pa na ba dang / laka pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na bas 'gal bar bya ba me yin yo'o/ shu ba dang g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu 'phra mo dang / mdze dang 'bras dang / phol myis
282b3(mdo): dang / g.yan pa dang / me dpal dang / ldog pa rnams kyis 'gal bar byang ba ma yin pa'o// nad thams cad dang / dug thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad thams
282b4(mdo): cad dang / 'thab pa dang chod pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// kun dga' bo gang zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di
282b5(mdo): la 'gal bar byas na/ lag na rdo rjes de'i 'go tshal ba bdun du 'gems par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems da/ pa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos thams cad kyi gza
282b6(mdo): brjid kyis de'i snang ba ma rung bar 'gyur/ sems ma rung bar 'a gyur ro// 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la bslus par 'gyur ro/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang gshu ra zhes bya ba la thug pa'i
282b7(mdo): bar ki/ gsang sngags rnams kyis bde la sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang sum bcu rtsa'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ rdo rjes de'i 'gro 'gems par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i
282b8(mdo): ka zi brjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor pa thal bar klog par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo su zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bsrung ba byas sam/ skud pa btags na de bsang pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas
282b9(mdo): za bar 'gyur ro// chad pas bcad pa'i rigs pa ni kazhu bcog pas so// gzhu bcog pa'i rigs pas ni brkyang bkag pas so// brgyad bkag pa'i rigs pa ni dam bcas pas so// dam bcas pa'i rigs
283a1(mdo): pa ni spu zing zhes byed pas so// spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni de bzhin du tha rad par 'gyur ro// de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa myi 'byung / mye'i 'jigs pa
283a2(mdo): myi 'byung / chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la dug gis myi tshugs so/ mtshon kyis kyang ma yin no// bde bar gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ro// bde ba dang / gnod pa myed pa
283a3(mdo): dang / 'jigs pa myed par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / dgra tshoms par 'gyur ro// smras pa myed par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// bde bar yun ring du yang
283a4(mdo): 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// kun dka' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam parasmin pa ni ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ma bya chen mo 'di mi ha cang char che ba 'am char dgon pa'i tshe klag par
283a5(mdo): bya'o// des na klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/ char che na ni/ gcod par byed/ char dkon pa'i tshe ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsam pa ji srid par char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/
283a6(mdo): kun dga' bo rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang dgra thams cad zhi bar 'gyur na/ sus dum pur ma gyurd cing rdzogs par bcangs pa 'am bde legs
283a7(mdo): su 'gyur ba byas pa lnga spos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ma bya chen mo 'di zung shig/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnas
283a8(mdo): bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / swa ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa kun chub par gis shig// chongs shig sgrogs shig/ tad+ya thA/ yam pa ti/ dA ba tI/
283a9(mdo): raki/ ku lu/ du lu me swA hA/ 'a ga ni lnga gti ga de na ta sa su ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug myed pa// sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ de dag 'jig
283b1(mdo): rten dug gsum ste/ bcom ldan chos ni dug myed pa/ chos kyi bden pas dug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ bcom ldan dge 'dun drug myed pa/ dge
283b2(mdo): 'dun bden pas dug bcom mo// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang // dgra bcom rnams kyi grags gang dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid kyis// ngas ni bde legs 'gyur bar byas// kun dga' bo
283b3(mdo): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo// dge slong sa ri dge par gyur cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol da te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/
283b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bsgom pa byas nas/ dge slong sa ri ga la ba der song ste/ phyi nad pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ dge slong sa ri la chad pa spang
283b5(mdo): ba byas te/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon ca spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang
283b6(mdo): dug gsad pa dang / 'tshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsrung ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pas/ tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri ned de
283b7(mdo): las sos so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar
283b8(mdo): gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsolang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kanang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsa sa da pa/ kun dga' bo
283b9(mdo): khyod kyiso rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'i mthu mthong ngam// kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsung ba de la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i
284a1(mdo): slad du ma 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni skem yang srid/ sa ni nam mkha' la 'phags kyang srid/ sa ni nam mkha' la 'phags kyang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa la ltung yang srid/
284a2(mdo): na tshun las ldog kyang med kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur gyi srid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal da pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la 'khor
284a3(mdo): bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mos par gis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan
284a4(mdo): nas/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge ba snyan dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la mos par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa lad nas
284a5(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sa ri dang / lhadang lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang /
284a6(mdo): srin po dang / myi dang / myi ma yin pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
284a7(mdo): 'phags po reg sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i mido/ rdzogs s+ho// /
284a8(mdo): rgyag gi mkhan po ni sen dra bo de dang / gnya' na med d+hi dang / ga byam pa dang / rkyen rgya lartsa ba ba de'i shes sdes zhus te/ nang sa
284a9(mdo): cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//
284b1(mdo): // rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma hA pra ti sar bid r+ya rad ny+dzi// bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
284b2(mdo): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i zom na/ khang pa chen po brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzind kyis rig nas/ rdo rje chen po dpag bsams kyi shing ljon pas
284b3(mdo): legs par brgya na pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing ki rin po che'i pad ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma brdal pa/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi 'khyams rdo rje chen po las
284b4(mdo): byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri chen po bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bsta nad pa dang cho 'phrul can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
284b5(mdo): byin gyi brlabs kyis byin kyis brlabs pa/ chos thams da kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
284b6(mdo): khrig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gi sa thogs pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i
284b7(mdo): rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun tu stond pa/ sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la/ sems can thams cad kyi sems
284b8(mdo): dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstand pa'i sna tshogs snyand cing rgya che la zabs cing yangs pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sman
284b9(mdo): gis mchod pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / dbang dang mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang sa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa dang
284b10(mdo): thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / bden pa dang yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la
285a1(mdo): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i sus dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtseg/
285a2(mdo): pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog dang / de dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu
285a3(mdo): mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shi nang tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul kyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis myi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i
285a4(mdo): mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa myed pa/ thams cad kyang dr-i ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon bsregs pa na stag sa 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan/
285a5(mdo): babyams ma'i bu kang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka bi na dang / tshe/ dang ldan pa rab 'byor da dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan
285a6(mdo): ba dka' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan ba 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha
285a7(mdo): bu dbang phyug chen po sa stsogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs phyed dpag tu myed brjod du myed po'i yang brjod du myed pa dag dang / myi mched kyi badrag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / wA
285a8(mdo): 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dka' ldan pa dang / 'phrul dka' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin sgra'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po
285a9(mdo): zag bzangs ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sim dang / sma gcan dang / rnam par snang byed dang / de dag sa stsogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad myed grangs myed pa dpag tu myed pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mchod/
285b1(mdo): 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dung skyong dang / stobs kyis rgyu dang / pad ma dang / pad ma chen po dang / de dag la stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad myed grangs mye dpag tu myed pa rnams dang / myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa myi 'am ci'i/
285b2(mdo): rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug pud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / nam mkha' lding /
285b3(mdo): gi rgyal po gser myig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gsog du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang po dang / sngas chen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog
285b4(mdo): ma'i bu lnga brgya'i g.yog can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / srin mo chen mo bdun dang / drang srong mchog chen mo bdun dang / drang srong mchog chen po bdun dang / bar snang la rgyu bo'i rgyu skar dang / gza'
285b5(mdo): thams cad kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs kyi rnams dang / phyogs la// tshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po/ rnams dang dgegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / yi dgas
285b6(mdo): dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / myig myi bzang dang
285b7(mdo): lagaka na be con dang / bdaran bral dang / kye'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g.yog bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma can/ sred phyed kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa/ byin pa po dang / 'phreng
285b8(mdo): bcan dang / zla ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin ta la la dang / log 'dren gi dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb kyi sgo drug cu dang / sring mo bzhi myeng
285b9(mdo): po dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i su gu rgyud dang / rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje sde dang / lag bzangs dang / gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang / de las gzhan pa sangs rgyas dang chos dang
286a1(mdo): dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grib gno
286a2(mdo): dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / skem byed dang / bsgrub pa dang / sprul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / nub ka'i lha dang nang par gi
286a3(mdo): lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / sa'i lha dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shi nad tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shi nad tu yongs su mthar phyin/ ye shes kyi tshogs
286a4(mdo): mi shi nang tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyend pa ni shi nad tu yongs su bzung / byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang sa ni brnyes/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa 'i
286a5(mdo): sku ni rab tu 'bar/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus rna par smras/ dbu'i gtsug ni seMs can thas cad kyis bltar myi mthong / bdud kyi las thas cad la ni malas/ sems can thas cad kyis ni zhes kyan na sA ni ma par/ rnam pa thas cad kyi mchog dang ni
286a6(mdo): mam cang pa byed ni leshes dang mi rngad/ mangs rgyas kyi chos thams pa dang ldad/ phung dang pas kyi nom pa'i tshogs thams cad dmi la/ grags pa dang sgra dang cigs su bcad pa ni 'phags/ khru mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni zlog/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu brtsal
286a7(mdo): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed dpag tu myed par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang stobs dang / smon lam dang
286a8(mdo): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / byA dka' ba'i spyod pa la ni phyir ma log/ sku ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu pa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya cus brgya nad te rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje rin po che'i pad
286a9(mdo): ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po'i rdo rje rin po che dang mu tig dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dang dra ba du ma'i sgra 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin po che'i stegs bu du ma shi nad tu brtan par gnas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i chu
286b1(mdo): srin du ma'i kha nas byung ba/ mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba bres pa'i phangs bshams pa/ rin po che du ma'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / an da rnyil chen po dang /
286b2(mdo): dun las kyi 'od zer chen po'i 'tsher bas snang bar byas te/ kun nas mdzes pa/ gdugs cha ba dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i char bu du mas rnam par brgya nad pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas
286b3(mdo): bskyabs pa/ dpag bsams kyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong pas lhag pas 'od
286b4(mdo): kyi dkyil 'khor kyis rnam par brgya nad pa/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'ji ka rten thams cad la sdug par ni snang / dpag bsams kyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shi nang tu rgyas shing
286b5(mdo): chos stond te tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba bar du dge pa tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba
286b6(mdo): yang dag par rlab tu stond to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kun tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/ 'od zer gi dra ba des stong gsum
286b7(mdo): kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par byas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri bkor pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal myed khang
286b8(mdo): na nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
286b9(mdo): lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / thabs gcig tu chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des khyab par gyu rad to// de nas
287a1(mdo): sa mdzo sa 'bras dang/ sus can kun sa snyid pa 'i'i bying / nyes byar byas dang gnod pa kun// rab 'jom pa ma sto zad pa'i// gzungs 'di rab tu
287a2(mdo): par bya// 'di ni thom btsam gyis kyang // sdig pa dag ni zad par 'gyur// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin// nad do cogs sa grol bar byed// sems can kun la snying bsde bas// yus can ngan 'gror
287a3(mdo): 'gro ba rnams// de dag thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir// 'jig rten dag ni 'gon pos gsungs// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug/ de bzhin srung lo can dang ni// srin po'i
287a4(mdo): gnas kyi sar sung 'gro// 'byung po klu dbun za rnams/ kyi bzad 'jigs pa'i g.yul 'gyed par// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra po cog gis kyi tshugs so// myi
287a5(mdo): tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang // skyem byed smyo byed brjed byed da mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang // gdon rnams rab tu rlag par 'gyu/ ra// so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis// gzi chen mdangs
287a6(mdo): nams za ba dang // myi'i skye dgu rnams 'che ba// de dag 'as cad rengs byed 'gyur// byang sems myi bzad gang yin dang / pha ro lad dmag tshogs phung bar byed// sngags kyi las kyis gnod
287a7(mdo): myi 'gyur// rtsa ba'i sa so las rnam par gros// dug dang dug sbyar gyes kyi tshugs// mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs kyi 'gyur// skye 'bab srog gis myi tshugs te// dus kyi rlung gis gnod myi 'gyur// rig
287a8(mdo): pa'i rgyal mo'i kozi brjid kyis// dgra kun rab tu 'jom par 'gyur// de'i don rnams thams cad 'grub// rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur// gang gis rtag tu mgus pa 'am/ lag par rig pa btags na ni/
287a9(mdo): de'i dgos pa yod do cog/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom myed// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / sangs rgyas rnams dang rang 'dren dang // de bzhin ku'i rgyal po dang // lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu
287b1(mdo): srung // so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzind la// nyan thos sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che// rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // de bzhin rgyal po bzhi
287b2(mdo): rnams dang // de la nyin dang mtshan rnams su// bsrung bar byed de the tsom myed// brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang // dga' ba'i dbang po nag po che// sbyin drug pu dang
287b3(mdo): tshogs kyi dbang // ma mo'i tshigs rnams thams cad dang // de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams dang // drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams// de kun so sor 'brang ba'i//
287b4(mdo): gzungs 'dzin de la srung byed 'gyur// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che rnams dang // rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang // bdag gi ma dang 'khro gnyer dang // lha mo sgrol ma lugs kyu dang //
287b5(mdo): rdo rje su ku rgyud dang dkar// de bzhin dkar mo chen mo dang // nag mo che dang po nya dang // de bzhin rdo rje pho nya gzhan// zhags pa bzang dang rdo rje zhags// lag na rdo rje stobs po che//
287b6(mdo): rig pa'i chen mo rdo rje 'phreng // bdud kyi zil sbyor byed pa dang / gzhan gis myi thub lha mo che// rna ba nag mo stobs chen mo// dpal yon ldan pa skal chen dang // rna cha gdub 'khor pad ma 'a
287b7(mdo): me tog so can nor bu gtsug/ skra mdog mdzes dang kham pa mo// lha mo gzi brjid chen mo dang // dpal yon ldan pa grog 'phreng can// srin mo ral pa gcig ma dang // sangs rgyas srung zhes bya ba dang /
287b8(mdo): skal ba chen po'i myi thod can// lang ka'i bdag mo dpal yon can// gzhan yang lha mo mang po rnams// sems can rjes su 'dzin byed dag/ rig pa gang gi seg na gnas// de la bsrung ba byed par 'gyur/
287b9(mdo): 'phrog ma dang ni lnga chen dang // dung chen dang ni so yig ma// dpal gi lha mo dbyangs can yang // de'i rjes 'gro rtag tu srung // so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di// bud myed gang zhig rtag 'chang na// de'i thams
288a1(mdo): cad 'grub par 'gyur// rtag par mangs du bu po chags// mangs rnams na yang bde bar skye// sbrum pa dag kyang bde bar 'byung // nad dang sdig pa thams cad kyang // 'jig par 'gyur te the tsom myed/
288a2(mdo): bsod nams ldan zhing stobs dang ldan// nor dang 'bru yang rtag tu 'phel// tshig kyang gzung bar 'os pa dang // mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin// bud myed dang ni skyes pa'ang rung // gtsang ma gang zhig 'chang
288a3(mdo): srel na// de ni sems can thams cad dag/ tha rang par bya phyir brtson par 'gyur// rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ba yin// nad de cog kyang rnam par spangs// sras dang skye bo yang bcas pa'i// rgyal po 'ang de'i dbang du 'gyur
288a4(mdo): phun sum tshogs pa rtag tu 'bar// bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel// de'i bsam pa thams cad 'grub/ dkyil 'khor kun tu zhu gas pa yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/
288a5(mdo): de ni rtag tu dam tshig shes// rmyi lam ngan pa myi myi 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa'i mchog/ sdig pa rnam sa dang de bzhin du/ dgra yang rab tu phung bar byed/
288a6(mdo): gza' kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// ye shes dbangaphyug chen pos gsungs// 'dod pa thams cad sbyin bar byed// de phyir rtag tu bcang bar bya// 'byung po'i/
288a7(mdo): tshogs rnams nga la nyon// da ni rab tu 'di brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sa phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang /
288a8(mdo): chos dang dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ phyag 'tshal lo// oM bi bu la ga ne/ bi bu la bi ma le/ dza sa ka r+b+he/ badz+ra dz+wa la ga r+b+he/ ka ti ka ha nI/ ka rbe ga ka na bi sho d+ha naM/ sarba pa pa bi shwo dAH
288a9(mdo): au ku Na pa ti ga ka na bitsA ri Ni/ tsa le ka ga ri Ni/ ki ri gi ri/ ga ma ri ka ma ri/ ga ma ni ka ma ni ka Te/ ka ha ka ha/ garga ri karga ri/ ka ga ri/ ka ka ri/ kam b+ha ri/ kam bA ri/ ga tig
288b1(mdo): ka ti ga bI/ ka ma ni ga re/ gu b+ha gu b+ha gu b+ha nai/ ku ru ku ru gu ru Ni/ tsa le tsu lu tsa ri mu tsi le/ dza ye bi dza ye/ sarba b+ha ya bi ga te/ gar+g+ha sam b+ha ra Ni/ si ri si ri/ mi ri mi ri/ kI ri gI ri/ bi ri bi ri
288b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ma sems can 'dren ma/ kun nas 'dren ma/ dgra thams cad 'jom ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las bsrung du gsol//
288b3(mdo): bsrung du gsol/ tsI ri tsi ri/ bi ri ba ri/ ki ri kau ri/ bI ri b+hi ri/ bi bi dA/ A ba ra Na/ bi sho d+ha ni/ mu ri mu ri/ tsi li tsi li/ ka ma li bi ma le/ dza ye dza ya/ ba he dza ya ba ti/ bcom
288b4(mdo): ldan 'das ma rin po che cod pan dang 'phreng ba mnga' ba/ byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i lha mo chen mo sdig pa thams cad rnam
288b5(mdo): bar sbyong ba/ bdag la thams cad du kun nas bsrung du ga/ so la/ bsrung du gsol/ hu ru hu ru/ mgon ma mchis pa skyabs ma mchis pa/ dpung gnyen ma mchis pa bdag la
288b6(mdo): bsrung du gsol/ bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las thar da par mdzad du gsol// tsan Di tsan Ni/ tsan Ni ni/ dwe ga ba ti/ sarba du ShA ni bA ra Ni/ man tA pa kA ni/ bA ra Ni
288b7(mdo): pra ma tha ni/ bi dza ya bA hi ni/ hu ru hu ru mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ a su pA la ni/ su ra ba ra ma tha ni/ sarba de ba tA bu 'u dzi te/ dI ri d+ha ri/ sa man ta sa ba lo ko te/ pra b+he pra b+he/ su pra b+ha
288b8(mdo): bi shud d+he/ sarba pA ba bi sho da ni/ d+ha ra d+ha ra dA ni/ ba ra dA re/ tsa le tse le/ su mu su mu/ su mu ru su mu ru/ ru ru tsa le/ tsa le tsa le/ dpas kyi sku mnga' ba bdag gnod par
288b9(mdo): sems pa las bskyod du gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ dza ya ka ma le/ kri Ni krI Ni/ ba ra da sang ku she/ oM pad ma bi shud d+he/ sho dA ya shau drA ya/ shud d+he shud d+he/ bA ra
289a1(mdo): bA ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ shu ru bu ru/ mang ka la bi shud d+he/ ba bid tra mu khi/ kha da ki ni Shad ki ni/ Sha ra kha ra/ dzA li ta shi kha re/ sa man ta pra sA ri ta/ a ba b+ha si ta shud de/ dzA sa dzAH/
289a2(mdo): sArba de ba ka na/ gru h+man/ ka tA/ sa ma ka ra Sha Ni/ sad t+ya br-i te/ ta ra ta ra/ glang po che'i sna stangs kis gzigs ma/ bdag bskal du gsol/ hu lu hu su/ hu tu hu t+yA/ ka Ni ki Ni/
289a3(mdo): bi shi bi zhi/ kI Ni ki Ni/ sa ni ha nau/ sarba gra ha/ bA ka Ni/ ping ka li/ bing ka li/ tsu mu tsu mu su mu su mu su bi tsa re/ ta ra ta ra/ bcom ldan 'das ma glang po che'i sta stangs
289a4(mdo): kyis gzigs ma/ thams cad du kun nas phyogs thams cad du bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i zhags pas bcing bas bdag 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las bsgral du
289a5(mdo): gsol/ badz+ra dz+wa la/ bi shud dwe/ ka ra ka ra/ b+hu ri b+hu ri/ bA ka ba ti/ ka rbA ba ba ti/ garbA bi sho d+ha ni/ kukrI sa ma pu'u ra ni/ dzA la/ dzA sa/ tsa la tsa la/ dz+nyA la na
289a6(mdo): lnga'i chus kun tu char dbab tu dbab// a mri ta ba ra Sha Ni raM ba ta a bai ta ra Ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab bdu da ma mchog gi sku dang ldan pa bdag la dbang bskur du gsol
289a7(mdo): 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'byed pa dang / myis ma ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra myi zhim pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang klu thams cad
289a8(mdo): 'jom pa/ gnod pas 'jigs skrag pa/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad las thams cad du rtag par bsrung du
289a9(mdo): gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ ba la ba la/ ba la ba ti/ dza sa dza ya/ thams cad du dus kun tu bdag rgyal bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag la rig pa chen mo 'di grub par mdzad du gsol/
289b1(mdo): dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub tu gsol/ gsang sngags rnams bsgrub tu gsol/ bgyegs rnams gzhom du gsol/ dza ya dza ya/ sid d+he sid d+he/ sid dA sid dA/ bud d+h+ya bud d+hA/ pu'u ra ya pu 'ur ya
289b2(mdo): pu'ur ni pu'u ra Ni/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ rig pa thams cad las byung ba'i sku can/ rgyal ba lhag par rgyal ba can de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rnam par dag pa/ bcom
289b3(mdo): ldan 'das ma bzhugs su gsol/ bzhugs su gsol/ dam tshig bskyad du gsol/ 'jigs pa myi bzad pa chen po brgyud las bdag gzigs su gsol// sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa
289b4(mdo): rdza.a ba ra na bi sho d+ha ni sa man ta/ a kA ra man Na la bi shud d+hebi ka te bi ka te bi ka ta ma se/ sarba ma la bi sho d+ha nI/ ka No kiN+Dasarba pA pa bi shud d+he/ ma la bi ka te/ te dze te dza ba ti/ brdze
289b5(mdo): badz+re ba ti/ 'jig rten gsum du byin kyis brlabs pa la swa/ hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang / bskur ba la swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
289b6(mdo): dbang bskur ba la swa hA/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swa hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pos gza byini kyis brlabs pa la swa hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa
289b7(mdo): thams cad kyi dam tshig grub pa la swa hA/ dbang po dang nye dbang po dang ldan pa dbang pos rnam par ltas pa la swa hA/ tshangs pa dang tshangs pas gnas pa la swa hA/ khyab 'jug gis phyag byas pa la swa hA
289b8(mdo): dbang phyug chen pos phyag 'tshal cing mchod pa la swA hA/ rdo rje 'chang lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis byin kyis brlabs pa la sA hA/ yul 'khor srung la swa hA/ 'phags skyes po la swA hA/ myig
289b9(mdo): myi bzang la swA hA/ rnam thos kyi bu la swA hA/ rgyal po chen po bzhis phyag byas pa la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ gshin rjes mchod cing phyag byas pa ya swA hA/ chu lha la swA hA/ rlung lha la swA hA/ rlung lha chen po la swA hA/
290a1(mdo): mye la swA hA/ klus rna par ltas pa la swA hA/ lha'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ gnod sbyin gi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ srin po'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ dri za'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ lha ma yin gi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha' lding /
290a2(mdo): gi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ myi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs la swA hA/ gyi rnams sa swA hA/ phyi ma yin pa rnams la swA hA/ gdon thams cad la swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad la swA hA/ yi dgas sa swA hA/ sha tha
290a3(mdo): sA hA/ brjed byed la sA hA/ gnon po la swA hA/ grul bum ya sA hA/ oM dru ru d+hu ru swA hA/ tu ru tu ru sA hA/ mu ru mu ru swA hA/ ha na ha na sarba sha tru 'un swA hA/ da ha da ha sarba duSh+TA nAn sA hA/ pa tsa pa tsa swarba pra ta rI ka pra t+ya mye tran swA hA/
290a4(mdo): gang dag bdag la gyi phan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyi lus/ dzA/ sarba duShA tsi tA nan swA hA/ 'bar ba sa swA hA/ rab tu 'bar ba la swA hA/ rdo rje 'bar ba lA swA hA/ me sre 'bar ba la swA hA/ kun tu
290a5(mdo): 'bar ba la swA hA/ nor bu bzang sa swA hA/ gang ba bzang po la swA hA/ nag po chen po la swA hA/ ma mo'i tshogs la swA hA/ gnod sbyin mo rnams pa swA hA/ srin mo rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha'i ma mo
290a6(mdo): rnams la swA hA/ rgya mtshon gnas pa rnams la swA hA/ mtshan me ba rnams sa sA hA/ nyin mo rgyu ga rnams sa swA hA/ dus gsum du rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus su rgyu ba rnams sa swA hA/ dus ma yin par
290a7(mdo): rgyab rnams sa swA hA/ rdzas su mangs pa pa rnams swA swA hA/ mangs 'dzin du sa pA hA/ hU s+'u rbu su swA da/ oM swA hA/ sA swA hA/ bru runA tra/ bu'ub pa sa / buTar chub pa 9/ oM titsi t+yain+da ny+dza/ bi ti hr-i d+he nI hA/ dA ra rimahA/
290a8(mdo): ra Ni sA hA swAhA/ a ga Ni swA hA/ te jo ba pu swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ si li si li swA hA/ bud d+ha bud d+hA swA hA/ sid d+ha sid d+ha sA hA/ man dA la ban d+ha swA hA/ sI mA ban d+he swA hA/ dA ra ni ban dwe swA hA/ sarbaH
290a9(mdo): rgya bu dzam ste sa ngam pra sa swA hA/ skam pas sam pra sa swA na/ tsan d+ha tshin d+ha mA hA/ bAn da bIn da sA hA/ ban 'a ba nga tsA tra~M/ bAd d+ha ban dI pA tra~M/ sngogs mo hA sa sA thA/ ma ni ba shud d+he swA hA/ su lu N+ye swA hA/ suT ru bi shud des
290b1(mdo): bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ bi bo dA na swA hA/ tsan dre tsan dwe pa ri bu'u r+Na tsan dre swA hA/ gra he b+h+ya sA hA/ na kAd tre b+h+ya sA hA/ shi be b+h+ya sA hA/ shan ti swA hA/ puShI swA hA/ swa stA ya ne sA hA/ shi pang ka ri shan ti ka ri/ pu ShI ka ri ba la ba ra dA ni swA hA/ shika/
290b2(mdo): ri swA hA/ shri ri bar d+ha ni swA hA/ shrI ri dz+wa lA ni swA hA/ na mu tsi swA hA/ mu tsi sA sta/ bA ga ba ti swA hA/ oM// bcom ldan 'das mA de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog dri ma dang bral ba/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad
290b3(mdo): gsol// bdag bde lag su gyur cig/ oM mu ni mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ tsA ri tsa la ni/ b+ha ya bi ka te/ bA ya ha ra ni/ bo d+ha bau d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bud d+hi li bud dI li/ sarba ta thA ga ta dwi ra ya dzu Sh+pe swA hA/ oM mu ni mu ni mu ni ba re// de ban+ti
290b4(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje'i go ca chen po'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ thams cad kyis bdag la dbang skur du gsol/ sarba ta thA ga ta hrid ya a d+hiSh+Thi di badz+ra swA hA// bram ze chen po rig pa'i rgyal mo so so
290b5(mdo): 'brang ma chen mo kun nas me lce'i 'phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang snying po gzhan gyis mya thub pa'i gzu ngas 'di rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos thos ma thag tu sdig pa tha
290b6(mdo): cad rnam par grol bar 'gyu ro// bram ze chen po 'di gang gi snying sa kan sa par gyur pa de'i sus rdo rjer rig par bya'o// de'i lus la mes kyi tshugaso// ci mngon zhe na gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nag no
290b7(mdo): nAgacan zin bzang po sa pang du zhugs pa de'i mthag kya'i bu mos mtshom bdag nyid me'i dong du mchongs pa dang / der badra ma dag byung ste/ de'i tshi gnon du sgra gcan shin bzang po sangs na gnas bzhin du rig pa nyid 'di
290b8(mdo): byas so// rig pa 'di nyid rjes su dran patsam gis mye de skad cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to// de nas klag kya'i bu mo sa mtsho ma'i lus la mes ma reg go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
290b9(mdo): pad kyi byi kyis brnabs pa'o// rnam ze ra po rgyu sa sa mi mchi'o// dug gis kyang thog dang bral bar gyi nu'o// de ji sa med bu'i chen po gang gi ma grong khyer chen po 'ad par ba ro tu 'gron bya na po da na ma dzad thoms pa kyi na
291a1(mdo): smra bar gyur to// de rig pa'i stobs des klu'i rgyal po 'jog po bkug go// bkug nas kyang bag myed pa'i dbang gis ma bcings pas de khros nas de la bzung ba dang / de tshor ba myi bzad pa myong nas/ ji ltar yang bdag ni srog
291a2(mdo): dang bral lo snyam tu shes so// de na smra ba can mang po zos kyang 'ga' cas gis kyang dug las gso bar ma nu so// de nas grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na dge bsnyen ma dris byed par dag pa zhes bya ba snying rje chen po dang ldan
291a3(mdo): pa zhig gnas pa de rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di kha ton du shes so// de de'i gam du song ste phyind pa dang rig pa chen mo 'di brjod do// des de la lan cig brjod pa rtse gis de dug myed par byas shing de dran pa rnyed par byas te/ sdug bsngal
291a4(mdo): chen po de las yongs su tha rad par byas nas rig pa chen mo la snying po 'di ga ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du tshong dpon gi bu de'i snying la gnas par byas so// bram ze chen po gzhan yang ji ltar shes she na/ rgyal po
291a5(mdo): chen po rangs pas kyis zhes bya ba'i grangs su chung bzhis mong khyer chen po// panas mgron yongs su rgyub chi// rol gar phyogs kyi mams kyi go stobs kyi 'khor los skur ba'i rgyal po ris dpung gi tshogs yamasas
291a6(mdo): bzhi pa go bgos te/ grong khyer chen po bar nas kun tu bskor nas gzho ma par bshams so// de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin de la blon po rnam sa kyis smras pa/ lU pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer grogs
291a7(mdo): la thug na thabs gang gis pha rol gi dmag tshogs de gzhom par bgyi/ bka' stsal du gsolang zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos khyer 'cher 'grib chu ngur gis shig/ rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba yod de
291a8(mdo): ngas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o// thal ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang / blon po rnams kyis mgo btud de/ rgyal po chen po bdag cag gis sngon nam yang ma thos pa 'di ci lags shes spras pa dang /
291a9(mdo): rgyal pos dngas mngon sum du bya'o zhes bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin spos chu sna tshogs kyis mgo bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin bris te/ mgol gtsug gi sgra'i nang du
291b1(mdo): bzhag nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di nyid kyis go cha byas te g.yul gi nang du zhugs pa dang / gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad pham par byas te/ ji srid du skyabs su dong ba de srid du 'dis char bcad nam
291b2(mdo): stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba de gcig pu btang ngo // bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang phyag rgyas byin gis brlabs pa mthu chen mo mngon sum du gyu rang ba yin te/ mngon
291b3(mdo): sum du gyur to snyam du gzung bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o// phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can tshe zung ba rnams dang / bsod nams chung ba rnams dang / longs
291b4(mdo): spyod chung ba rnams la phan par 'gyur bar blta'o// bram ze chen po gang la la zhig gis rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te lag pa 'am mgul tu btags na/ de de bzhin
291b5(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya'o de/ bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o// rdo rje'i lus/ yin par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
291b6(mdo): ring bsrel gi snying po can yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gan gas pa thams cad kyi spyan yin par rig par bya'o// rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o// de 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i lus dang ldan
291b7(mdo): par rig par bya'o// de ni myi shigs pa'i goca can du rig par bya'o// des dgra thams cad rab tu 'jom par rig par bya'o// de sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad 'jom par rig par bya'o// de sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba
291b8(mdo): rnam par sbyong bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yongs su shes pa yin te/ bram ze chen po phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong ma dad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bslab pa 'das pa/ ma byin
291b9(mdo): par lend pa/ bza' ba 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog pa dge 'dun gi dang / phyogs bzhi pa dang tshogs kyi rdzas su gyurang ba de thams cad gang zag gir byid kyis brlabs te za ba zhig dus gzhan zhig na nad chabs chen
292a1(mdo): bos btab pa dang / sdug sngal chen po'i tshor ba myong ngo // nyon mongs skyabs myed dpung gnyen myed nas ku co'i sgra chen po 'byin to// bram ze chen po de nas phyogs de na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des sgra de/
292a2(mdo): zos so// thos nas kyang dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris te dge slong de'i mgul du btags so// rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo
292a3(mdo): dge slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag du tshor ba thams cad ni rab tu zhi ma nad thams cad las ni yongs su tha rad te sos par gyur da nas/ de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang dran pa shi nad tu nye bar bzhag ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so//
292a4(mdo): yus de bong dang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnarang myed par skyes so// de'i ro de yang dge slong dag gis skang bu zhig la bzhag go// rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo de yang de'i mgul tu
292a5(mdo): btags bzhin du gnas so// dge slong de mnar myed pader skyes ma thag tu sems cad dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas sems can
292a6(mdo): dmyal ba'i sems can de dag pas cad bde ba mas cad kyis tshim par gyur to/ 'tshams myed pa'i mye'i phung po chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang yongs su zhi bar gyur to// de nas gshin rje'i mya de dag thams cad
292a7(mdo): ngo mtshar skyes nas/ chos kyi rgyal po gshi de la nges pa'i tshig 'di rgyas par brjod do// sems can las las skyes pa'i/ sdug bsngal myi bzang rab tu zhi// shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni lha// sems
292a8(mdo): dkyil nyam pa rnams ma ka la// lus can lus la tag gnas pa'i// mye sa mur de rab tu zhi// so ka le rnams kyis gshig ma mchis// spu gri mo yang gcod kyi bgyid// sngags sdong shal
292a9(mdo): ma ni yang chag/ lugs zangs thams cad rab tu zhi // ral gri lo ma can nags / las skyes lo ma gnod myi 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po gshing rje khyod// myi rnams la ni chos kyis sto// rgya 'ang
292b1(mdo): myi chung bdag cag la// khyod kyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs// de nas chos kyi bdag nyid can// chos nges chos kyi rgyal po des// snying rje'i bsam pa nyams rnams kyi// 'di 'dri'i tshig de thos gyur
292b2(mdo): nas// myur du 'di na ci yin spros/ 'di ni ci 'dra yang spros shi ka// de nas myi bzang gshin rje'i myi/ gnod pa'i rgyu can de dag gis// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la// 'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so// mnar myed rab
292b3(mdo): tu nyam nga bar// sems can chen po 'di skyes lnga// gang gi mying ni mnar myed pa// des na de ni nyam ngar brjod// gang gis sems can bde bgyid pa// rnam pa sna tshogs las la gzigs// 'di ni kun tu
292b4(mdo): bder gyur nas// slar yang lha'i gnas su mchi// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes kyang // mthong nas ngo mtshar smras pa ni// 2di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba ste// 'di'i tshe rabs lnga lus tshe// 'di
292b5(mdo): ltar sku gdung brgya mang pos// ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar// so sor 'brang ba mgul btags pas// de'i lus ni// de bzhin mdzes// de nas sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma
292b6(mdo): gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la 'di skad ces sbas so// swa ji ltar na 'di so sor 'brang ba zhes bgyi// chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa// gang gis tshig rnams so sor dran
292b7(mdo): de drin 'gror 'gro myi 'gyur// so sor 'byung ba bsgoms pa ni// shes rab can de bde 'gror 'gro// sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma byed// rab tu rgyas dang ldan pa der// der ni skang bu mthon po la/
292b8(mdo): rnams kyis ni bskor ba ltos// de mthong sems can thams cad la// byams pa'i sems su 'gyur bar gis// de nas gshin rje'i mya de dag de nyid kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan par dong ngo // de tshe der ni de dag
292b9(mdo): gis// rgyal po'i pho brang nye ba na// skad bu de'i khor yug nas// 'bar ba gcig gis gang ba mthong // myi ro gcig gi mgul pa na// so sor 'brang ba btags pa'ang mthong // lha dang klu dang dri za dang / gnod
293a1(mdo): sbyin srin po myi 'am cis// kun nas 'khor bar bskor nam ni// za na myed pa'i mchod par byed// des gnod sbyin de dag gis// so sor 'brang ba'i skad zhes btags// de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis chos
293a2(mdo): kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs te slar log nas// lha khyod kyis bka' stsald pa bzhin no zhes rgyas par brjod do// de skad smras ma thag tu tshig de skad smras pa'i tha ma ya/ sems can chen po de sems can dmyal
293a3(mdo): ba'i lus de bor nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// rgyu des na sngon so sor 'brang ba lha'i bu zhes bya'o// bram ze chen po des na sngon chad yongs su shes so// de'i phyir so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di
293a4(mdo): gdon myi za bar gzung bar bya'o// yi ger bri bar bya'o// klag pa ra bya'o// cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la btags nas bcang b.rabya ste/ de rtag tu sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa thams cad yongs su/
293a5(mdo): tha rad par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las/ rgal bar 'gyur ro// glog gis 'gyel bar byed myi nus so// glog gis ji ltar myi nus zhe na/ bram ze chen po sngon yongs su
293a6(mdo): shes te/ grong khyer chen po mchog shing kun rdzi ba na/ tshong dpon rje na po dra myed dung zhes bya ba nor mang ba/ gser shi nad tu 'byord pa/ mdzod dang par ba kun tu gang zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig gnas
293a7(mdo): ded dpon zhes bya bar grags so// de nas ded dpon chen po de gru bo che de rnyed nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / nya myi rnams kyis de'i gru de bzung nas/ rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te
293a8(mdo): 'brug sgra chen po'i sgra sgrog go// klog dang skar mda' yang gtong ngo // rdo rje'i lce 'bab par yang bshams so// de nas tshod pa de dag sdug bsngal chen pos sems nond to// klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang klogs
293a9(mdo): skar mda' dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang / nya mying de dag gis kyang gru bo che bzung bar mthong nas ku co'i sgra chen po bton te/ de dag ste khyed par can rnams la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi dbu
293b1(mdo): gnyen du ma gyur to// de nas de dag tshong dpon sems rab tu brtan pa'i gam du 'dod nas// de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di skad ces smras so// sems can chen po khyod kyis bdag cag sgrub cing 'jigs pa chen po las
293b2(mdo): tha rad par mdzad du gsol/ de nas ded dpon chen po sems brtan pa blo gros che ba des tshong pa 'khrugs par gyur pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// ma 'jigs ma 'jigs tshong pa rnams// khyed cag brtan
293b3(mdo): par deng shig dang // khyed rnams sdug bsngal chen po'o// rgya mtsho che las ngas bsgral lo// de nas yid ni brtan gyu ra nas// tshong pa rnams kyis tshig 'di smras// sems can chen po 'di ci legs// bgegs bral myur
293b4(mdo): du bka' stsol cig/ blo gros chen po khyod kyi mthus// bdag rtsag ji srid 'tsho ba'i tshe// ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs/ skad na khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi// de nas 'dron pa'i bdag po yos
293b5(mdo): de dag la ni rig 'di brjod// ngal so sor 'brang ba'i// ri ga pa chen mor grags pa yod// gnod byed thams cad selang/ par byed// stobs che pha rol gnon byed pa// de nas rab tu
293b6(mdo): sdug bsngal ba'i// 'jigs pa che las ngas dgrol lo// de na sa ded dpon chen pos de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di bris na sa rgyal mtshan gaM rtse mo la btags pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo che
293b7(mdo): so sor 'brang ba chen mo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya mying de dag thams cad kyis gru bo che de mye lce gcig tu gyurd par mthong ngo // de nas klu de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhags nas mchod pa
293b8(mdo): bya bar bshams so// nya myid de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo/ 'di nyid kyi mthus tshig nas byer te zhig par gyurard to// 'dron pa phal po che de dag kyang klu chen po de dag gis rin po che'i gle nga chen
293b9(mdo): por phyi nad par byas so// de ltar na ye shes dang ldan par rig pa chen mo sa sar 'brang ba chen ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin kyis brlabs pa ste/ bram ze chen po rgyu des na
294a1(mdo): 'di rig pa chen mo zhes grags so// 'di ni nges par rgyal mtshan gyi che mo la btags te bcang bar bya'o// klung dang grang ba dang dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang glog dang lce 'bab pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar
294a2(mdo): byed do// lba dang myi dang lha ma yin gi 'thab pa dang thod pa thams cad las yongs su tha rad par byed do// sbrang bu mchu rings dang sha sbrang dang bye ba srog chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs lo tog ma
294a3(mdo): rung bar byed pa thams cad myed cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ri dgas dang bya dang gcan zan gnod par sems pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// me tog dang 'bras bu dang lo ma dang nags tshal
294a4(mdo): dang sman dang lo tog la stsogs pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyu ra te/ rab tu bro zhing zhim pa dang 'jam par 'gyur ro// legs par yongs su smyind par 'gyur ro// ha cang char che ba dang
294a5(mdo): dkon pa'i nyes pa rnams yod myi 'byung ngo // char dus su 'bab cing dus ma yin par myi 'bab par 'gyur ro// su/ la de'i klu chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang dus dus su char kyi rgyun
294a6(mdo): legs par 'bebs so// yul gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba 'di spyod pa'i yul der sems can de dag gis shes par bya ste/ spos sna tshogs dang
294a7(mdo): bdug pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod cing sti stang byas la/ ras sna tshogs kyis dkris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas/ klu dbyangs dang rol mo sil snyan byas te bskor byas na rtswa
294a8(mdo): rnams dang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la stsogs pas sems can chen po de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// cho ga ji lta ji lta ba bzhin bris na de lta de lta bur
294a9(mdo): 'grub ste/ bu pho 'dod na yang khye'u 'grub cing / mangs na 'dzind pa dam par 'gyur/ mngal na bde bar skye ba dang / mngal nas bde bar btsas par 'gyur// mngal na dus bzhin skyes pa dang / dus bzhin
294b1(mdo): rab tu btsas par 'gyur/ ci mngon zhe na/ bram ze chen po snga ma bzhin du de nyon cig/ yul ma ga da 'di nyid na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya ba de bu myed par gyurd to// ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya zhe na/ rgyal
294b2(mdo): po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa brkyang nas ma'i nu ma nas bzung ste/ nu zho ngoms ngoms su 'thung so// nu ma de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gser gi kha dog tu gyurd te/ dus kun tu nu zho 'phel bar gyurd to/
294b3(mdo): rgyu des na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya bar btags par gyurd to// gzhan yang gang gi tshe rgyal po'i gan du skye bo spangs mo pa 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po de lag pa g.yas pa bar snang la brkyang ba dang / rgyal po byang
294b4(mdo): chub sems dpa' de rgyu des sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i rin po che khyad du 'phags pa gser dang nor bu rnams kyis lag pa gang bar byed do// rgyal po des kyang skye bo slongs mo pa
294b5(mdo): lhags pa rnams la rab tu byin no// bsams pa tsam gis slo/ ngas mo pa thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba phun sum tshogs/ pa thams cad byin no// bu pho 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la mchod
294b6(mdo): pa dang sti stang cher byas kyang bu bom rnyed nas/ de sngon gyi de bzhi na gshegs pa dag gi mchod rten rnams kyi mdun du sti stang bya bar 'atsas te mchod pa dang sti stang lte bo byas sbyin pa yang byin no// bsnyen gnas la yang nye
294b7(mdo): bar gnas so// bsod nams chen po byas so// sbyin pa de dag kyang myi zad par byin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bram ze chen po sngon byung ba yul ma ka 'di nyid na gyad yul zhes bya ba'i grong khyer ku sha'i tshong dus
294b8(mdo): chen po mchog na// bcom ldan 'das rin cen mang gi bstand pa la zhugs pa tshong dpon chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba/ chos sems pa'i sems can chen po zhig gnas pa de/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen
294b9(mdo): po'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba 'di nyid las brtsams te chos stond to// de nas myi dbul po zhag gis chos de thos nas tshong dpon chen po de la tshig 'di skad ces bdag
295a1(mdo): jo bo'i khab tu zla babyed do// chos kyang nyan to// gang gi tshe bdag gis cung zad rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag chos la bzod par bgyid do zhes sbas nas/ de'i khyim na las byed cing chos kyang nyan/
295a2(mdo): dus gzhan zhig na de la tshong dpon des de nar cig byin pa dang / de sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ rin po che snyim
295a3(mdo): pas so sor 'brang ba chen mo la phul nas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu chen po 'dis bdag sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba kun tu gcod par gyur da cig ces smon lam de skad btab bo/ rgyu des na sbyin pa de yongs su
295a4(mdo): za par gyur to// de ltar bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa mang po rnam pa du ma byas te lha rnams kyang mchod pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du mchod pa dang /
295a5(mdo): de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rmyi ltas su ba/ stand te/ 'di skad du kye rgyal po chen po so sor 'brang ba chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba kun nas mye lce'i 'phreng
295a6(mdo): ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gi nor bu phyag rgya dang ste nga po gzhan gyis myi thub pa'i gzungs chen mo reg pa'i rgyal mo cho ga las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du cho ga bzhin bris la
295a7(mdo): btsun mo dam pa de smyur ba byas te/ cho ga de bzhin du sus la btags na khyod bu po song par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po de sad de mtshan mo dri zad nas kyis dang yi ge dang / rgyu skar dang gza' rnam
295a8(mdo): par 'byed pa'i rigs kyi bram ze rnams bsdogs nas cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du/ rgyu skar gyi rgyal po rgyas kyi nyin par btsun mo dam pa shin tu sus legs par bkrus te spyar ba byas nas/ rig pa'i rgyal
295a9(mdo): mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba 'di yang cho ga bzhin du bris te btsun mo dam pa de'i mgul du btags so// sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten rnams la mchod pa chen po byas so// rin po che khyad par can du ma yang
295b1(mdo): ro// du yod pa dang na po gzugs pa rang snangs sa dru pa 'dos pang po rgyas pa sog dang 'a bzhig so// tham / shes rgya
295b2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa/ 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba gzhan gyis myi thub pa so sor 'brang ba chen mo dkon mchog ces grags so// 'di rtag tu brgya byin gi gtsug gi nor bu yin no//
295b3(mdo): gang gi tshe sna'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams dang gsul chen po 'gyed par 'dong ba de'i tshe/ 'di nyid kyis gotsa byas nas spyi gtsug tu btags te sgyu ma yin thams cad pham par byas/ pha rol pham par
295b4(mdo): byas nas dge ba dang bde bas bde bar lha'i grong khyer du 'jug ste/ sgra ma yin thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa yin no// bram ze chen po de ltar na sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ rig par
295b5(mdo): rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bdud thams cad kyis myi tshugs so// 'di gang / gi lus la btags sam mgul tu btags pa de/ de bzhin
295b6(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub ses dpa' thas cad kyang yang dag par srung bar 'gyuraro// lha dang mya dang rgyal po dang rgyal po'i blon po dang bla ze dang khyi ba dag thams cad kyis rtag par rgyun tu phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang
295b7(mdo): rim gro byed par 'gyur ro// lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen pos brjod cing mchod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'jom pas kyang de la sas/
295b8(mdo): can chen po zhes gsung ngo // nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de la sems kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can chen po de mya ngan
295b9(mdo): thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad kyang rtag par rgyu nad tu srung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro// des gzhan gyis myi thub pa'i gsang sngags chen po'i snying po bzhi po 'di dag
296a1(mdo): bris te rtag par rgyun tu lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya'o// rtag par rgyun tu yid la bya'o// kha ton tu bya'o// bsam pa thag pa nas bsgom par bya'o// sdug bsngal dang rmyi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa
296a2(mdo): dang / bkra myi shes pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dir ni gsang sngags gzhi las thams cad byed pa dge ba rnams 'gru'o/
296a3(mdo): a mi te/ a mri ta ba rI/ ba ra ba ra/ pra ba ra bi shud d+he hu'u la phaT swA hA/ oM a mri ta bi lo ki ni ga rbA sang rag kA ni a ka ra Sha Ni tsu 'um hu 'um phaT phaT swA hA/ gzhan gyis myi thub pa'i snying po'o// oM bi ma le dza yA d+ya
296a4(mdo): rI sa mri te hu 'um hu 'um phaT phaT/ swA hA/ oM bA ra b+hA ra/ sam bA ra sam b+ha ya/ in dri ya bi sho dA ni/ hu 'um cu 'um phaT phaT/ ru ru tsa le swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM ma Ni d+ha ri badz+raH
296a5(mdo): hu'um hu 'um phaT swA hA/ rab tu gsang pa'i snying po'o// sang sa rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thams cad gcig/ tu 'dug nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu gzungs kyi gsang sngags
296a6(mdo): kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs te/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i snying po dang go tsa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o//
296a7(mdo): 'di thos par yang rab tu dka' na sdi ker bri ba dang tshig tu 'don pa dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / gzhan dag la yang stond pa lta ci smos te/ de ni sangs rgyas la bya ba byas par rig par bya'o// 'di ni
296a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags so// rjes su yi rang ngo // lung bstanang to// so sor 'brang ba chen mo gzhan gis myi thub pa'i gzungs 'di mchog tu dkon pa'o// so sor 'brang ba chen/
296a9(mdo): mo 'di'i mying thos par shind tu dka' ste/ gzungs chen po 'di ni sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ stobs che ba pha rol ka nonang pa/ gzi brjid che ba 'od che ba/ yon tan brjod pa che ba/ mthu che ba bdud kyi ris /
296b1(mdo): lha thams cad rnam par 'jom par byed pa/ bag chags thams cad kyi mtshams sbyor ba bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa/ pha rol kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang / dug dang byad dang g.yengs byed kyi sbyor ba dang / gnod par bya ba dang /
296b2(mdo): drag shul kyi spyod pa dang / gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams rnam par 'jom par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la mchod pa dam pa byed pa/ mngon par
296b3(mdo): dga' ba rnams la yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ theg pa chen po 'dzind pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / tshig tu 'dond pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'chang bar mngon par brtson pa rnaMs
296b4(mdo): la yongs su skyong ba'o// bram ze chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ gang du yang thogs pa myed de/ stond
296b5(mdo): pa dgra las rgyal ba nga ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad du yang chod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// ci mngon zhe na/ reg pa chen mo bgyegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jom par byed pa 'di
296b6(mdo): ni sngon yongs su shes te/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang / gser dang rin po che
296b7(mdo): 'bar ba'i 'od gzer snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der gshegs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo/
296b8(mdo): rab tu bskor bar bzhed pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdud g.yog dang bcas pa/ bdud bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskorang pa gzugs sna tshogs myi sdug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/
296b9(mdo): sgra snyan pa bdud kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul bar byin kyis rlob pa mtshon ca rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/ mngon par sprul nas lhags te/ phyogs bzhi nas bskor nas bar chad bya bar
297a1(mdo): brtsams pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rab tu bshad pa'i zhal nor bu dang gser dang rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od gzer snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po yud tsam cig cang myi gsung bar bzhugs/
297a2(mdo): nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di yid kyis lan bdun du brjod do// rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di brjod ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can de dag thams
297a3(mdo): cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i bu ka re re nas skyes bu go cha gyon pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / tho ba dang / tshe gsum 'bar ba lag na thogs pa sha stag tshig 'di
297a4(mdo): skad du gang dag bcom ldan 'das la gnod par byed pa/ rud gnod sems can rnams zung shig zung shig/ chings shig/ chings shig/ gnod par sems pa rnams rab tu chom shig
297a5(mdo): gnod sems can dang gza' dang bgyegs dang log 'dren tha mas cad kyi srog phye mar gis shig ces 'dzer cing 'tho nad to// de nas bdud de dag thams cad byams ma'i ral gyis mngon par
297a6(mdo): btul nas/ la las ni bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ba nas/ la la ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan da 'i bar du'o// de la mthu che ba gzhan dag na de bzhin gshegs
297a7(mdo): pa'i spu'i bu ga nas 'thond pa'i skyes bu chen po de dag mthong nas/ grong khyer de nyid du spa kor bar gyur da// rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams/ spobs pa dang / stobs dang chal myed par gyur da cing / mda' gzhu' mahA
297a8(mdo): ngag kyang chag nas byer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bgegs dang / log 'dren dang bdud sdig can thams cad rab tu bcom nas sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/
297a9(mdo): rgalang to// pha rol tu gshegs so// bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo stobs kyis drag shul che ba/ rdzu 'phrul kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ 'di dran pa tsam gis sems can
297b1(mdo): sa cad bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams dang / gzhan gnod sems can rnams kyang sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las yongs su tha rad par byed do// bram ze chen po de lta bas na rtag par rjes su
297b2(mdo): dran pa'i yid la byed pas yid la bya'o// yi ger bris te rtag tu lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya'o// ci mngon zhe na/ snga ma bzhin te nyon cig/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin gi yul na grong khyer chen po
297b3(mdo): 'phags rgyal du myi zhig nyes pa byung nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin kyis gshed ma myi rnams la khyed kyis myi 'di sod cig bsko'o// de nas gshed ma'i myi de dag gis bsgo ba bzhin du myi de khrid de ri'i sul zhig tu phyinang
297b4(mdo): nas ral gri shubs phyung ste/ bsad par bshams pa dang / de'i tshe myi des rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di yid la dran no// yi ger bris nas lag pa g.yas pa la btags shing 'dug
297b5(mdo): sem can chen po de'i rig pa de'i mthus ral gyi mye lce cig tu gyur/ da nas/ rdul gtor ba bzhin du dum pu dum bur gyur pa to// de nas gshed ma'i myi de dag gis nges pa 'di
297b6(mdo): rgyal po la zhib tu bsnyad do// de nas rgyal po rab tu 'khrug sa nas kye myi 'di dag sa phyogs zhig na gnod sbyin gi phug yodade/ de na gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag mang po sha rjen za ba
297b7(mdo): gnas kyis khrid do cig ces bsgo'o// de nas myi de gshed ma myi de dag gis gnod sbyin gi phug der bor ro// gnod sbyin ki phug der bor ma thag tu de nas gnod sbyin de dag thams cad yid dka' ste/ myin
297b8(mdo): bza'o snyam nas rab tu brgyugs pa dang / de dag gis so sor 'brang ba 'di'i mthus/ myi de la mye lce gcig tu gyur pa'i 'od 'phro la/ rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang thams
297b9(mdo): cad spangs nas rang rang gi lus tshig par yang mthong ngo // de nas gnod sbyin de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas myi de khrid de sgo'i phyi ro lod tu bzhag nas/ bskor ba bya bar brtsams nas/ gshed
298a1(mdo): ma'i myi de dag gis rgyal po la zhib tu bsnyad pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// de nas rgyal po cher 'khrugs te rngam nas gal te de ltar na khyed cag deng la myi 'di chings te/ chur 'or cig ces
298a2(mdo): sa bsgo ba dang / gshed ma'i myi de dag gis chur 'or ro// myi de chur 'or ma thag tu myi re ji ltar thar la 'dug pa bzhin du chu myed par gyurd to// chings ma de dag kyang dum bu dum bur chad do//
298a3(mdo): rgyal pos de skad thos pa dang / de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ myig tshugs su bltas te/ kye ma'o 'amyi 'di ngo mtsha rad to// 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod snyam du nga rnam par rtog par gyur to//
298a4(mdo): zhes smras so// de nas rgyal po des kyi re bkug ste/ kye myi khyod ci zhig shes de skad mas so// kyi des smras @/ rgyal po chen po rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba cher mo
298a5(mdo): 'chang ba las/ kazhan ni bdag gis ci yang ma 'tshalang te/ sA de ni 'di'i mthu lags so// rgyal pos smras pa ngo mtshar che'o// rig pa chen mo dge bar gsungs/
298a6(mdo): 'chi bdag nan tur rmongs byed pa// sangs rgyas kyis byin kyis brlabs// sems can thams cad rab tu stsol/ nad dang sdug bsngal rab thar byed// rig rgyal
298a7(mdo): chen mo gzi brjid che// dus kyir 'chisas rab tu smol/ nad chen rnams ni zlog byed pa mgon po thugs rje can gyis gsungs/ de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba
298a8(mdo): yid kyis/ rig pa'i rgyal po chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo mchod nas mngor bar bstod do/ myi de yang blor thabs byin te/ rang gi gnyen gyi mdun tu grong khyer gyi ga tso
298a9(mdo): dbang bskur ro// bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo/ so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'dis thams cad du yang / mchod pa chen po rnyed do// sems can gnod sems
298b1(mdo): can thams cad kyis kyang 'gal bar myi bya'o// de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di sngon yongs su shes te/ gang du yang thogs pa myed do// de lta bas na gdon myi za bar rtag tu lus la gdags
298b2(mdo): shing bcang bar bya'o// bram ze chen po skar ma bzang po la cho ga legs par byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di bri bar bya'o// de nas bram ze chen po de yid rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das
298b3(mdo): la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/ zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di cho ga ji ltar bgyis te bri bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po nyon
298b4(mdo): cig/ sems can kun la snying bache'i phyir// ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya// gang gis sems can bde byed cing // nyam nga ba'i las las grol// nad rnams las kyang thar
298b5(mdo): bya dang // bud myed sbrum par 'gyur ba dang // sems can rnams kyi dbul ba'i// rma rnams gso' bar bya phyir nyon// bsnyen gnas la ni gnas gyur du nas//
298b6(mdo): rgyu skor rgyal du shes pa la// sangs rgyas mchod la brtson byas te/ byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed// snying rjes kun tu brlan sem sa dang // byams pa dang yang ldan gyur nas// rtag tu sems can
298b7(mdo): thams cad la// phan pa bskyed par brtson par bya// tsan dan dang ni gur kum dang / gla cir bsres pa'i chus bkrus te// bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa'i// gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya// sa dang lci ba bsres pa'is
298b8(mdo): de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor bya// bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag ste// lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag/ de la rin thang chen po'i// me tog bdug pa spos rnams gsol// tsan dan spri ka de bzhin du// a ka ru dang du ru ska//
298b9(mdo): sha kA ra dang lnga sbyar ba'i// bdug pa cho ga bzhin du dbul// cho ga ji bzhin dus bzhin ki/ so tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ me tog 'bras bu sa bon dang / spos rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan
299a1(mdo): mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang // nas zug 'o thug la stsogs pas// gtor ma'i bum pa gang bar bya// mtshan mang shi nad tu bkra shis pa// phyogs bzhi rnams su gzhag par bya'o// snga pa dkyil 'khon
299a2(mdo): dbus su gzhag/ spos kyis bkang ba'i phur bu rnams// grwa bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'gram logs su// seng ldeng phur bu bzhi btsugs la/ tshon skud kha dog sna sA yis// 'khor
