318b4(mdo): rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis mying 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// mtshams bcad do// ra phyogs su rgyang grags cig tshun chad du mtshams gcad do//
318b5(mdo): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi bar du yang rgyang grags gcig tshun cad mtshams bcad do// tad ya thA/ sa mu tsa// bi mu tsa/ pha la mu tse/ dza ga d+ha ra/ ma da swa la/ na la
318b6(mdo): ka ma ga/ sa mu shra ba ti/ bi mug ti yo ka/ hin sa ga ma a rA Na mu la/ bi ha ga mi/ i di tsi ri/ bi ti la kha yo ma la / la ga bi d+ha ra/ pra ti pra ge/ a tsaka kra ba
318b7(mdo): sa ma shra ba ti/ i la ya/ mi la ya/ ba phu sa d+ya/ a na ta ma/ a rA ba ti/ ka ra ba ti/ tiShi ni/ ti She/ a ka na ti/ sa gan ti/ sa mi di ma/ ba su ba Ne/ a n+de a n+de/ tA
318b8(mdo): ta/ pa r+ya sIn ya ha tan/ la su tan/ sam pa ra/ sam pa ra ba ti/ nar tan/ ni ru tan/ i la/ ta mi la sa ra pa la/ ba su pa la/ sa ta ma ta/ raSh+Ti ma ta// kun dga'
318b9(mdo): bo yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gas pa sngags stobs dang mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di dag ni/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so// ma 'ongs
319a1(mdo): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba na yang ngas 'a bshad do// myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang bshad do//
319a2(mdo): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bshad do// rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bshad do// gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis kyang bshad do// 'phrog ma bu dang bcas g.yog dang bcas pas kyang bshad do//
319a3(mdo): kun dga' bo dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma kapal la rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzind pa 'di bzung na/ ji ltar bstand pa dang /
319a4(mdo): ji ltar kun chub par byas pa bzhin du shes sam/ mthong ngam/ las su byed pa de la ni ji srid mcho' bar du bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde
319a5(mdo): legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'ang/ sa pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bkas rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang
319a6(mdo): sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis mying 'di zhes bya ba la bsru nga bar bya'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// yongs su zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur
319a7(mdo): bar bya'o// mtshams gcad do// shar phyogs su rkyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcad do// de bzhin du nub phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun cad mtshams bcad do// lho phyogs su rgyang grags
319a8(mdo): gcig tshun cad mtshams bcad do// byang phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad do// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad rgyang grags gcig tshun cad mtshams gcad do// kun dka' bo
319a9(mdo): rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lam dang / lam ma yin pa na gnas pa bzhi yod de/ de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ldan dang / kun bshes dang gang po dang / dga' ba'i dpal rnams te
319b1(mdo): gangab de dag gi mying shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni rgyal po'i 'jigs pa myi 'byung ngo // chom rkun kyi 'jigs pa dang / mye'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / myi'i 'jigs pa dang / myi ma yin pa'i
319b2(mdo): 'jigs pa myi 'byung ngo // kun dga' bo lag na rdo rje'i phu bo lag myur zhes bya ba grong khyer khor yug ces bya ba na gnas pa yod de/ gang de'i mying shes pa dang rus shes pa de la ni de bsrung bar byed/ yongs su skyob pa
319b3(mdo): byed/ yongs su 'dzind par byed/ chad pa zlog par byed/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byed do// myi nga 'di zhes bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje'i bu bo myur la gsol lo// gsol ba 'debs so// 'das pa
319b4(mdo): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bkas gang myi pa 'di zhes bya ba la skabs tshol ba dang / glags lta ba'i gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas
319b5(mdo): sam/ sha za 'am grul bum 'am srul po 'am/ lus srul po rnams kyis bdag la glags rnyed par ma gyur da cig/ bdag la glan ka rnyed par ma gyur da cig// kun dga' bo srin
319b6(mdo): mo chen mo bcu bzhi yod de/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' yu ma gi ldums na bzhugs pa na yang srung srung / bltam pa'i tshe ya nga srung srung / bltam zin pa'i 'og tu srung / sku 'khrung ba na
319b7(mdo): yang srung srung ste/ bcu bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ stobs ldan dang / dri me myed dang / sgra chen dang / rab mnyen dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / 'dzam bu mgrin dang / mchog len dang bla ma dang / grags ma dang /
319b8(mdo): rmad grags dang / 'thab dka' dang / rtsed mo dga' dang / sa 'dzin dang / 'thab 'dug rnams te/ gang de dag gi mying shes pa dang rus shes pa de la ni de dag srung bar byed yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /
319b9(mdo): zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byed do// kun dga' bo srini mo brgyad yod/ de dag ni skyes pa dang bud myed gnyid log kyang rung gnyid ma log kyang rung ste gzi byid 'phrog par byed// de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ra dang thub myed dang / da
319b10(mdo): slob dang / pra ma can dang / bran mo dmar mo dang / rab cen dang // bam po
320a1(mdo): myig bzangs dang / brgyad pa ste 'jigs byed do// gang de dag gi mying shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni de dag srung bar byed/ yongs su skyong ba dang / yongs su 'dzind pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su
320a2(mdo): 'gyur ba dang / chad pa zlog par byed do// kun dga' bo srin mo bdun yod de/ de dag ni khrag gi dri ma nam na dpag tshad brgyar yang rgyug go// de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di ste ste/ gzi brjid mchog dang / dga' brtsegs dang / sna tshogs
320a3(mdo): sbyin spong dang / bran mo dkar mo bzang dang / 'jug 'dod dang / grong khye yug dang / bdun pa ste ri srung ngo // gang de dag gi mying dang nus shes pa de la ni de dag srung bar byed/ yongs su skyob pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa dang / zhi ba dang
320a4(mdo): bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa zlog par byed do// kun dga' bo srin mo chen mo nag mo zhes bya ba bu stong yod pa/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa/ mtshan gcig gis dpag tshad brgyad khrir byin pa gcig cig yod de/ gang des
320a5(mdo): phyi shes pa de dang / rus zhes pa de la ni srung bar byed/ yongs su spyong / ba dang / yongs su 'dzind pa dang / 'i ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba/ dang / chad pa bzlog par byed do// kun dga' bo srin po chen po
320a6(mdo): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig tu 'dzam bu klong gi myi rnams spang zhing skyob pa yod de/ de dag kyang gang zher 'di lta ste/ ka tu myos dang / rje su myos dang / stobs kyis rgyags dang / 'od ma'i
320a7(mdo): sdums dang / lnga pa ste 'byor ldan no// gang de dag gi mying shes dang / rus shes pa de la mi de dag srung bar byed/ yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa zlog par byed do//
320a8(mdo): de bas na bdag gi mying 'di zhes bya ba'i phyir srin po lnga po gnod sbyid 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdud dang bcas pa de dag la gsol lo// gsol ba 'debs so// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom na
320a9(mdo): 'das rnams kyi bkas/ mying 'di zhes pas bsrung ba gis/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang ba de leg su 'gyur ba dang / chang pa zlog par gis shig/ tad sa tra/ bisri de/ bid ti dwe/
320b1(mdo): ritAM/ bi ka ra Ni/ ka ra bi ra sA ri/ ma d+hu ra k+Sho ShI/ sha ta ha nita/ b+ha Shi ta gI/ ag k+She/ nag k+She/ bi ka Ni te/ bi ku Di twe/ bi ra dzi/ big Sh+Ta b+ha twe// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ka
320b2(mdo): la bsrung ba byas pa dang / sba ba byas pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba byas pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa bzlog pa byas pa de la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas
320b3(mdo): pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang myir bcas pa dang / myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na myi 'am myi ma yin pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po/
320b4(mdo): 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ dri za'am/ klu 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ gsang ba ba'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ ro langs sam/ bya sdem 'am/ gshed byed dam/ srul po'am/ lus srul po'am/ smyo byed dam/
320b5(mdo): brjed byed glags lta ba dang / glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed pa'am/ glan ka rnyed pa'i sems can gang na yang myed la ngas yang da/ ga par ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas myed do// las kyi rnam par smin
320b6(mdo): pa ni ma gtog so// de bas na ngas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bkas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzind pa 'dra/
320b7(mdo): phyi 'am myi ma yin pa'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ sha za'am/ sta ma yin nam/ dri za'am/ klu'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ gas ba pa'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za'am/ ro langs sam/ byad sdem 'am/
320b8(mdo): gshed byed dam/ srul po'am/ lus srul po 'am/ smyo byed dam/ brjed byed rnams las mying 'di zhes bya ba srung bar bya'o// yongasu skyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / sba ba dang / zhi ga dang / bde legs su 'gyur
320b9(mdo): ba dang / chad pa bzlog par bya'o// dug myed par bya'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzind pa 'dis/ sdang bar sems pa thams cad dang / gnod par sems pa thams cad dang / myi phan par sems
321a1(mdo): thams cad dang / rab tu sdang bar sems pa thams cad dang / bdud thams cad gse ba lam srung ba thams cad dang / sa gcan srung ba thams cad dang / sho gam gi gnas srung ba de dag thams cad myos par bya'o//
321a2(mdo): rnam par myos par bya'o// rengs pa dang / rmugs pa dang / lag pa bzung ba dang / rkang pa bzung ba dang / sems bzung ba dang / lce bzung bar bya'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ni gang dang
321a3(mdo): gang du yang thar par 'gyur ro// kye ma bram ze mya ngan 'das// 'jig rten dag na sred las rgal// khon dang 'jigs pa kun spangs pa// ring mo zhig nas bzod mthong // bzod pa dka' thub mchog ste bzod pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa/
321a4(mdo): mchog ces sangs rgyas gsung // rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod pa ni// gzhan la 'tshe bas dge sbyong ma yin no// myig dang ldan pas yang bzhin// brtsal bar bya ba yod pas na// mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir//
321a5(mdo): sdig pa dag ni yongs su spang // da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang // byon sangs rgyas gang yin pa// thams cad la yang bdag phyag tshal// de dag kun la skyabs su mchi// 'jig rten dgra bcom
321a6(mdo): gshegs la// zla ba skyabs su mchos lags kyis// sangs rgya sa 'jig rten thugs brtse rnams// zla ba thar mdzod sla gcan la sa// swa gcam zla ba mun sel pa// nam mkha' dag la 'od byed
321a7(mdo): cing // lam mer 'dug la dkar ba dang // rnam par dag pa'i 'od ldan pa// bar sdang dag la a gzung bar// skye dgu'i sgon de myur du thong // de nas rings bzhin sgra gcan de// lus kyang rdul cing skrag gyur da la// nad pa bzhin/
321a8(mdo): du brtad pa yis// zla ba rnam par gtod par byed// ci'i phyir na spa gcan khyod// lus kyang rdul cing skrag gyur da la// nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis// rings par zla ba gtong bar byed// sangs rgyas tshigs bcad 'di brjod/
321a9(mdo): pas// gal te zla ba ma btabang// bdag gi 'go bo tshal bdun 'gas// gson yang bde bar myi 'gyur ro// kye ma bde bar gzigs pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba med// de dag gi ni tshogs su bcad// brjod na sA ga
321b1(mdo): zla ba gtong // bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'jig rten du sems can brjed ngas pa myed pa'i chos can byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni/ dus su yang dag par smra bas smra ba na/ dus su
321b2(mdo): yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no zhes bya ba dang / kun dga' bo gzhan yang tshangs par spyod pa la phan pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig gsungs pa gang yin pa de dag dang / kun dga' bo gzhan yang tshig 'di dag gis bya ba gang byed
321b3(mdo): pa'i don dang phan pa dang / bde ba yang 'dis byed par 'gyur te// s+yAd ya thA dan/ swa ti ma ti/ bi lu ma ti/ pra ka ra ni/ ka shu mad tse/ nan da ma ti/ bi gra hwe/ bi du ma ti/ I Da kri ta/ a rA/ su driSh+Ta bud d+hi/ b+ho d+ha ma ti/ su hu du me/ a la khu
321b4(mdo): a la myi te/ hi ka ra sha ra/ a shu ha/ pra ga shi ni// kun dga' bo sa bon gri rtsa ba bcu dang / sa bon gi rtsa ba'i tshig bcu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pra yod do// kun dka' bo tshig de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsung bar 'gru
321b5(mdo): ba dang / ston par 'gyur ba yang yod de// de dag bstan pa 'di la zhu gas pa'i myi rnams kyi khar brjod na/ gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams/ kyang bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyur ro// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
321b6(mdo): gang gis phyir myi ldog pa'i sa'i tshig bden pa rnams la 'jig rten gi myig gi mchog dang / dge sbyong rnams kyi nang na dge sbyong skyi de ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
321b7(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'jigs pa myi mnga' ba bag tsha ba myed pa ste/ myi skrag myi 'bros la 'jigs pa myed cing / 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa dang bral ba/ 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa spangs pa skye
321b8(mdo): bung zhes byed pa myed pa'o zhes yang dag par smras pas smra ba ni// dus su yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ mying 'di zhes bya ba la bde legs su gyur da cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
321b9(mdo): gis tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa gang gi yang rung ba de dag gi nang na ni/ 'phags par gyes pa'i tshul khrims mchog ces bya ste/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des myed
322a1(mdo): 'di zhes bya ba la bde legs su myu rad cig/ gnas brtan rgyal po'i bu thu bo dang 'dra ba/ rab tu byung nas ring du lon pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ mngon par smad pa rnams kyi mchog 'di lta ste/ dge slong kun shes
322a2(mdo): ko'u byi n+ya dang / 'dod pa nyung ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gnas pa dang / chos shes pa rnams kyi mchog 'od srung chen po dang / shes rab che ba dang / spobs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba drang / mthu
322a3(mdo): che ba rnams kyi mchog mo'u dgal gi bu chen po dang / lha'i myig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ma 'gags pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog kun dga' bo dang / 'dul ba 'dzind pa rnams kyi mchog nye bar 'khor dang / chos
322a4(mdo): smra ba rnams kyi mchog byams ma'i bu gang po dang / bslab pa la gus pa'i mchog sgra gcan 'dzin dang / mal cad dngastan sgo ba rnams kyi mchog gyar bu nor dang / seng ge'i sgra spogs pa rnams kyi mchog pa ra dA tsa bsod snyoms
322a5(mdo): sen dang / khyim pa dad pa skyes pa rnams kyi mchog dag po 'char ka da lnga dang gyis mchod pa rnams kyi mchog legs mthong gi bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des mying 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongs
322a6(mdo): bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyu ra ba dang / chad pa bzlog par bya'o// rgyal po'am/ chom rkun nam/ ma 'am chu 'am/ dgra 'am/ myi mdza ba'am/ a du 'gro ba'am/
322a7(mdo): log par 'gro ba 'am/ gnyid log pa'am/ ra ro ba'am/ bag myed pa las bsrung bar bya'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig kang kyis sems can rkang pa myed pa'am/ rkang pa gnyis pa 'am/ rkang pa bzhi pa'am/ rka
322a8(mdo): mangs sam/ gzugs can nas/ gzugs cad ma yin pa'am/ 'du shes can nam// 'du shes can ma yin pa'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed byin skye mched kyi sems can ji snyed cig pa de dag gi napa nani/ de bzhin
322a9(mdo): gshegs pa mchog ces bya ste/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mying 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde sogs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa bzlog
322b1(mdo): bya'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog ces bya ste/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des myi 'di zhes
322b2(mdo): bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa bzlog par bya'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis tshogs sam/ 'dus pa 'am
322b3(mdo): mang po'am/ 'khor ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog ces bya ste/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des rgyal khams sam/ yul 'khor ram/ grong
322b4(mdo): ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khyim 'am/ gnas sam/ zhing ngam/ nad pa 'di la bsrung bar bya'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi
322b5(mdo): ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / mtshams gcad par bya'o// 'byung po thams cad bzlog par bya'o// gzi' byin 'phro/ ga pa rnams bzlog par bya'o// bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig
322b6(mdo): kang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad khri ngan
322b7(mdo): stong bstand pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des mying 'di zhes bya ba'i nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi byang bar gyur da cig/ myed par gyur da cig/ zhi bar gyur da cig/ rab tu zhi bar gyur da cig/
322b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha dang / sgra ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
322b9(mdo): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod to// chos mngon pa'i mdzod/ byang chub bsdus bsdus pa ste/ gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// /
323a1(mdo): rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang / shu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la stsogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
323a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgyam brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// dus gsum gi dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/
323a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad snying rje'i tsan dam dri zhim po'i spos kyis byugs pa'i sku// zhabs rten ki pad ma la/ skra dang lha ma yin gi nor bu'i cod pan gis gdugs pa rang byung sel mdzad/ bra ma 'jig rten
323a4(mdo): la phan par mdzad pa/ sto da pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ nyes ba dang bral ba/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ gzugs mdzes pa/ mtshan gsal ba'i gzi brjid can// sku dpe byad kyis brgyand pa/ rno
323a5(mdo): tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// pad ma rgyas pa ltar zhes pa da de/ tshems dkar zhing snyoms la/ thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing / snang la/ nor bu drim
323a6(mdo): byed pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/ swa'i bgasal pa/ ma'i 'od gzer stong 'bams/ bang po'i 'od sdang ba'i dkyisa'or zis kyis gnond pa/ thub pa'i mchog stobs bcu
323a7(mdo): ldan pas phyag 'tshal so// 'dud do// oM nI nr-i d+haM/ a a/ tId+hI/ ni bzhi pa/ shAn tigan ti/ na ma sha ya/ namA pa sa/ ta thA tA nu ga ta/ swA thA ba/ a bAT+Ta/ sa mud ya/ a sa ya ba la/ a \u0f7f
323a8(mdo): mas/ ba la/ a myi tag sa/ a tri ba la/ krung srung / d+honu d+ho'u/ blo 'u b+hoT/ dwe ru b+he ru/ hri s+thi/ thA ga ban/ b+ha thAn ta ka/ su maSh+Ta/ b+ho k+Sha/ ma hA/ shAn ti ka ra/ pA ba ki la/ bi Sha/ rA
323a9(mdo): kamA sa// de ras dpe' byed mi tsham gsal pa// yan lag thams cad rab brgyand cing // nyi ma bzhin du gsas pa'o// 'bar ba'i dkyis 'khor rgyan mnga' ba// grags zhing dri ma
323b1(mdo): spangs la// dri myed skyon bral chos kyi blo// khyab bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan// rdul bral dpal dang ldan pa po// rin chen sa gzhi chen thos// pho brang rtse mo rdo rje rtse// rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyurd
323b2(mdo): pa// nor bu du ma rab 'phro zhing // 'od gzer dri myed gsal bkod pa'i// rdo rje'i dkyis 'khor lo brang na// thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la// seng ge'i khri chen yangs la bzhugs// nor bu'i dbyig gi sa gzhi dang /
323b3(mdo): khri chen rab spa de nyid la// de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen gi// phun sum tshogs pa brgyan ko lta// thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od// 'od gzer nom pa'i 'od ldan pa// bde klag shin tu bkra shis tshul// 'od gsal skyil mo
323b4(mdo): krung bcas nas// sku 'od 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor tsam// 'od ga/ sal rgyas pas thub dbang gi// dri myed 'od gzer bkye ba ni// myig yol rdo rje can zhes bya// dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa'i// rdo rje
323b5(mdo): can dag rab btul ba// gang yin de kun dag byas nas// dkyi/ la 'khor dri myed bskor bar byed// ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun// legs par shin tu dag byas nas// srid gsum dkyil 'khor rgya
323b6(mdo): la// rnam pa du mar 'od gsal ba// 'gro dang myi 'gro ma lus pa// bskor nas bde chen rdo rje can// rdo rje ras gri thogs pa de// cod pa ni ma g.yos nang du zhugs// de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis//
323b7(mdo): 'gengs shing myig ni glog ltar 'gyur// rig sngags hUM zhes sgrogs pa po// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs byed pa// bzhin mdzes 'dzum gis rnam par brgya nad// sdig myed myig rtsa rgor gyurd cing // stan las langs
323b8(mdo): te phyag 'tshal nas// legs par mchod byas spras pa ni// kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing / bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel // reg sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa// thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs//
323b9(mdo): de gzigs dge ba du ma brnyes// sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas par gyur da// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che// bskal pa gcig tu spyod pas kyang // rgyud mar sangasa' rgyas kun 'byung zhing // spyod pa
325a1(mdo): sangs nas ni// sdig bra mnga' bdag rgyal ba sa// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas kyang // kun gyis sa'i dbang phyug po// thub mchog dam pa de la ni// mtshan brgya lnga brgyad dag gis bstod// mnyam nyid
325a2(mdo): chos te de bzhin nyid// shin tu rtogs pa lam me ba// dul ba brtan pa dri ma sel// dri ma myed pa sbyor bral ba// thub pa sangs rgyas shinang tu zhi// 'jig rten 'gon po skye dgu'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyin
325a3(mdo): mongs thulang // de bzhin rgyal pa rdul bsdus par// stond pa smon mdzad brtan pa ste// sdig pa myed pa rdul dang bral// 'jig rten 'gon po sdang mdzad pa// dag la zhi ba zas gtsang sras// nyon mongs rab
325a4(mdo): 'joms par 'dogs pa// skyon dpa po ste dri ma sde yang // spyod tshul dri myed tshul bzang ba// zab pa rnam par gnor par brtan/ brtan po thugs bkye rnam par rgyal// mgon po de bzhin mgon
325a5(mdo): mdzad pa// zhi ba bdag nyid zhe sdang bral// bcings pa las// grol nges par krol// 'jig rten kun mchog mkha' sa// bdag kare myi 'dzin dri ma myed// ngan song se lad pa dpas/
325a6(mdo): dang ldan// dpal mdzad de bzhin phan pa mdzad// mnyam pa myed pa dpe' myed pa// khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong // khengs pa myed pa dman pa myed// mnyam pa de bzhi
325a7(mdo): myi mnyam mnyam// snang ba brnyes pa snang byed byed// 'jig rten snang mdzad sdig myed pa// sgrib thams cad spangs pa ste// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// dpa' bo zhi ba zhi mdzad pa// nyon
325a8(mdo): mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad// mnga' bdag thabs mkhyend thabs che ba// sems can kun gyi khru sa lags// don yod brnyes dka' blo dang ldan// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thub par dka'// skyong
325a9(mdo): pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzind pa// dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa myed// gzungs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste// sum bcu pa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba//
325b1(mdo): ri 'gro bar 'gyur// legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyi ni// tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par gis// nyon mongs zad par bya ba la// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'dis chog/ sdig pa myed cing dge la sdud // sdug pa'i rang
325b2(mdo): bzhin rab 'jungs pa// gang gis thos nas de spong ba// nga'i mngon sum 'byor da par 'gyur// sdig pa gzhan yang myi bya ste// snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya// gzungs mchog gi ni mthu stobs kyis// sdig pa
325b3(mdo): thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur// tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang // tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang // sdig pa myi dge gang byas pa// dag 'gyur 'di la the tsom myed// yar gyi ngo'i ches brgyad dang // de bzhin ches ni bco
325b4(mdo): lnga la// bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs la// cho ga pazhin du sangs rgyas mchod// de nas rmongs pa myed par yang / nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing // shi nang tu thub dka'
325b5(mdo): dpe' myed pa// nyes pa bzlog pa'i gzungs brjod na// thub pa'i zhal gi zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba nges pa mthong bar 'gyur/ des na tshogs rnams rdzogs pa'o// rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du
325b6(mdo): 'gyur// 'od dpag myed la mnga' ba'i// yon tan mtha' yas rab rgyas pa// bskal pa bye ba stong du yang // mtha' myi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'tshang gi tshig/ dkyil 'khor dag na gnas rnams
325b7(mdo): kyis// thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa// bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar byed// rdo rje ral gyi la stsogs pa// lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang // ri bau ta se ri reb la// gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang
325b8(mdo): rnams dang / de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na// 'khod puSh+Ti rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // ma la ya'i ri bo la// gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang // khyab 'jug lha chen la stsogs pa/
325b9(mdo): snga'i bdag po rnams dang ni/ lag na rdo rje la stsogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams// nor bu'i dpung rgyan rna cha dang // rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus// rab tu bskyod de
326a1(mdo): sum pa// gtong ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags// thams cad mkhyend pa yul las 'das// spyod yul sgrib pa myi mnga' ba// byang chub sems dpa'i dbab
326a2(mdo): po rgyal// dam pa'i don te tshul che ba// shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la// sgrib pa myed par 'char ba brnyes// rigs chen mthun par skyes pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas// khyad par brnyes
326a3(mdo): pa mnyam nyid brnyes// kyi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa// nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'// dge slong sdig pa skyong mdzad pa// gnod pa myed par bde bar 'byind/
326a4(mdo): blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen // thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus na/ san// dkon pa bde ba thob 'gyur ba// mnyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan// 'jig rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon// zhi gnas
326a5(mdo): mtshon cha thub par dka'// bsam gis myi khyab bsam yas yu/ la// dpe' myed pa ste dpe bya ba// 'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan// legs gsum blo'i stobs kyis 'byung // mkhas
326a6(mdo): pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa// rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul can// gsung ba chen po ye shes che// gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste/ mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das// bya ba'i mtshan nyid myed pa po// sangs
326a7(mdo): rgyas yul du skyes pa ste/ shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba// kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can// 'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba// kun mkhyen yul gyi spang ba ste// thabs yang phun sum tshogs ldan pa// rdzu 'phru
326a8(mdo): rol po'i thabs dang ldan// chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po// rab ston yon tan smrar mdzad pa// spyod pa ma lus 'dud par mdzad// yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas
326a9(mdo): bgegs byed ma legs byed pa bcom// bdud kyi dregs pa seld par mdzad// g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes// dpa' bo chen po thub myed stobs// theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcings// blo chen rgal bar
326b1(mdo): chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags// dpe' byad bzang po bkod po yis// spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston // dka' ba myed pa'i stond pa po// de bzhin nges pa bde sbyin la// mthu chen yangs pa rgya che ba/
326b2(mdo): bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams se lad par mdzad// brtson chen spyo ba che ba ste/ dgyes pa chen po stabs po che// mthu brnyes brtan pa chen po ste// gnas ldan dbang gis da rang pa lags// gsal ba gsu
326b3(mdo): ldan dpe' myed pa// dge ba stong po nyid kyis rgyal// rab tu zhi ba mun pa myed// blo gros chen po chos 'dzind pa// phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes// 'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa// dpal mdzad dpal
326b4(mdo): mnga' dpal dang ldan// dpal gyi longs spyod shi nad tu rgyas// bcom ldan legs bsgos spro bar mdzad// gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas// mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa// mnyam pa
326b5(mdo): nyid kyis mtshan dpag myed// rab tu dgyes pa longs spyod gas// la// gzhi bcas legs pa mnyam pa lags// blo dag blo ldan dri ma spangs// gnas chen brtan par ldan pa ste// rgyas//
326b6(mdo): ba longs spyod dri ma myed// thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba// ske/ sad pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs// de bzhin 'joms myed nyon mongs sel // dri myed skyon bral longs spyod can// sna tshogs
326b7(mdo): 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes// sku bzang dge ba'i rig pa'i mchog/ thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'od bzang ba// myi gnas yolongs spyod dam pa lags// chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas// brjed 'os mchod gnas
326b8(mdo): longs spyod che// nam mkha'i mtshan te rnam dag blo// rin cen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa// khyu mchog che spyan pa rdzi ma// rgyal ba skyon gsal shes rab can// shes rab thabs dang ldan pa ste// 'jig rten myi dge
326b9(mdo): kun las 'das// dag par longs spyod bstan par can// sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod// pha rol phyind pa kun la mnga'// ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa// rnam thar sgom par mngon
327a1(mdo): 'di zhi ba ste// nga rgyal la stsogs nyon mongs 'joms// 'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon tu phyogs// gzhan gis myi thub gzugs dang ni// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa// de dag
327a2(mdo): rnam dag bdag nyid bde// sems can kun la bde 'dod pa lan cig zos pa tsam gis kyang // de dag sa cen 'bras bu gnas// ring por mi thogs dga' 'gyur ni// chang stsogs lta ba ci zhig smos// de phyir rtag
327a3(mdo): rgya rab bsgrims la// gtan tu bde ba 'dod pa'i sa// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzugs// mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya// kang ni ga nang par langs nas brjod// bdag nyid kyis kyang bton na ni// de'i don kum
327a4(mdo): bu ba 'gyur la// gnod pa dang yang 'phrad myi 'gyur// 'di na yon tan kun gyi spos// dge ba phun sum tshogs pa sbyin pa// kun mkhyen da 'bras bu bla myed mchog/ bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin// 'dra/
327a5(mdo): bu 'byor pa ni yang rung // thob par myi 'gyur dogs pa myed// kun mkhyen dgo 'phang thob gyur nas// dpe' myed gnas su 'o// bar 'gyur// 'di ni dge zhing 'bras bur ldan/ sangs rgyas sa'i
327a6(mdo): 'bras bu sbyin// yid du 'ong zhing yon tam ldan// snying rje'i drim myed sbyin pa// 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo// 'jig rten kun gnas dka' ba ste// 'jig rten kun gyi bde 'byung ba// 'di dang 'a
327a7(mdo): bkang yang byed// stor ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzugs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs son/ 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgyas brgyang pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/
327a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chab tu dbang bsu rang ba/ 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas rang gi snying po sbas pa// na ma sne yang dwi kA nAm/
327a9(mdo): sarba ta bA ga tA nan/ tad ya bA au/ sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ dA ra dA ra/ ma ha dA ra/ ma ra tsam/ ma haHra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma ha pA ra/ ka ma pa ka ma pa ma bkam pa/ bru~M ma pa/ swa ra na/ da mA/ a ga ma?/
327b1(mdo): dka' ba'i// nyon mongs rgyamatsho pha rol gshegs// theg pa chen po tshul la gnas// theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa// nyan thos sa pa'i spyod yul can// rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste// sangs/
327b2(mdo): rgyas sa'i 'bras bur gnas// kong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen // khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs// bde 'byungs dang zhing rnams kyi// mtsho chen dag la phongs par spyod// sangs rgyas dbang po
327b3(mdo): rgyas pa sa// mtshan brgya ma brgyad kyis bstod nas// des sna phyogs tshogs rnams kyis// phyag byas mgo slang phyogs cig 'khod// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na/ gnas pa ma sus cha mar 'jo/
327b4(mdo): bod tu rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba// langs nas cod pan rab tu yol/ dkyil 'khor nga mthon po thams cad du// dper chen por yongs bkang nas/ nor bu'i rgyun ni
327b5(mdo): rnam g.yo zhing / sas grags pa sna spogs te// kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan ma/ bskal pa grangs myed kasa? ma 'asags pa/ byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams
327b6(mdo): kyis// mtshan brgya na brgyad legs par brjod// kye ma rnyed dang bde 'thung ba// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos ras kyang // gang zhig klog cing rgyal ba bstod//
327b7(mdo): 'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa// bcom ldan 'das drung brjod na ni/ sI ba dang ku na nas nyon mongs dang // sdig pa thams cad dag par
327b8(mdo): mthong // mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton ma// sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing // nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spong // shes rab chen po nyid du 'gyur// de ni long spyod chen po dang // bde ba las kyang
327b9(mdo): nyams myi 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du// tho ldan chetshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba// yon tan mtha' yas sras de la// bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis// mngon sum gzigs nas bkra sul pa rgyal po'as
328a1(mdo): par skyes// chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod// sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'// sdang bar byed pa 'byung ba po// sri dag sul ye shes nyi ma lags// gtso bo chen po cher grags pa// seng ge
328a2(mdo): chen po stobs po ma/ cha lugs chen po zhal che ba// skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul// rdo rje pi ru be ru r+ya// nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs// bi ru gser gi bcal bkram pa// sku chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs// na
328a3(mdo): mdangs nyi ma du ma'i gzil// lcang lo'i cod pan dbu thod can// rig sngags 'chang rgyas zhabs la btud// brjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod// nor bu brgya 'gul 'od gzer gyis// brang gi phyogs rnams dag par byas// nod
328a4(mdo): pam can te 'od 'tsher ba// nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan// rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing // dri myed dkyil 'khom rab tu 'phro// rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa'i// 'bar ba chen po lta ba can// 'od gzer mang pos phog par
328a5(mdo): phan pa'i thabs ni rab tu stond pa// brjid pa'i tshul gis bzhi// da pa'i// 'od kyis zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod// dpung brgyan/ 'od gzer spel mar bkod// mchom bris shin tu mdzes par 'a
328a6(mdo): lhun po phrad cing 'khrug pa ltar// ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen spogs// rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo can// shin tu dga' mdzad bde sbyin pa// byam sa pa'i dkyil 'khor kon bgos// brtsan pa kun sas rnam par rgyas//
328a7(mdo): sI rje'i spobs las byung ba ste// mtshon cha chen po shin tu 'bar// byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can// kun nas sba ba'i dkyil 'khor ba// ma pham thub byed dag pa ste// sangs rgyas cha sugs mnyam phyed che// byams pa'i
328a8(mdo): snying po snying po che// byams pa'i pad ma las byung ba// rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can// rdo rjes bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud// de bzhin bsten cing btud pa po// grub pa chen po rig sngags
328a9(mdo): grub// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad// thams cad grub mdzad grub pa po// sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags// gsang sngags chen po rnam par nges// mdo sde bkod mdo sdud pa// nges 'gyur nges pa'i 'od spo
328b1(mdo): sa ka ra swA hA// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ 'di skad ces bka' bas lang to// kye la gzungs chen po 'di ni yon tan che ste/ mtha' yas par khyab pas/ ngabs lang pa bye ba zag mar
328b2(mdo): bor yang shin tu bos par bka' na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad stonang pa// de bzhin gshes pa grangs myed pa/ 'jig rter gi khams thams cad snyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/ sgrib pa dang sdug
328b3(mdo): bsngal dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ rmyi lam ngand pa dang / ltas ngad pa thams cad las tha rad par byed pa/ sems can gi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa/ yongs su tha da par byed pa ste shi rang tu dkon
328b4(mdo): ba'o// de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gi 'khor / lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa/ nor bu'i cod pan gis bsgyings pa/ rgyan 'phreng rab tu g.yo' ba rnams kyis/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig
328b5(mdo): 'phags pa byams pa la 'tshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par brko// dpa// dga' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa/ rgyab chab kyi li ba dag po ste/ 'jig rten bdag por rnam par gsal// dar pa chen
328b6(mdo): po mngon par rgyas// tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste// de bzhin yangs shing rdul dang bral// dbang chen rtse ltar 'od ldan pa// sa'i dbang thug rnam par gnon// rgyal chen mtshon cha bcu pa ste// mchon
328b7(mdo): chachen po rdo rje'i mtshon// yon tan 'od brgyas bsrings pa ste// nor bu rnga ma'i rgyan thogs pa// srid gsum dgan snga pa'i sku// rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can// spu dang po zla 'byin da ti se'i// rtse nas dkyil 'khor
328b8(mdo): 'char ba bo// dkyil 'khoram cheran po longs spyod pa// rab tu dka' ba de bzhim nges// yongs su dga' ldan chen po lawe/ me ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas gdung rgyang rgyas mang da cing // sangs rgyas dkyis
328b9(mdo): 'khor rgyan dang ldan// sangs rgyas longs spyod longs sar spyod// sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// ti se zla 'byin bzhin du yangs// sa'i dbang phyug bde mdzad pa// pad ma 'dab stong che mo can// rdo rje bar ma legs
329a1(mdo): 'phags pa nam mkha' snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i zhas ras rgya che zhing / spya gi 'od 'gro bas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri zhim par mdzad pa/
329a2(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i spyod yul can ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad sdang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tsha lo// oM sa sti/ ka ma la kI/ bi bu la sam b+ha ba/ d+ha rmad du ko tsa ra swA hA// de nas gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu// ngan song dang
329a3(mdo): ngan 'gro thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar gyur du// sa yang g.yos par gyur// rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang grag par gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang leg so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
329a4(mdo): bka' stsal pa/ kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na// 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po/ dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA'i mchog gi gzungs/ 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba bsod nas
329a5(mdo): chen mo sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad theg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/ rin po che'i phung por gyur pa la/ de nyon cig dang / 'di thos pas drim myed par 'gyur zhing // leg/
329a6(mdo): par zhus rnas par 'gyur sa/ shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyurapad ma snga zur 'gyur te/ 'khor ba'i nyes pas myo gos so// nyis / bur gyur te sems can thams cad snang bar byed do// zla ba wA bur
329a7(mdo): gyur te/ sems can thams cad rab tu sim par byed do// nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis myi gos so// sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te mthon dman myed do// spun po lta bur 'gyur ro//
329a8(mdo): sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par myi nus so// thar pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mye gos so// de la bgrogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa/ tshad myed kru nges myed pa dag thob pa
329a9(mdo): 'gyur ro// nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rjod pa dang / ston pa tsa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa tsam gis gang ci sang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
329b1(mdo): sdang bas dri ma sel pa'i mdzad// 'bar ba rtsa 'bar 'od sdang ba// dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste// gzhung dang mthun pa'i chos dbyings dang // nye bar gyur da cing shim tu nyes// swa ha swA ha'i bdag po mchog/ 'od zer bde legs
329b2(mdo): legs mdzad pa// stobs chen 'chang ba bkra shis pa// nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags// stong byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan// mkha' ltar dri myed spyod yul can// dpa' bo rdo rje 'jos par mdzad// rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa// sgrab
329b3(mdo): pa po ste rtsod pa myed// dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rje stond// rlung chen thugs kyis bskyod pa'i// g.yo dpa 'brug sgrogs sgra ldan pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul pad ma ste// de bzhin nyid kyi 'tsho las skyes// mngon shes chen po mngon shes
329b4(mdo): brnyes// khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nas sa'i dbang phyug po// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la// stod nas kun nas gnod bral ba// thub pa'i nyi mas bka' stsal pa// kye ma myi rgya rtsa brgyad mchog/
329b5(mdo): gi yon tan 'od ldan pa// bde dang phun sum tshogs sgrub pa// thab sa chen bla na myed pa ste// mying brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// 'jig rte na kun kyi bde skyid pa// 'di ni bton pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa thas
329b6(mdo): cad dag par 'gyur// sdig pa dag las rgyal ba'i// byams pa' bstod pa'i gnas po la// mying rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis// myi ni las gang stod pa// de la lha la stsogs kun dang // lag na rdo rje stobs can rnas
329b7(mdo): rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun// brtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed// gang zhig mying brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ myur du 'don pa'i myi de ni// sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te// 'di la the tshom yod myed do// rang par mas nas lus
329b8(mdo): nas ni// ga zhig byas pa'i sems kyis stong// de la byams par rtogs pa ni// byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur// de phyir dri ma thams cad sel byed cing // sdig 'jos yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jig rten
329b9(mdo): sdug bsngal seld pa'i// mying brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par spogs// / 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// rdzogs s+ho//
330a1(mdo): mug rab 'gyed pa'i 'od// rdo rje 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'char ba// rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang // rin cen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po// rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun ma rje dbang // dpa' bo rig sngags 'chan
330a2(mdo): dbang srid gsuM dbang // rdo rje bzang po rdo 'od rdo rje 'bar// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan// rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag/ rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang // na mtha' stso zhingadri sku'i che lugs sngo// sku mdog sngo zhing sngo ba'i//
330a3(mdo): 'od kyis brgyan// ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams// mkha' sngo gzhal myed khang 'bar nang na bzhugs// lha gzhal dri myed shin tu myi bzad 'bar// rab tu drag la 'od gzer 'phro zhing 'gyu// sdig sel rdul ltar 'khru
330a4(mdo): myed 'phreng mchog can// glog gi stobs kyi snang bas bsgrags la brtan// ral gyi'i mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon// rdo rje'i mtshon thog/ sa mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs// 'khor lo'i mtshon thogs btsabs
330a5(mdo): pa ri dang 'khrul// gsal zhing mtshon thogs bgyegs kyi stobs la/ rdzogs pa// bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum dag rdo rje dbyug/ sku rnamasathams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan// grags pa'i rig su byung bas/
330a6(mdo): rgyal po mdzad// mu tig 'phreng bas bsregs shing mdzes par bgyis sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes// rab 'byam mchog rnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes// mthu stobs skrag par brnyes shing gru
330a7(mdo): brnyes la// rig pa gsum gi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa// bde 'dren zhi ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren la// cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren// byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren// segs 'dren zhing ga/
330a8(mdo): stobs 'dren snying rje can// dri myed cha lugs gsal ba lugs 'bar ba// rnam grags bsregs pas grags pa'i ba dan can// 'gro ba'i skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen// long spyod gsal bar ston pa'i
330a9(mdo): sems kyis 'jug/ sku dmar dang sku mthon sku mdzes sku bzang ba// sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku// sku rol rdo rje'i skum par spyan legs sku// rig sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin cen bsdams// gtsug gi nor bu gtsug
330b1(mdo): bzlas brjod byed pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char myi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrug pa dang / myi nad dang / rmyi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa'i dus dang / 'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / dkon pa dang /
330b2(mdo): gsul 'gyed pa dang / gcan zan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed la/ bde ba dang / 'byor da pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de
330b3(mdo): ngag thams cad kyis/ ha ha zhes ca co dang / ga zha bton te/ sma dang zhes byas nas/ gos dang rgyan sna tshogs bskyed de/ snying nas phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa/ 'phags
330b4(mdo): pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa/ yang dag par brjod pa nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog/ 'byor da ldan blo gros rin cen rgya mtsho mnga'/ sems
330b5(mdo): can dag pa bla myed rin cen mchog/ tha rad pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel// kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs myin mkhyen// tha rad mchog chos mkhyen pa de dang myi bde mkhyend//
330b6(mdo): sam mkhyenang gces mkhye nang dge dang myi dge mkhye nga // dus ma khye nad dge mkhye nang dge dang myi dge mkhyend// dus mkhyend dge ma khye nad stobs dang stobs myin mkhyen// 'gro mchog chos mchog
330b7(mdo): sems can yon tan mchog// lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul myin mchog/ rgya mchog chos mchog 'dzind dang 'dzin myed chos// dag mchog rtogs mchog mchog dang mchog myin mchog/ zhi rab snying rje'i
330b8(mdo): rab ste khyod kyi rab// 'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten kyi rab// rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs bache'i rab// mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig rab// legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs myin sgron// thar smon
330b9(mdo): rig smon rgyal dang rgyal myin smon// dge smon kaza smon nor bu 'od kyi smon// rgyu skar zla ba rgyal las shar ba'i sgron// mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od gzer 'od// legs 'od thar da pa'i pho brang rten pa'i 'od// 'od chen kati
331a1(mdo): sA cen bde byed gsal zhing phyag na sngams// spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldar rtse gsum selang // 'dod bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mda'// nab bza' bzang ba nabs g.yas phen tshabs cher 'phen// leg
331a2(mdo): bris sna tshogs mtshon na sna tshogs mda'// na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyad kyi dpal// zhal ras zla ba'i 'od gzer rgyas pa 'dra// zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor da mdzad// bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od gzer rab
331a3(mdo): 'jebs mda'// zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gas la mdzad lam me ba// dbang chen rdo rje'i thog tog 'jigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin// sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan// blo gros chen po blo gros rdo ba'i mchog
331a4(mdo): rgyan 'dzin dpal 'jim rin cen zhal dang ldan// rgyu dang byi rgya'i 'gro ba kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras 'phreng ba bzang // stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid// skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing
331a5(mdo): rtags// myi'i mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu// spu 'dra'ango/ dpa'i mnga' dang rdo rje can// mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyad bzang sdug pa da ldan// ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gi stegs// gces
331a6(mdo): gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'dug par mdzad// brtan po rgyu la rab tu res gyur pa// dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags// cig pu skye dku'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen// rnam par snang mdzad
331a7(mdo): zhing ka gnas nas skyes// dbang bskur brnyes shings bcur legs gnas pa// gnas chen sod pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags// skye dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs seld pa dang // sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di
331a8(mdo): bos nas// bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'dod byed pa// 'jig rten zla ba gcig char bzhin du snang // dam ma'a'i snying po sems cad mchog cig pa'i// mdun 'dug dang par bstod pa 'di brjod gang // de ni
331a9(mdo): srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing // dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang tha rad par 'gyur// g.yul dpa' thab rtsod shin tu myi bzad dang // mu ke'i gnod pa myi nad byung ba na// mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dad bskyed
331b1(mdo): can cod pan mchog/ cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog/ dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog/ sngags bzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs// rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu// srid
331b2(mdo): gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stor mnga'// ri her 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa// yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags// nor bu chen po nor sdug non bu'i 'o// nyi ma'i nor bu'i tshul spyod nor
331b3(mdo): bu 'bar// yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pa// nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ltar// sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags// srid gsum srungs ma gcig pu rgyal
331b4(mdo): sras mchog/ zhi ba rab tu zhi la skyabs 'os stag/ skye dgu'i bdag po pad 'byung pad ma skyes// kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba// dar ba legs bshad rab dul legs
331b5(mdo): bshad phyag/ blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bza/ nga// mkhas rab zhi rab mchog go chos dang ldan// zhi ma/ dzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas// 'od kyi 'byung
331b6(mdo): gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad// legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs skyed pa// snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grags mdzad// rnam grol des grol shin tu grol ba'i
331b7(mdo): bro// blo yangs rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grags// kun tu longs spyod sgo ste blo'i mchog/ blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs// sangs rgyas pad ma 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal/
331b8(mdo): dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thad/ snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul/ ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba// spyan zur mda' ni rab tu la gtad legs pa/ 'jigs
331b9(mdo): myed zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra// mu dang thur brgya'i mtshon thogs mtshon cha rdzogs// drag po 'joms pa sdig sel gsum las skyes// rab thul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris par sla/ rab tu dag pa gnye rab gas mdog can
332a1(mdo): po 'di skad gsungs// hUM kha rbu dum bru~M/ 'di hU~M ni/ hUM hUM hUM/ bdag gi lnga phung yan lag la/ thog ma myed pa'i dus mtha' nas/ tha ma'i dus 'di yin chod du/ bri nyes pa dang klag nyes pa/ nyan nyes pa dang bshad
332a2(mdo): nyes pa/ bsgom nyes pa dang bsgrub nyes pa/ de dag thams cad sbyang du gsol// de'i snying po 'di skad gsungs/ oM ba ga bag taM nam du ye du stan swA hA/ seMs can thas cad kyi don tu 'phags pa sdong po brgyan pa'i mchog ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
332a3(mdo): rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya tsan tra gar ba prad nya pa ra myaM ta ma ha ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad
332a4(mdo): bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po la zhab bya rgod phung po'i ra la bzhugs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun tshad myed grangs myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po dang thabs cag tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub ses dpag
332a5(mdo): sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po 'dug pa bstan las langs nas/ bco ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'/ sa kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi// de skad ces
332a6(mdo): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ zla ba'i snying pos thas cad dngos po dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa myed kyang gling bzhi
332a7(mdo): 'khor bar byed cing mun pa rnams rab tu sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rtog pa myed kyang phyin ci log bzhi rnams la thugs rje 'khor zhing rang bzhin gis nyon mongs
332a8(mdo): brnaMs sel bar byed kyang / myi rtog pa'i phyi ro// zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' zhe
332a9(mdo): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la rnam pa gnyis te/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni mos pa spyod pa'i gnas skabs na/ gzung bar rtog pa dang 'dzin par rtog pa ste/ de spong bar byed pa/
332b1(mdo): nas// nam mkha'i snying po la ni stong byed pa// de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang // sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnamalas 'grol// des ni zhi mchog bde ba kun gnas dang / bde ba rgya chen nges par thob
332b2(mdo): par 'gyur// bde thob longs spyod 'brel bar bya ba 'am// rgyal srid thob dang byang gzungs nor 'thob dang // rig 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir// bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom myed// de phyir ci ste rtag tu
332b3(mdo): 'dod pa de kun// 'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba// nam mkha'i snying po srid de gsum mgon po la// rtag tu bstod cing sngags kyang bstand par gos// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// rdzogs so
332b4(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ra ba ti/ bod skad du/ sdong po rgyan gyi mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon cho ga gsum la phyag 'al lo// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis bdag la bsrung zhing bskyab du
332b5(mdo): gsol/ byang chub mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de'i snying po 'di/ skad gsungs/ oM kA ra ka ra swA hA/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ bA ra bA ra sA hA/ pu ru bu ru swA hA/ da ra da ra swA hA/ du ru du ru swA hA/ bdag gi lA/
332b6(mdo): phung yan lag la thog ma myed pa'i nus mtha' nas/ tha ma'i dus 'a de yan chod du/ lo mya rung dang bzla myi rung/ gza' myi rung dang skar myi ru nga/ phyogs myi rung dang mtshams myi rung / zhag dang za ma mya rung dang
332b7(mdo): nyin myi rung dang mtshan myi rung / nyin mtshan byed zhugs myi rung dang / srong dang tho rangs myi rung rnams// rgyal ba rnams kyis bsrung du gsol// de'i snying po 'di skad gsungs// oM prad nye phrad nye ba a ba log kar ri ad kany+dza
332b8(mdo): na byi de ma ni su si to a r+ya 'dzam pa la/ man 'dzu ye swA hA/ bdag gi lA phung yan lag la/ thog pa myed pa'i dus mtha' nas/ tha ma'i dus 'di yin chod du/ ma rika brdzun dang phra ma dang / sgo dang ngan pa 'ong ba dang / ya!
332b9(mdo): kyi bdud dang mas kyi sri/ gzugs can dgra dang gzugs myed dgegs/ lo'i kyeg dang zla 'i gshed// rmyi ltas mtshan ma ngan pa dang / byol zlog 'phen pa ma lus kun/ phyogs spyod rnams kyis bsrung du gsol// de'i snying
333a1(mdo): tad ya thA/ oM prad nye phrad nye/ ma ha prad nye/ tsan tA prad nye/ sarba shA sa ka ra swa hA// chos thams cad rgyu las byung / de nyid kun rdzob
333a2(mdo): bden pa ste/ rang bzhin myed cing spros myed pa// de nyid don dam spyod yul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsald pa dang / byang
333a3(mdo): chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha dang / mye dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
333a4(mdo): yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod to// 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa
333a5(mdo): theg pa chen po la mdo/ rdzo// gas s+ho//

333b1(mdo): ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la zag pa myed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni// mthong ba'i lam gi rna bar myi rtog pa'i ye shes te/ ye shes de ni rtog pa thas cad dang bral ba'i phyir na myi rtog pa'i phyir ro// ri/
333b2(mdo): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshu rol gi mtha' gang la yang myi gnas pa'i phyiraro// shes rab na gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du rang bzhin myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
333b3(mdo): rang bzhin myed par shes par bya'o// gzugs la stsogs pa'i chos rnams dus su du myi dmyigs shing / ma bcires ma grol bar shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thas cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa
333b4(mdo): nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa myed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa myed pa'o// chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma myed pa'o// chos thams cad skye ba myed
333b5(mdo): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba myed pa'o// chos thams cad chad pa myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chad pa myed pa'o// chos thams cad 'ong ba myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba
333b6(mdo): myed pa'o// chos thams cad 'gro ba myed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'gro ba myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad rtag pa myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa rtag pa myed
333b7(mdo): pa nyid do// chos thams cad tha rad pa myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tha dad pa myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad don gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa dor
333b8(mdo): gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid do// mdor na thams cad mtshan ma dang / rang bzhin
333b9(mdo): dang / ngo bo nyid las 'da' ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i sngags so//
